    15                                  ; as below:
    16                                  ;    1) SYSINIT code has been changed from MSDOS 5.0 to MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS
    17                                  ;      (except DOUBLESPACE feature! Retro DOS does not use the DOUBLESPACE.)	
    18                                  ;    2) 'iosys6.s' is same with 'iosys5.s' except sysinit code.
    19                                  ;	(Also, MSDOS 5.0 & MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS are almost same except
    20                                  ;	SYSINIT and 'Starting MS-DOS' msg part of MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS.)

    22                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    23                                  
    24                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Multisection binary file format (BIOSDATA & BIOSCODE sections)
    25                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan (Istanbul)
    26                                  
    27                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    28                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    29                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    30                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    31                                        
    32                                  ;---- Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    33                                  ;     at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    34                                  ;     moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    35                                  ;     Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    36                                  ;     SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    37                                  ;     (MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    38                                  
    39                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    40

    45                                  ;rsvdsecs	dw ?			; base 10

   153                                  ;============================================================================
   154                                  ;
   155                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   156                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   157                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   158                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   159                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   160                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   161                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   162                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   163                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the
   164                                  ;	     extention of msboot program.

   262                                  ; INPUT:     none

   264                                  ;   dl = int 13 drive number we booted from
   265                                  ;   ch = media byte
   266                                  ;   bx = first data sector (low) on disk (0-based)
   267                                  ;   ds:si = original rom bios diskette parameter table.
   268                                  ;
   269                                  ; if an extended boot record, then ax will be the first data sector
   270                                  ; high word. save ax and set FirstSectorH according to ax if it is an
   271                                  ; extended boot record.

   273                                  ;   ax = first data sector (high) on disk ;

   275                                  ;
   276                                  ;   bx = first data sector on disk
   277                                  ;
   278                                  ;   MediaByte = input ch
   279                                  ;   BootDrive = input dl
   280                                  ;   FirstSectorL = input bx
   281                                  ;   FirstSectorH = input AX, if an extended boot record.;j.k.
   282                                  ;   TotalSectorsL = maximum sector number in this media ;j.k.
   283                                  ;   TotalSectorsH = high word of the above
   284                                  ;   HiddenSectorsL = hidden secotrs

   290                                  ;   ds = 0

   505                                  ; Relocate
   506                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   507                                  ;
   508                                  ; NOTES:
   509                                  ;
   510                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   511                                  ;
   512                                  ; INPUT:     none
   513                                  ;
   514                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   515                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   516                                  ;
   517                                  ; calls:     none
   518                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   519                                  ;
   520                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   521                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   522                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   523                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   524                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   525                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   526                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   527                                  ;
   528                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   529                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   530                                  ;
   531                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   532                                  ;
   533                                  ; jump to relocated code
   534                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   535                                  
   536                                  		; 14/09/2023
   537                                  relocate:

   547                                  					; Return: AX = number of contiguous 1K blocks of memory
   548 000000C8 B106                    		mov	cl, 6
   549 000000CA D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl		; Memory size in paragraphs
   550                                  
   551                                  ;------ Check if an RPL program is present at TOM and do not tromp over it
   552                                  
   553                                  		; 10/12/2022

   561

   659                                  ; FindClusterSize
   660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   661                                  ;
   662                                  ; INPUT:     bpb information in loaded boot record at 0:7c00h
   663                                  ;
   664                                  ; OUTPUT:
   665                                  ;
   666                                  ;	ds = 0
   667                                  ;	ax = bytes/cluster
   668                                  ;	bx = sectors/cluster
   669                                  ;	si destroyed
   670                                  ; calls:     none
   671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
   672                                  ;
   673                                  ; get bytes/sector from bpb
   674                                  ;
   675                                  ; get sectors/cluster from bpb

   677                                  ; bytes/cluster = bytes/sector * sector/cluster

   700                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   701                                  ;
   702                                  ; NOTES:
   703                                  ;
   704                                  ;   Determine if fat is 12 or 16 bit fat. 12 bit fat if floppy, read mbr
   705                                  ;   to find out what system id byte is.
   706                                  ;
   707                                  ; INPUT:
   708                                  ;
   709                                  ; OUTPUT:
   710                                  ;
   711                                  ;   CS:FatSize = FAT_12_BIT or FAT_16_BIT
   712                                  ;   all other registers destroyed
   713                                  ;
   714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   715                                  
   716                                  CalcFatSize:
   717                                  		; 14/09/2023
   718                                  		; 24/12/2022
   719                                  		; ds = cs
   720 0000011D C606[2700]01            		mov	byte [Fatsize], 1

   726                                  		;;;

   776                                  
   777                                  ; ReadInFirstCluster
   778                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   779                                  ;
   780                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   781                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   782                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   783                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   784                                  ;
   785                                  ; INPUT:
   786                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   787                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   788                                  ;
   789                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   790                                  ;   ClusterSize
   791                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   792                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   793                                  ;
   794                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   795                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   796                                  ;
   797                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   798                                  ; logic:
   799                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   800                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   801                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   802                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   803                                  ;	read in so far.
   804                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   805                                  
   806                                  ; 09/12/2022
   807                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   808                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   809                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in
   810                                  	
   811                                  ReadInFirstCluster:
   812                                  		; 24/12/2022
   813                                  		;;mov	ax, [BioSStart]
   814                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah]	; IO.SYS First Cluster
   815                                  		;dec	ax		; Root dir buffer at 500h (segment=0)
   816                                  		;			; IO.SYS first cluster ptr at 51Ah
   817                                  		;dec	ax		; AX = word [51Ah] - 2
   818                                  		;;mov	[cs:CurrentCluster], ax ;  Initialize to this cluster
   819                                  		; 24/12/2022
   820                                  		; ds = cs
   821                                  		;mov	[CurrentCluster], ax
   822                                  		; 24/12/2022
   823                                  		; [CurrentCluster] = word [51Ah] - 2
   824                                  
   825                                  		;mov	ax, IbmLoadSize

   827 00000158 F6F1                    		div	cl ; *#*
   828                                  		;div	byte [SecPerCluster]
   829                                  		;;div	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   830                                  					; AL = total cluster read in
   831                                  					; AH = remaining sectors in last cluster
   832                                  		; 06/10/2023
   833                                  		; If cluster size > 3, al = 0, ah = 3
   834                                  		; If cluster size = 2, al = 1, ah = 1
   835                                  		; If cluster size = 1, al = 3, ah = 0
   836                                  		; If ah = 0, nothing remaining in last cluster
   837                                  
   838                                  		; 07/10/2023
   839                                  		; dh = 0
   840 0000015A B270                    		mov	dl, 70h

   842                                  
   843                                  		; 10/12/2022
   844 0000015E 20E4                    		and	ah, ah
   845                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   846 00000160 743E                    		jz	short SetNextClusterNum	; next cluster
   847                                  ; 06/10/2023
   848                                  %if 0
   849                                  		; 06/10/2023
   850                                  		;xor	ah, ah
   851                                  		;push	ax		; AX = total clusters in the loader
   852                                  					; already read in
   853                                  ; 24/12/2022

   855                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorL] ;	Put starting sector of disk data
   856                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   857                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
   858                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], cx
   859                                  		mul	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   860                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   861                                  		adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   862                                  		;mov	ax, [BiosStart]
   863                                  		mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   864                                  		dec	ax
   865                                  		dec	ax
   866                                  		xor	bx, bx

   869                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax
   870                                  		adc	[cs:StartSecH], dx
   871                                  					; abs start sector for next read of
   872                                  					; the rest of the last loader cluster

   876                                  		;mov	di, BiosOffset

   878                                  		add	di, ax
   879                                  		xor	ax, ax
   880                                  		mov	es, ax		; ES = segment 0

   882                                  					; Read in the entire last cluster
   883                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax

   886                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   887                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...

   902                                  		; al=1, ah=1, dl=1, dh=0

   995                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
   996                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   997                                  ;
   998                                  ; NOTES:
   999                                  ;
  1000                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
  1001                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
  1002                                  ;
  1003                                  ; INPUT:
  1004                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
  1005                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
  1006                                  ;
  1007                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1008                                  ;	ES = 70h
  1009                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
  1010                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
  1011                                  ;
  1012                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
  1013                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
  1014                                  ;
  1015                                  ; calls:     none
  1016                                  ;
  1017                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1018                                  ;
  1019                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
  1020                                  ;
  1021                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
  1022                                  ;
  1023                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
  1024                                  ;
  1025                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1026                                  
  1027                                  SaveLoadedBios:
  1028                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1029                                  		;push	ds
  1030                                  		
  1031                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1032                                  		; ds = cs
  1033                                  		; ax = number of loaded clusters
  1034 000001A6 F726[0400]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
  1035                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
  1036                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
  1037                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
  1038                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
  1039                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1040                                  		; ax = [clusterSize] * (loaded cluster count)
  1041                                  SaveLoadedBios2:
  1042                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1043 000001AA 1E                      		push	ds
  1044                                  
  1045                                  		;sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)
  1046                                  		; 07/10/2023

  1048 000001AE 29F0                    		sub	ax, si
  1049 000001B0 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  1050

  1053                                  		;mov	ds, ax

  1057 000001B3 1F                      		pop	ds
  1058

  1062                                  		;mov	[NextBioLocation], di
  1063                                  		;;mov	[cs:NextBioLocation], di
  1064                                  
  1065                                  		; es:di = (the next) buffer address for next read
  1066                                  
  1067 000001B8 1F                      		pop	ds		; Save where location for next read
  1068                                  
  1069                                  ; GetContigClusters
  1070                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1071                                  ;
  1072                                  ; NOTES: go find clusters as long as they are contiguous
  1073                                  ;
  1074                                  ;
  1075                                  ; INPUT:
  1076                                  ;   CS:NextBioLocation
  1077                                  ;   CS:
  1078                                  ;
  1079                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1080                                  ;
  1081                                  ; calls: GetNextFatEntry
  1082                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1083                                  ;
  1084                                  ;Set CS:SectorCount to sectors per cluster
  1085                                  ;
  1086                                  ;Call GetNextFatEntry to get next cluster in file
  1087                                  ;
  1088                                  ;Call check_for_eof
  1089                                  ;
  1090                                  ;if (nc returned)
  1091                                  ;
  1092                                  ;   {call GetNextFatEntry
  1093                                  ;
  1094                                  ;    if (new cluster is contig to old cluster)
  1095                                  ;	{add sectors per cluster to CS:SectorCount
  1096                                  ;
  1097                                  ;	 call check_for_eof
  1098                                  ;
  1099                                  ;	 if (nc returned)
  1100                                  ;
  1101                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1102                                  
  1103                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1104                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1105                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h
  1106                                  
  1107                                  GetContigClusters:
  1108                                  
  1109                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1110                                  %if 0	
  1111                                  		xor	ah, ah
  1112                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1113                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1114                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1115                                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1116                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1117                                  		mov	word [cs:CurrentCluster], ax ; Update the last one found
  1118                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
  1119                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
  1120                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1121                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1122                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1123                                  		dec	ax
  1124                                  		dec	ax
  1125                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1126                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1127                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1128                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1129                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1130                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1131                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1132                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1133                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1134                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1135                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1136                                  		mov	es, ax
  1137                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1138                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1139                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1140                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1141                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1142                                  
  1143                                  %endif
  1144                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1145                                  		; ds = cs
  1146 000001B9 A1[1200]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1147 000001BC A3[0C00]                		mov	[SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1148                                  		;push	word [SectorCount]
  1149 000001BF 50                      		push	ax
  1150 000001C0 E8D500                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1151 000001C3 8F06[0C00]              		pop	word [SectorCount]

  1153

  1179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1180                                  
  1181                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1182                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1183                                  ;
  1184                                  ; NOTES:
  1185                                  ;
  1186                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1187                                  ;
  1188                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1189                                  ;
  1190                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1191                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1192                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1193                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1194                                  ;
  1195                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1196                                  ;
  1197                                  ;   required by msinit
  1198                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1199                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1200                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1201                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1202                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1203                                  ;
  1204                                  ; calls:     none
  1205                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1206                                  ;
  1207                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1208                                  ;
  1209                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1210                                  
  1211                                  GoToBioInit:	
  1212                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1213                                  		; ds = cs	
  1214                                  		;mov	ch, [cs:MediaByte]
  1215                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1216                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:FirstSectorL]
  1217                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1218                                  
  1219 000001EB 8A2E[2800]              		mov	ch, [MediaByte] ; Restore regs required for msint
  1220 000001EF 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1221 000001F3 8B1E[2200]              		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1222 000001F7 A1[2400]                		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1223                                  
  1224                                  		; 15/09/2023 (retrodos 4.s, retrodos41.s, retrodos42.s)
  1225                                  		; (This is not necessary but BP value will be 7C00h
  1226                                  		; when the RetroDOS boot sector code starts the kernel.
  1227                                  		; Retro DOS 4 Kernel source code contains a comment that
  1228                                  		; 'bp = 7C00h' at the init stage. But RetroDOS kernel
  1229                                  		; doesn't use it later. However, i want to leave BP
  1230                                  		; as equal to SP here.) ---rd4load.s---
  1231                                  		;
  1232                                  		; 15/09/2023 (iosys5.s, iosys51.s, iosys6.s)
  1233                                  		; (The BP value here will not be used by IO.SYS later.
  1234                                  		;  It is not necessary to set.) 
  1235                                  		;
  1236                                  		;mov	bp, sp	; 7C00h ; 15/09/2023
  1237                                  
  1238 000001FA EA00007000              		jmp	70h:0	; Far jump to IoSysAddr	(DOSBIOS)
  1239                                  
  1240                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1241                                  
  1242                                  ; ReadSectors
  1243                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1244                                  ; notES:
  1245                                  ;
  1246                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1247                                  ;
  1248                                  ;
  1249                                  ; INPUT:
  1250                                  ;
  1251                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1252                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1253                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1254                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1255                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1256                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1257                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1258                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1259                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1260                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1261                                  ;
  1262                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1263                                  ;
  1264                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1265                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1266                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1267                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1268                                  ;
  1269                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1270                                  ;
  1271                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1272                                  ;
  1273                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1274                                  ;
  1275                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1276                                  ;
  1277                                  ; do the read
  1278                                  ;
  1279                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1280                                  ;
  1281                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1282                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1283                                  ;
  1284                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1285                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1286                                  
  1287                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1288                                  ReadSectors:
  1289                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1290                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1291                                  ReadSectors:
  1292 000001FF B90500                  		mov	cx, 5			; 5 retries
  1293                                  
  1294                                  		; Convert a logical sector into track/sector/head. AX has the
  1295                                  		; logical sector number
  1296                                  TryRead:
  1297                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1298                                  		; ds = cs
  1299 00000202 51                      		push	cx
  1300                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:StartSecL]	; Get starting sector
  1301                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:StartSecH]
  1302                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1303                                  		;mov	ax, [StartSecL]	; *	; Get starting sector
  1304                                  		;mov	dx, [StartSecH]
  1305                                  		;push	ax ; *
  1306                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1307 00000203 A1[0800]                		mov	ax, [StartSecH]
  1308 00000206 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1309                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]
  1310                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1311                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1312 00000208 8B1E[1600]              		mov	bx, [SecPerTrack]
  1313 0000020C F7F3                    		div	bx
  1314                                  
  1315                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1316                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1317                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1318 0000020E 89C5                    		mov	bp, ax ; [TempH]
  1319                                  		;pop	ax ; *
  1320 00000210 A1[0600]                		mov	ax, [StartSecL] ; *
  1321 00000213 F7F3                    		div	bx
  1322                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1323                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]	; [TempH]:ax = track,
  1324                                  						; dx = sector number
  1325                                  
  1326                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:SecPerTrack]	; Get number of sectors we can
  1327                                  						; read in this track
  1328 00000215 29D3                    		sub	bx, dx
  1329                                  		;mov	si, bx
  1330 00000217 8B36[0C00]              		mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1331                                  
  1332 0000021B 39DE                    		cmp	si, bx
  1333 0000021D 7602                    		jna	short GotLength
  1334                                  		;cmp	[SectorCount], si
  1335                                  		;;cmp	[cs:SectorCount], si	; Is possible sectors in track more
  1336                                  		;jnb	short GotLength		; than what we need to read?
  1337 0000021F 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  1338                                  		;mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1339                                  		;;mov	si, [cs:SectorCount]	; Yes, only read what we need to
  1340                                  ;GotLength:
  1341                                  
  1342                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1343                                  		; IO.SYS < 40KB (segment override is not possible)
  1344                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address 
  1345                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)
  1346                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1347                                  %if 0
  1348                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1349                                  		; dma boundary check for >64KB reads
  1350                                  		; Also, Segment Override risk !
  1351                                  		or	di, di
  1352                                  		jz	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for the 1st read
  1353                                  		;cmp	byte [BootDrive], 80h
  1354                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:BootDrive], 80h
  1355                                  		;jnb	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for hard disks
  1356                                  dma_boundary_chk:
  1357                                  		cmp	si, 1
  1358                                  		jna	short dma_boundary_ok 
  1359                                  				; 1 sector read will not cause a boundary error			
  1360                                  		push	dx
  1361                                  		push	ax
  1362                                  		mov	ax, si
  1363                                  		sub	dx, dx
  1364                                  		mul	word [BytesPerSec]
  1365                                  		mov	bx, es
  1366                                  		mov	cl, 4
  1367                                  		shl	bx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes
  1368                                  		; bx = segment start position (for 64K memory sections)
  1369                                  		add	bx, ax	; byte count to read
  1370                                  		pop	ax
  1371                                  		pop	dx
  1372                                  		add	bx, di	; add current buffer offset to byte count
  1373                                  		jnc	short dma_boundary_ok
  1374                                  		
  1375                                  		; Sector count must be decreased to prevent
  1376                                  		; DMA boundary error or segment override risk!
  1377                                  		dec	si
  1378                                  		jmp	short dma_boundary_chk
  1379                                  dma_boundary_ok:
  1380                                  %endif
  1381                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1382                                  GotLength:
  1383                                  		;inc	dl			; Sector numbers are 1-based
  1384                                  		; 18/12/2022
  1385 00000221 42                      		inc	dx
  1386 00000222 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl			; Start sector in BL
  1387                                  		
  1388                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1389                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1390                                  		;mov	dx, [TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1391                                  		;;mov	dx, [cs:TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1392                                  		
  1393 00000224 50                      		push	ax
  1394                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1395                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1396 00000225 89E8                    		mov	ax, bp ; [TempH]
  1397 00000227 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1398                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1399 00000229 F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1400                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; Start cyl in AX, head in dl
  1401                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1402                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1403 0000022D 58                      		pop	ax
  1404 0000022E F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1405                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; [TempH]:AX = Cylinder, DX = Head
  1406                                  
  1407                                  			; At this moment, we assume that TempH = 0,
  1408                                  			; ax <= 1024, dx <= 255
  1409                                  
  1410 00000232 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
  1411                                  		
  1412 00000234 B106                    		mov	cl, 6
  1413 00000236 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl			; Shift cyl high bits up
  1414 00000238 08DC                    		or	ah, bl			; Mix in with sector bits
  1415 0000023A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al			; Setup cyl low
  1416 0000023C 88E1                    		mov	cl, ah			; Setup cyl/high - sector
  1417 0000023E 89FB                    		mov	bx, di			; Get back OFFSET
  1418                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1419 00000240 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive]		; Get drive
  1420                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]	; Get drive
  1421 00000244 89F0                    		mov	ax, si			; Get number of sectors to read (al)
  1422 00000246 B402                    		mov	ah, 2			; Read sectors
  1423                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1424                                  		;push	ax
  1425                                  		;push	di
  1426                                  
  1427                                  			; Issue one read request. ES:BX have the transfer address,
  1428                                  			; AL is the number of sectors.	
  1429                                  
  1430 00000248 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  1431                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  1432                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill

  1434                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1435                                  		;pop	di
  1436                                  		;pop	ax
  1437                                  
  1438                                  		; 12/12/2023
  1439                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1440                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  1441                                  		
  1442 0000024A 59                      		pop	cx		; Get retry count back
  1443 0000024B 7309                    		jnc	short ReadOk	; 23/12/2022

  1458                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
  1459                                  		; 23/12/2022

  1478

  1490                                  
  1491 0000025D 01C7                    		add	di, ax			; Add it to OFFSET
  1492                                  
  1493                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1494                                  		; IO.SYS < 40KB (segment override is not possible)
  1495                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address 
  1496                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)

  1500                                  		;;add	bx, 1000h
  1501                                  		;add	bh, 10h

  1504

  1509                                  		;sub	[cs:SectorCount], cx
  1510                                  		;;sub	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Bump number down
  1511 00000263 7425                    		jz	short EndRead

  1513                                  		;add	[cs:StartSecL], cx
  1514                                  		;;add	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Where to start next time
  1515 00000269 8316[0800]00            		adc	word [StartSecH], 0
  1516                                  		;adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0
  1517 0000026E EB8F                    		jmp	ReadSectors
  1518                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  1531                                  		;push	cs
  1532                                  		;pop	ds
  1533                                  		
  1534 00000270 BE[3903]                		mov	si, NonSystemDiskMsg ; "\r\nNon-System disk or disk error\r\nRe"...
  1535 00000273 E81500                  		call	WriteTTY
  1536                                  
  1537                                  		; Wait for a keypress on the keyboard.
  1538                                  		; Use the bios keyboard interrupt.
  1539                                  
  1540 00000276 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  1541 00000278 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  1542                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  1543                                  
  1544                                  		; We have to restore the address of the original rom disk
  1545                                  		; parameter table to the location at [0:DskAddr]. The address
  1546                                  		; of this original table has been saved previously in
  1547                                  		; 0:OrgDasdPtr and 0:OrgDasdPtr+2. After this table address
  1548                                  		; has been restored we can reboot by invoking the bootstrap
  1549                                  		; loader bios interrupt.
  1550

  1552                                  		;xor	bx, bx
  1553                                  		;mov	ds, bx
  1554                                  		;les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Wrong DS segment !
  1555                                  					 ; (Erdogan Tan, 23/12/2022)
  1556 0000027A C41E[2A00]              		les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Correct DS segment = CS
  1557                                  		
  1558                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1559                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1560 0000027E 16                      		push	ss ; 0
  1561 0000027F 1F                      		pop	ds
  1562                                  		; 07/10/2023

  1564                                  		;mov	ds, si
  1565                                  		; ds = 0		
  1566                                  
  1567 00000280 BE7800                  		mov	si, DskAddr	; (Int 1Eh)
  1568 00000283 891C                    		mov	[si], bx	; restore offset
  1569 00000285 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; restore segment
  1570                                  
  1571 00000288 CD19                    		int	19h		; reboot
  1572

  1574

  1577 0000028A C3                      EndWrite:	retn

  1598                                  				; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  1599                                  				; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  1600 00000296 EBF3                    		jmp	short WriteTTY

  1613                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1614                                  
  1615                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1616                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1617                                  ;
  1618                                  ; NOTES:
  1619                                  ;
  1620                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1621                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1622                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1623                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1624                                  ;
  1625                                  ; INPUT:
  1626                                  ;
  1627                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1628                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1629                                  ;
  1630                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1631                                  ;
  1632                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1633                                  ;
  1634                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1636                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1637                                  ;
  1638                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1639                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1640                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1641                                  ;     else
  1642                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1643                                  ;
  1644                                  ; else
  1645                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1646                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1647                                  ;     else
  1648                                  ;	{get OFFSET by	- multiply cluster by 3
  1649                                  ;
  1650                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1651                                  ;
  1652                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1653                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1654                                  ;
  1655                                  ;	 else
  1656                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1657                                  ;	}
  1658                                  ;    }
  1659                                  ;
  1660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1661                                  
  1662                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1663                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1664                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1665                                  
  1666                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1667 00000298 06                      		push	es
  1668                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1669                                  		; ds = cs
  1670                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FatSegment]
  1671 00000299 A1[3200]                		mov	ax, [FatSegment]
  1672 0000029C 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES-> FAT area segment
  1673                                  		; 09/12/2022
  1674                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], END_OF_FILE
  1675                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1676                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1677                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1678                                  		; ds = cs
  1679 0000029E C606[2900]FF            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1680 000002A3 A1[0E00]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1681                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1682 000002A6 29D2                    		sub	dx, dx
  1683                                  		; dx = 0
  1684 000002A8 803E[2700]01            		cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1685                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1686                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1
  1687 000002AD 7539                    		jne	short Got16Bit	; 23/12/2022
  1688                                  Got12Bit:
  1689 000002AF 89C6                    		mov	si, ax
  1690 000002B1 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  1691 000002B3 01C6                    		add	si, ax		; SI = AX * 1.5 = AX + AX/2
  1692                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1693 000002B5 56                      		push	si ; (**)
  1694                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1695                                  		;push	dx
  1696                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1697                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1698                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1699 000002B6 E84700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1700                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1701 000002B9 5E                      		pop	si ; (**)
  1702                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1703                                  		;pop	dx
  1704 000002BA 7512                    		jnz	short ClusterOk
  1705 000002BC 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]
  1706                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1707                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster], al
  1708                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1709 000002BF 50                      		push	ax ; (*)
  1710 000002C0 46                      		inc	si
  1711                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1712                                  		;push	dx
  1713 000002C1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1714 000002C3 E83A00                  		call	GetFatSector	; Read next fat sector
  1715                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1716                                  		;pop	dx
  1717                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1718                                  		;mov	al, [es:0]
  1719                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster+1], al
  1720                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TempCluster]
  1721                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1722                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1723 000002C6 58                      		pop	ax ; (*) 
  1724 000002C7 268A260000              		mov	ah, [es:0]
  1725 000002CC EB03                    		jmp	short EvenOdd
  1726                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1727                                  
  1728                                  ClusterOk:				
  1729 000002CE 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1730                                  EvenOdd:	
  1731                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1732                                  		; ds = cs
  1733 000002D1 F606[0E00]01            		test	byte [CurrentCluster], 1
  1734                                  		; 10/12/2022		
  1735                                  		;test	byte [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; 09/12/2022
  1736                                  		;;test	word [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; Was last cluster odd?
  1737 000002D6 7505                    		jnz	short OddResult		; If not zero it was odd
  1738 000002D8 25FF0F                  		and	ax, 0FFFh		; Keep low 12 bits
  1739 000002DB EB04                    		jmp	short TestEOF
  1740                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1741                                  
  1742                                  OddResult:				
  1743 000002DD B104                    		mov	cl, 4			; Keep high 12 bits for odd
  1744 000002DF D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl
  1745                                  TestEOF:				
  1746 000002E1 3DF80F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF8h		; Is it last cluster?
  1747 000002E4 7318                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone	; Yep, all done here
  1748 000002E6 EB11                    		jmp	short NotLastCluster
  1749                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1750                                  
  1751                                  Got16Bit:
  1752                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1753                                  		;push	dx
  1754                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1755                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1756                                  		; ax = cluster number
  1757                                  		; dx = 0
  1758                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1759 000002E8 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1			; Multiply cluster by 2
  1760                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1761                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1762 000002EA 11D2                    		adc	dx, dx ; dx = 0
  1763 000002EC 89C6                    		mov	si, ax			; Get the final buffer OFFSET
  1764 000002EE E80F00                  		call	GetFatSector
  1765                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1766                                  		;pop	dx
  1767 000002F1 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1768 000002F4 83F8F8                  		cmp	ax, 0FFF8h
  1769 000002F7 7305                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone
  1770                                  NotLastCluster:	
  1771                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1772                                  		; ds = cs			
  1773                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], NOT_END_OF_FILE ; ~END_OF_FILE
  1774                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1775 000002F9 C606[2900]00            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1776                                  GotClusterDone:				
  1777 000002FE 07                      		pop	es
  1778                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1779                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1780                                  ;EndRead:
  1781 000002FF C3                      		retn
  1782                                  
  1783                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1784                                  
  1785                                  ; GetFatSector
  1786                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1787                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ES:0
  1788                                  ;
  1789                                  ;in). SI = offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find.
  1790                                  ;     ES = fat sector segment
  1791                                  ;     CS:BytesPerSec
  1792                                  ;
  1793                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  1794                                  ;      BX = offset value of the corresponding fat entry in the fat sector.
  1795                                  ;      CX destroyed.
  1796                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e. when 12 bit fat entry
  1797                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  1798                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  1799                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat).
  1800                                  ;
  1801                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1802                                  
  1803                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1804                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1805                                  GetFatSector:
  1806                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1807                                  		;push	ax
  1808                                  		;push	si
  1809 00000300 57                      		push	di
  1810 00000301 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  1811                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1812                                  		; ds = cs
  1813                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1814                                  		;div	cx			; AX = Sector number, DX = Offset
  1815 00000303 F736[1000]              		div	word [BytesPerSec]
  1816 00000307 3B06[0A00]              		cmp	ax, [LastFatSector]
  1817                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:LastFatSector]	; The same fat sector?
  1818 0000030B 7421                    		je	short SplitChk		; Don't need to read it again.
  1819 0000030D A3[0A00]                		mov	[LastFatSector], ax
  1820                                  		;mov	[cs:LastFatSector], ax
  1821 00000310 52                      		push	dx
  1822                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1823 00000311 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1824                                  		;add	ax, [cs:HiddenSectorsL]
  1825                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:HiddenSectorsH]
  1826                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
  1827                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1828                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1829                                  		; ds = cs
  1830 00000313 0306[2E00]              		add	ax, [FatStartSecL]
  1831 00000317 1316[3000]              		adc	dx, [FatStartSecH]
  1832 0000031B A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax
  1833 0000031E 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx		; Set up for ReadSectors
  1834                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax
  1835                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx	; Set up for ReadSectors
  1836                                  		
  1837 00000322 C706[0C00]0100          		mov	word [SectorCount], 1	; 1 sector
  1838                                  		;mov	word [cs:SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector
  1839 00000328 31FF                    		xor	di, di ; 0
  1840                                  		; es:di = FATSEGMENT:0000h
  1841 0000032A E8D2FE                  		call	ReadSectors
  1842 0000032D 5A                      		pop	dx
  1843                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1844                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1845                                  SplitChk:
  1846                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1847 0000032E 8B0E[1000]              		mov	cx, [BytesPerSec]
  1848 00000332 49                      		dec	cx			; CX = SECTOR SIZE - 1
  1849 00000333 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx			; If last byte of sector, splitted entry.
  1850 00000335 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx			; set bx to dx
  1851 00000337 5F                      		pop	di
  1852                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1853                                  		;pop	si
  1854                                  		;pop	ax
  1855                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1856                                  ;EndWrite:		; 10/12/2022
  1857 00000338 C3                      		retn
  1858                                  
  1859                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1860                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1861                                  
  1862                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1863                                  ;include msbio.cl1
  1864                                  
  1865                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1866                                  		; 20/12/2022
  1867                                  		; 18/12/2022
  1868                                  		;db 0	; (word alignment)
  1869                                  NonSystemDiskMsg:
  1870 00000339 0D0A                    		db 0Dh,0Ah		; ...
  1871 0000033B 4E6F6E2D5379737465-     		db 'Non-System disk or disk error',0Dh,0Ah
  1871 00000344 6D206469736B206F72-
  1871 0000034D 206469736B20657272-
  1871 00000356 6F720D0A           
  1872 0000035A 5265706C6163652061-     		db 'Replace and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah,0
  1872 00000363 6E6420707265737320-
  1872 0000036C 616E79206B65792077-
  1872 00000375 68656E207265616479-
  1872 0000037E 0D0A00             
  1873                                  ; 25/12/2022
  1874                                  ;align 16
  1875                                  
  1876                                  ; 07/10/2023
  1877                                  
  1878                                  number0div	equ ($-START$)
  1879                                  number0mod	equ (number0div % 16)
  1880                                  
  1881                                  %if (number0mod>0) & (number0mod<16)
  1882 00000381 00<rep Fh>              		times (16-number0mod) db 0
  1883                                  %endif
  1884                                  
  1885                                  EndOfLoader:
  1886                                  		;dw 01A1h	; 10/12/2022
  1887                                  ; 07/10/2023
  1888                                  ENDOFLDR	equ EndOfLoader-$$

  2079 00000119 [4E03]                  start_bds:	dw bds1			; Start	of linked list of BDS's
  2080 0000011B 7000                    		dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  2081                                  
  2082                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2083                                  ; Some floppy drives do not have changeline support. The result is a
  2084                                  ; large amount of inefficiency in the code. A media-check always returns
  2085                                  ; "I don`t know". This cause DOS to reread the FAT on every access and
  2086                                  ; always discard any cached data.
  2087                                  ;    We get around this inefficiency by implementing a "Logical Door Latch".
  2088                                  ; The following three items are used to do this. The logical door latch is
  2089                                  ; based on the premise that it is not physically possible to change floppy
  2090                                  ; disks in a drive in under two seconds (most people take about 10). The
  2091                                  ; logical door latch is implemented by saving the time of the last successful
  2092                                  ; disk operation (in the value TIM_DRV). When a new request is made the
  2093                                  ; current time is compared to the saved time. If less than two seconds have
  2094                                  ; passed then the value "No Change" is returned. If more than two seconds
  2095                                  ; have passed the value "Don't Know" is returned.
  2096                                  ;    There is one complecation to this algorithm. Some programs change the
  2097                                  ; value of the timer. In this unfortunate case we have an invalid timer.
  2098                                  ; This possibility is detected by counting the number of disk operations
  2099                                  ; which occur without any time passing. If this count exceeds the value of
  2100                                  ; "AccessMax" we assume the counter is invalid and always return "Don't
  2101                                  ; Know". The variable "AccessCount" is used to keep track of the number
  2102                                  ; of disk operation which occur without the time changing.
  2103                                  
  2104 0000011D 00                      accesscount:	db 0			
  2105 0000011E FF                      tim_drv:	db 0FFh			
  2106 0000011F 00                      medbyt:		db 0
  2107                                  wrtverify:	; 15/10/2022			
  2108 00000120 02                      rflag:		db 2			; 2 for	read, 3	for write
  2109 00000121 00                      verify:		db 0			; 1 if verify after write
  2110 00000122 0000                    seccnt:		dw 0			
  2111 00000124 00                      		db 0			; -- pad where hardnum was
  2112 00000125 01                      dsktnum:	db 1			; number of diskette drives			
  2113                                  
  2114                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2115                                  ; Some of the older versions of the IBM rom-bios always assumed a seek would
  2116                                  ; have to be made to read the diskette. Consequently a large head settle
  2117                                  ; time was always used in the I/O operations. To get around this problem
  2118                                  ; we need to continually adjust the head settle time. The following
  2119                                  ; algorithm is used:
  2120                                  ;
  2121                                  ;   Get the current head settle value.
  2122                                  ;   If it is 1, then
  2123                                  ;	set slow = 15
  2124                                  ;   else
  2125                                  ;	set slow = value
  2126                                  ;   ...
  2127                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing then
  2128                                  ;	use slow
  2129                                  ;   else
  2130                                  ;	use fast
  2131                                  ;   ...
  2132                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  2133                                  
  2134 00000126 00                      motorstartup:	db 0			; value from table
  2135 00000127 00                      settlecurrent:	db 0			; value	from table
  2136 00000128 00                      settleslow:	db 0			; slow settle value
  2137 00000129 00                      nextspeed:	db 0			; value	of speed to be used
  2138 0000012A 00                      save_head_sttl:	db 0			; used by read_sector routine
  2139 0000012B 00                      save_eot:	db 0			; saved	eot from the default DPT
  2140 0000012C 09                      eot:		db 9			
  2141 0000012D 00000000                dpt:		dd 0			; pointer to Disk Parameter Table			
  2142 00000131 00                      cursec:		db 0			; current sector
  2143 00000132 00                      curhd:		db 0			; current head
  2144 00000133 0000                    curtrk:		dw 0			; current track
  2145 00000135 0000                    spsav:		dw 0			; save the stack pointer
  2146 00000137 08                      formt_eot:	db 8			; eot used for format
  2147 00000138 00                      hdnum:		db 0			; head number
  2148 00000139 0000                    trknum:		dw 0			; track	being manipulated
  2149 0000013B 50                      gap_patch:	db 50h			; format gap patched into dpt
  2150

  2769                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)

  2801                                  
  2802                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2803                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2804                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2805                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2806

  2813 00000778 0E                      		push	cs
  2814 00000779 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2815

  2886                                  		;lds	si, [cs:HiMem]
  2887                                  		;les	di, [cs:LoMem]

  3145                                  
  3146                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  3147                                  
  3148                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  3149                                  ;
  3150                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  3151                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  3152                                  
  3153 00000832 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  3154                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  3155 00000834 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  3156 00000838 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  3157 0000083C 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  3158 00000840 [4408]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  3159 00000842 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  3160                                  
  3161                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  3162                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  3163                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  3164                                  
  3165 00000844 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  3166 00000848 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  3167 0000084A 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  3168 0000084E 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  3169 00000850 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  3170 00000852 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  3171 00000854 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  3172                                  
  3173                                  NextStack:
  3174                                  
  3175                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  3176                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  3177                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  3178                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  3179                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  3180                                  
  3181 00000856 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  3182 0000085A 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  3183 0000085C 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  3184 00000860 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks

  3192                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  3193                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about

  3196                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:
