  3198 00000868 06                      		push	es
  3199 00000869 53                      		push	bx
  3200 0000086A 50                      		push	ax
  3201 0000086B 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  3202 0000086D 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  3203 0000086F BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  3204 00000872 B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  3205 00000875 CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  3206                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3207                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  3208 00000877 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3209 00000879 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  3210 0000087B 740A                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  3211                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  3212 0000087D 0E                      		push	cs
  3213                                  		;;mov	ax,offset Skip
  3214                                  		;mov	ax,Skip
  3215                                  		;push	ax
  3216                                  		; 08/10/2023
  3217 0000087E 68[8708]                		push	Skip
  3218 00000881 06                      		push	es
  3219 00000882 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  3220 00000883 B80100                  		mov	ax,1		; SetFocus function number
  3221 00000886 CB                      		retf			; do the call
  3222                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3223                                  
  3224                                  Skip:

  3226 00000888 5B                      		pop	bx
  3227 00000889 07                      		pop	es
  3228 0000088A 5F                      		pop	di
  3229 0000088B CB                      		retf
  3230

  3501 00001269 46415431           
  3502 0000126D 3220202000              		db 32h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0
  3503 00001272 00                      		db 0
  3504                                  
  3505                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3506                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3507                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3508                                  
  3509                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3510                                  
  3511                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3512                                  ;
  3513                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3514                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3515                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3516                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3517                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3518                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3519                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3520                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3521                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3522                                  ;
  3523                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3524                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3525                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3526                                  ;
  3527                                  ;	uses:	
  3528                                  ;
  3529                                  ;
  3530                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3531                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3532                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3533                                  ;
  3534                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3535                                  
  3536                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3537                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3538                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3539                                  
  3540                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3541                                  
  3542                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3543                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3544                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3545                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3546                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3547                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3548                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3549                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3550                                  
  3551                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3552                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3553                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3554                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3555                                  
  3556                                  ; 30/12/2022
  3557                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:12DEh)
  3558                                  
  3559                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3560 00001273 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3561 00001276 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3562 00001278 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3563 0000127B 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3564 0000127D 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3565 00001280 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3566                                  atd1:
  3567 00001282 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3568                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3569                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3570                                  
  3571                                  atd2:					
  3572 00001287 53                      		push	bx
  3573 00001288 51                      		push	cx
  3574 00001289 52                      		push	dx
  3575 0000128A 57                      		push	di
  3576 0000128B 1E                      		push	ds
  3577 0000128C 06                      		push	es
  3578 0000128D 50                      		push	ax
  3579 0000128E B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3580                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3581 00001291 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3582                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3583 00001293 C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3584                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3585                                  					; initially no error code.
  3586 00001298 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3587 0000129B 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3588                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3589 0000129F 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3590                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3591 000012A1 C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3592 000012A6 EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3593                                  					; return
  3594                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3595                                  
  3596                                  atd3:					
  3597 000012A8 53                      		push	bx
  3598 000012A9 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3599 000012AB C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3600 000012AE 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3601 000012B0 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3602 000012B2 5B                      		pop	bx
  3603 000012B3 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3604 000012B6 0E                      		push	cs
  3605 000012B7 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3606 000012BA 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3607 000012BC 58                      		pop	ax
  3608 000012BD 50                      		push	ax
  3609 000012BE E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3610 000012C1 BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3611 000012C4 EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3612 000012C5 E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3613                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3614                                  
  3615                                  atd4:	
  3616                                  
  3617                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3618                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3619                                  				
  3620 000012C8 58                      		pop	ax
  3621                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3622 000012C9 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3623 000012CD 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3624 000012CF 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3625 000012D1 F9                      		stc
  3626                                  atd5:					
  3627 000012D2 07                      		pop	es
  3628 000012D3 1F                      		pop	ds
  3629 000012D4 5F                      		pop	di
  3630 000012D5 5A                      		pop	dx
  3631 000012D6 59                      		pop	cx
  3632 000012D7 5B                      		pop	bx
  3633 000012D8 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3634                                  
  3635                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3636                                  
  3637                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3638                                  ;
  3639                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3640                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3641                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3642                                  ;	
  3643                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3644                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3645                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3646                                  ;
  3647                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3648                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3649                                  ;
  3650                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3651                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3652                                  
  3653                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3654                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3655                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3656 000012DB A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3657                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3658 000012DE C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3659 000012E3 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3660 000012E6 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3661 000012E8 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3662                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3663                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3664                                  setc1:					
  3665 000012ED 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3666 000012EF 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3667                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3668                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3669 000012F1 A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3670 000012F4 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3671 000012F8 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3672 000012FA C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3673                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3674 000012FD A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3675 00001300 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3676 00001302 C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3677 00001305 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3678 00001308 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3679 0000130A 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3680                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3681 0000130C A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3682 0000130F 06                      		push	es
  3683 00001310 53                      		push	bx
  3684 00001311 0E                      		push	cs
  3685 00001312 E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3686 00001315 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3687                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3688 00001319 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3689                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3690 0000131C A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3691                                  					; only use low part
  3692 0000131F 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3693                                  					; control byte modifier
  3694 00001323 5B                      		pop	bx
  3695 00001324 07                      		pop	es
  3696                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3697 00001325 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3698 00001329 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3699 0000132C 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3700                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3701 0000132E 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3702 00001332 C3                      		retn
  3703                                  
  3704                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3705                                  
  3706                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3707                                  ;
  3708                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3709                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3710                                  ;
  3711                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3712                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3713                                  ;
  3714                                  ;	
  3715                                  ;
  3716                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3717                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3718                                  ;
  3719                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3720                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3721                                  
  3722                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3723 00001333 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3724 00001335 0E                      		push	cs
  3725 00001336 E84000                  		call	command
  3726 00001339 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3727                                  doc1:					
  3728 0000133B 0E                      		push	cs
  3729 0000133C E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3730 0000133F 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3731 00001341 B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3732 00001344 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3733 00001347 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3734 00001348 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3735                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3736                                  
  3737                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3738                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3739                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3740                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3741                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3742                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3743                                  ;
  3744                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3745                                  
  3746                                  rsct_loop:				
  3747 00001349 6D                      		insw
  3748 0000134A E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3749 0000134C FB                      		sti
  3750                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3751 0000134D F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3752                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3753                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3754 00001352 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3755 00001354 0E                      		push	cs
  3756 00001355 E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3757 00001358 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3758 0000135A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3759 0000135D BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3760 00001360 FA                      		cli
  3761 00001361 F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3762 00001363 FB                      		sti
  3763                                  doc2:					
  3764 00001364 0E                      		push	cs
  3765 00001365 E82900                  		call	check_status
  3766 00001368 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3767                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3768 0000136A FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3769 0000136E 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3770                                  doc3:					
  3771 00001370 C3                      		retn
  3772                                  
  3773                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3774                                  
  3775                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3776                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3777                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3778                                  
  3779                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3780                                  
  3781                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3782                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3783                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3784                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3785                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3786                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3787                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3788                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3789                                  
  3790                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3791                                  ;
  3792                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3793                                  ;
  3794                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3795                                  ;
  3796                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3797                                  ;
  3798                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3799                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3800                                  ;	
  3801                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3802                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3803                                  
  3804                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3805                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3806                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3807                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3808 00001371 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3809 00001374 EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3810                                  
  3811                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3812                                  
  3813                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3814                                  ;
  3815                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3816                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3817                                  ;
  3818                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3819                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3820                                  ;
  3821                                  ;
  3822                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3823                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3824                                  ;
  3825                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3826                                  
  3827                                  command:	; proc near		
  3828                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3829                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3830                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3831 00001379 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3832 0000137C EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3833                                  
  3834                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3835                                  
  3836                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3837                                  ;
  3838                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3839                                  ;
  3840                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3841                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3842                                  ;
  3843                                  ;
  3844                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3845                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3846                                  ;		
  3847                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3848                                  
  3849                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3850                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3851                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3852                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3853 00001381 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3854 00001384 EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3855                                  
  3856                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3857                                  
  3858                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3859                                  ;
  3860                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3861                                  ;
  3862                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3863                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3864                                  ;
  3865                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3866                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3867                                  
  3868                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3869                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3870                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3871                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3872 00001389 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3873 0000138C EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3874                                  
  3875                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3876                                  
  3877                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3878                                  ;
  3879                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3880                                  ;
  3881                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3882                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3883                                  ;
  3884                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3885                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3886                                  
  3887                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3888                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3889                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3890                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3891 00001391 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3892 00001394 EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3893                                  
  3894                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3895                                  
  3896                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3897                                  ;
  3898                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3899                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3900                                  ;
  3901                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3902                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3903                                  ;
  3904                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3905                                  
  3906                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3907                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3908                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3909                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3910 00001399 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3911 0000139C EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3912                                  
  3913                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3914                                  
  3915                                  endatrom:
  3916                                  
  3917                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3918                                  
  3919                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3920                                  ;;
  3921                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3922                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3923                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3924                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3925                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3926                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3927                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3928                                  
  3929                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3930 000013A1 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3931                                  					;
  3932                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3933                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3934                                  					;
  3935                                  					; warning!!!
  3936                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3937 000013A4 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3938                                  no_hookit:				
  3939                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3940                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3941 000013A6 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3942                                  
  3943                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3944                                  
  3945                                  mebbe_hookit:
  3946 000013AB 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3947 000013AE 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3948 000013B0 1E                      		push	ds
  3949                                  		
  3950                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3951                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  3952                                  		;push	ax
  3953                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  3954                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  3955                                  		;pop	ax
  3956 000013B1 6A40                    		push	40h
  3957 000013B3 1F                      		pop	ds
  3958                                  
  3959 000013B4 9C                      		pushf
  3960                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3961                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3962 000013B5 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3963 000013BA 1F                      		pop	ds
  3964 000013BB CA0200                  		retf	2
  3965                                  
  3966                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3967                                  
  3968 000013BE 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3969                                  
  3970                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3971                                  
  3972                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3973                                  %if 0  
  3974                                  
  3975                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3976                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3977                                  
  3978                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3979                                  
  3980                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3981                                  ;
  3982                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3983                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3984                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3985                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3986                                  
  3987                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3988                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3989                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3990                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3991                                  		jnb	short century20
  3992                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3993                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3994                                  		jmp	short years
  3995                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3996                                  		
  3997                                  century20:				
  3998                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3999                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  4000                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  4001                                  					; adjust daycnt
  4002                                  years:					
  4003                                  		xor	dx, dx
  4004                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  4005                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  4006                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  4007                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  4008                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  4009                                  		mov	bl, 4
  4010                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  4011                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  4012                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  4013                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  4014                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  4015                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  4016                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  4017                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  4018                                  regularyear:				
  4019                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  4020                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  4021                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  4022                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  4023                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  4024                                  					;
  4025                                  					; should never fall through loop
  4026                                  leapyear:				
  4027                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  4028                                  					; change month table.
  4029                                  yeardone:				
  4030                                  		xor	bx, bx
  4031                                  		xor	dx, dx
  4032                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  4033                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  4034                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  4035                                  		mov	cx, 12
  4036                                  months:					
  4037                                  		inc	bl
  4038                                  
  4039                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  4040                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  4041                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  4042                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  4043                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  4044                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  4045                                  		
  4046                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  4047                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  4048                                  					; dh=0
  4049                                  		jbe	short month_done
  4050                                  		inc	si		; next month
  4051                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  4052                                  		loop	months		;
  4053                                  					; should never fall through loop
  4054                                  month_done:				
  4055                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  4056                                  					; restore month table value
  4057                                  		mov	dl, bl
  4058                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  4059                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  4060                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4061                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  4062                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  4063                                  		xchg	dl, al
  4064                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4065                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  4066                                  		xchg	dh, al
  4067                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4068                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  4069                                  		xchg	cl, al
  4070                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4071                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  4072                                  		mov	ch, al
  4073                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  4074                                  		retf
  4075                                  
  4076                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  4077                                  
  4078                                  %endif
  4079                                  
  4080                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4081                                  
  4082                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4083                                  %if 0  
  4084                                  
  4085                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  4086                                  
  4087                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  4088                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  4089                                  		
  4090                                  		push	cx		
  4091                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  4092                                  		mov	cl, 4
  4093                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  4094                                  		or	al, ah
  4095                                  		pop	cx
  4096                                  		retf
  4097                                  %endif
  4098                                  
  4099                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4100                                  
  4101                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  4102                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  4103                                  
  4104                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  4105                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  4106                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  4107                                  
  4108                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  4109                                  
  4110                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4111                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  4112                                  int_6Ch:
  4113 000013BF 0E                      		push	cs
  4114 000013C0 1F                      		pop	ds
  4115                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  4116 000013C1 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  4117 000013C6 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  4118 000013C8 BB[8707]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  4119 000013CB FFD3                    		call    bx
  4120                                  int6c:					
  4121                                  		;push	cs
  4122                                  		;pop	ds
  4123 000013CD 8F06[AA06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  4124 000013D1 8F06[AC06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  4125 000013D5 9D                      		popf
  4126 000013D6 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  4127 000013D9 FA                      		cli
  4128 000013DA 8936[E904]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  4129 000013DE FB                      		sti
  4130 000013DF E8B900                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  4131 000013E2 FA                      		cli
  4132 000013E3 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  4133 000013E5 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  4134                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  4135                                  					; Return: time of day set
  4136 000013E7 FB                      		sti
  4137                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  4138                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4139 000013E8 FF2E[AA06]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  4140                                  
  4141                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4142                                  
  4143                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  4144                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  4145                                  
  4146                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  4147 000013EC 50                      		push	ax
  4148 000013ED 51                      		push	cx
  4149 000013EE 52                      		push	dx
  4150 000013EF 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  4151 000013F1 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  4152                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  4153                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  4154                                  					; midnight
  4155                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4156 000013F3 5A                      		pop	dx
  4157 000013F4 59                      		pop	cx
  4158 000013F5 58                      		pop	ax
  4159 000013F6 50                      		push	ax
  4160 000013F7 53                      		push	bx
  4161 000013F8 51                      		push	cx
  4162 000013F9 52                      		push	dx
  4163                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4164                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4165                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:187Ah
  4166 000013FA C706[B206]0100          		mov	word [daycnt2], 1
  4167                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4168 00001400 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4169 00001402 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4170                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4171                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4172                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4173                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4174 00001404 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4175 00001406 E98300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4176                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4177                                  
  4178                                  read_ok:
  4179 00001409 882E[AE06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4180 0000140D 880E[AF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4181 00001411 8836[B006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4182 00001415 8816[B106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4183                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4184                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4185                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 2
  4186 00001419 FE06[B206]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 2
  4187 0000141D E83401                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4188 00001420 726A                    		jb	short r_d_ret	; some value out of range
  4189                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4190                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4191                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 3
  4192 00001422 FE06[B206]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 3
  4193 00001426 E8DB00                  		call	date_verify
  4194 00001429 7261                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4195                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4196                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4197 0000142B C606[B206]00            		mov	byte [daycnt2], 0
  4198 00001430 E8A100                  		call	in_bin
  4199 00001433 A0[AF06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4200 00001436 98                      		cbw
  4201 00001437 803E[AE06]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4202 0000143C 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4203 0000143E 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4204                                  century_19:				
  4205 00001441 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4206 00001444 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4207 00001446 F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4208 00001448 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4209 0000144A 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4210 0000144B B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4211                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4212 0000144E F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4213                                  		;mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4214                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4215 00001450 A3[B206]                		mov	[daycnt2], ax
  4216 00001453 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4217 00001455 98                      		cbw
  4218 00001456 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4219 00001458 740B                    		jz	short leap_year
  4220 0000145A B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4221 0000145D F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4222                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4223                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4224 0000145F 0106[B206]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4225 00001463 EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4226                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4227                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4228                                  
  4229                                  leap_year:
  4230 00001465 803E[B006]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4231 0000146A 7604                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4232                                  leap_adjustment:
  4233                                  		;inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4234                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4235 0000146C FF06[B206]              		inc	word [daycnt2]
  4236                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4237 00001470 8A0E[B106]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4238 00001474 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4239 00001476 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4240                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4241                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4242 00001477 010E[B206]              		add	[daycnt2], cx
  4243 0000147B 8A0E[B006]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4244                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4245                                  		;xor	ch, ch
  4246 0000147F 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4247                                  		
  4248                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4249                                  		;shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4250                                  		;;mov	si, month_table
  4251                                  		;add	si, cx
  4252                                  		;; 16/10/2022
  4253                                  		;; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4254                                  		;; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4255                                  		;; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4256                                  		;; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4257                                  		;mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4258                                  		;			; get #	days in	previous months
  4259                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4260                                  
  4261                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4262                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1907h
  4263 00001480 B400                    		mov	ah, 0
  4264 00001482 BE[EF04]                		mov	si, month_tab
  4265                                  r_d_sum_loop:
  4266 00001485 AC                      		lodsb
  4267 00001486 0106[B206]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4268 0000148A E2F9                    		loop	r_d_sum_loop
  4269                                  r_d_ret:
  4270                                  		;mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  4271                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4272 0000148C 8B36[B206]              		mov	si, [daycnt2]
  4273 00001490 5A                      		pop	dx
  4274 00001491 59                      		pop	cx
  4275 00001492 5B                      		pop	bx
  4276 00001493 58                      		pop	ax
  4277 00001494 C3                      		retn
  4278                                  
  4279                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4280                                  
  4281                                  r_t_retj:				
  4282 00001495 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4283 00001497 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4284 00001499 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4285                                  
  4286                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4287                                  
  4288                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4289                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4290                                  
  4291                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4292 0000149B B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4293 0000149D CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4294                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4295                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4296                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4297 0000149F 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4298 000014A1 882E[AE06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4299 000014A5 880E[AF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4300 000014A9 8836[B006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4301 000014AD C606[B106]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4302 000014B2 E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4303 000014B5 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4304 000014B7 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4305 000014BA 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4306 000014BC E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4307 000014BF 8A2E[AE06]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4308 000014C3 8A0E[AF06]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4309 000014C7 8A36[B006]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4310 000014CB 8A16[B106]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4311                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4312                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4313                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4314 000014CF FF1E[B806]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4315                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4316                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4317                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4318                                  r_t_ret:				
  4319 000014D3 C3                      		retn
  4320                                  
  4321                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4322                                  
  4323                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4324                                  
  4325                                  in_bin:		; proc near
  4326 000014D4 A0[AE06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4327 000014D7 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4328 000014DA A2[AE06]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4329 000014DD A0[AF06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4330 000014E0 E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4331 000014E3 A2[AF06]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4332 000014E6 A0[B006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4333 000014E9 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4334 000014EC A2[B006]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4335 000014EF A0[B106]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4336 000014F2 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4337 000014F5 A2[B106]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4338 000014F8 C3                      		retn
  4339                                  
  4340                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4341                                  
  4342                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4343                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4344                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4345                                  
  4346                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  4347 000014F9 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4348 000014FB 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4349 000014FD B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4350 000014FF D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4351 00001501 D50A                    		aad
  4352 00001503 C3                      		retn
  4353                                  
  4354                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4355                                  
  4356                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4357                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4358                                  
  4359                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  4360 00001504 803E[AE06]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4361 00001509 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4362 0000150B 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4363 0000150D 803E[AE06]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4364                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4365                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4366 00001512 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4367 00001514 803E[AF06]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4368                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4369                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4370 00001519 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4371                                  century_20:
  4372 0000151B 803E[AF06]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4373 00001520 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4374 00001522 803E[B006]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4375 00001527 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4376 00001529 803E[B006]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4377                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4378 0000152E 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4379 00001530 803E[B106]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4380 00001535 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4381                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4382                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4383                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4384                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4385                                  		; cf=0
  4386                                  		;clc
  4387                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4388 00001537 803E[B106]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4389 0000153C C3                      		retn
  4390                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4391                                  
  4392                                  date_error:
  4393 0000153D F9                      		stc
  4394                                  date_err2:
  4395 0000153E C3                      		retn
  4396                                  
  4397                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4398                                  
  4399                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4400                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4401                                  
  4402                                  time_verify:	; proc near
  4403 0000153F 803E[AE06]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4404 00001544 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4405 00001546 803E[AF06]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4406 0000154B 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4407                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4408                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4409                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4410                                  		;clc
  4411                                  		;retn
  4412                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4413 0000154D 803E[B006]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4414                                  time_error:
  4415                                  bv_error:
  4416 00001552 F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4417 00001553 C3                      		retn
  4418                                  
  4419                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4420                                  
  4421                                  ;time_error:				
  4422                                  		;stc
  4423                                  		;retn
  4424                                  
  4425                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4426                                  
  4427                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4428                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4429                                  
  4430                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  4431 00001554 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4432 00001557 BB[AE06]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4433                                  bv_loop:
  4434 0000155A 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4435 0000155C 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4436 0000155E 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4437                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4438 00001561 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4439 00001563 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4440 00001565 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4441 00001567 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4442 00001569 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4443 0000156B D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4444 0000156D 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4445 00001570 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4446 00001573 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4447 00001575 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4448 00001576 49                      		dec	cx
  4449 00001577 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4450 00001579 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4451 0000157A C3                      		retn
  4452                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4453                                  
  4454                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4455                                  ;bv_error:
  4456                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4457                                  		;retn
  4458                                  
  4459                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4460                                  
  4461                                  endk09:

  4463                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4464                                  
  4465                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4466                                  ;									:
  4467                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4468                                  ;									:
  4469                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4470                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4471                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4472                                  ;									:
  4473                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4474                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4475                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4476                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4477                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4478                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4479                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4480                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4481                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4482                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4483                                  ;		this program.						:
  4484                                  ;									:
  4485                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4486                                  
  4487                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4488                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4489                                  
  4490                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  4491                                  
  4492                                  ; 22/12/2022
  4493 0000157B 90                      align 2
  4494                                  		;db 90h
  4495                                  
  4496                                  ; 30/12/2022
  4497                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:16D6h)
  4498                                  
  4499 0000157C 0000                    drvfat:		dw 0			; drive	and fat	id of dos
  4500 0000157E 0000                    bios_l:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (low word)
  4501 00001580 0000                    bios_h:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (high word)
  4502 00001582 0000                    doscnt:		dw 0			; how many sectors to read
  4503 00001584 00                      fbigfat:	db 0			; flags	for drive
  4504 00001585 0000                    fatloc:		dw 0			; seg addr of fat sector
  4505 00001587 0000                    init_bootseg:	dw 0			; seg addr of buffer for reading boot record
  4506 00001589 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  4507 0000158A 0002                    md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.

  4746                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  4747                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  4748                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  4749                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  4750                                  ;
  4751                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  4752                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  4753                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  4754                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  4755                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  4756                                  ;	  and a retf
  4757                                  
  4758                                  ; 16/10/2022
  4759                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  4760                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4761                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  4762                                  
  4763                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  4764                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  4765 00001613 [CA00]                  		dw BC_RETF
  4766                                  
  4767                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4768                                  
  4769                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  4770 00001615 2EFF36[1316]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  4771                                  					; set up near return to far return
  4772 0000161A 2EFF36[B606]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  4773 0000161F 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  4774 00001620 CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  4775
