  9953                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9954                                  ;								:
  9955                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9956                                  ;								:
  9957                                  ;								:
  9958                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9959                                  ;								:
  9960                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9961                                  ;								:
  9962                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9963                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9964                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9965                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9966                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9967                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9968                                  ;								:
  9969                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9970                                  ;								:
  9971                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9972                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9973                                  ;								:
  9974                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9975                                  
  9976                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9977                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9978                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9979                                  
  9980                                  ;19/07/2019
  9981                                  ;09/03/2019
  9982                                  
  9983                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9984                                  
  9985                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9986                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9987                                  
  9988 0000038A B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9989 0000038C F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9990 0000038E B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9991 00000390 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9992 00000392 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9993 00000395 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9994 00000397 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9995 00000399 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9996 0000039B B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9997 0000039D F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9998 0000039F 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9999 000003A1 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
 10000 000003A4 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
 10001 000003A6 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
 10002 000003A8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
 10003                                  
 10004                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
 10005                                  
 10006 000003AB 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
 10007 000003AC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
 10008 000003AD BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
 10009 000003B0 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
 10010 000003B2 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
 10011 000003B4 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
 10012 000003B5 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
 10013 000003B7 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
 10014 000003B9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
 10015 000003BC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
 10016 000003BD BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
 10017 000003C0 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
 10018 000003C2 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 10019 000003C4 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
 10020 000003C6 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
 10021 000003C8 98                      		cbw
 10022 000003C9 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
 10023 000003CA F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
 10024 000003CC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
 10025 000003CE CB                      		retf			; far return
 10026

 10034                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
 10035                                  ;
 10036                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
 10037                                  ;
 10038                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
 10039                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
 10040                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
 10041                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
 10042                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
 10043                                  ;
 10044                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
 10045                                  ;
 10046                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
 10047                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
 10048                                  ;	See ptime.asm.

 10057                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.

 10059                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0

 10063                                  					; convert to bcd
 10064                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
 10065                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
 10066                                  		; 08/08/2023

 10076                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd

 10078

 10080 000003F5 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
 10081 000003F7 FA                      		cli

 10084                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
 10085                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
 10086                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
 10087 000003FC FB                      		sti
 10088                                  no_cmos_1:

 10090 00000401 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
 10091                                  		; 17/10/2022

 10093                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
 10094                                  					; convert time to ticks

 10117                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
 10118                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)

 10133                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.

 10136                                  daycnttoday:	; proc near
 10137                                  
 10138                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
 10139                                  ;
 10140                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
 10141                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
 10142                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
 10143                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
 10144                                  
 10145                                  		; 20/12/2023
 10146                                  
 10147                                  		; 08/08/2023 (ds:) (near proc)
 10148                                  		; 16/10/2022 (cs:) (far proc)		
 10149 00000424 FF36[E904]              		push	word [daycnt] ; save daycnt
 10150 00000428 813E[E904]891C          		cmp	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
 10151                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
 10152 0000042E 7308                    		jnb	short century20
 10153                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 19
 10154                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 80
 10155                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10156 00000430 C706[ED04]1350          		mov	word [base_century], 5013h
 10157 00000436 EB0C                    		jmp	short years

 10166                                  					; adjust daycnt
 10167                                  years:

 10169 00000446 A1[E904]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]

 10171                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
 10172 0000044C F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
 10173 0000044E 8916[E904]              		mov	[daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
 10174 00000452 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
 10175 00000454 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
 10176 00000456 0006[EE04]              		add	[base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
 10177 0000045A FF06[E904]              		inc	word [daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
 10178                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10179 0000045E BB6E01                  		mov	bx, 366
 10180 00000461 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3
 10181                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 366 ; daycnt=remainder of leap year
 10182 00000464 391E[E904]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
 10183 00000468 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
 10184 0000046A FE06[EE04]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
 10185                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
 10186 0000046E 291E[E904]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
 10187                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
 10188                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10189 00000472 4B                      		dec	bx ; 365
 10190                                  regularyear:	; 20/12/2023 (BugFix)
 10191                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 365 ; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365; i++)
 10192 00000473 391E[E904]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
 10193 00000477 760F                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
 10194 00000479 FE06[EE04]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; { daycnt -=	365
 10195                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }
 10196 0000047D 291E[E904]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
 10197 00000481 E2F0                    		loop	regularyear	; }
 10198                                  					;
 10199                                  					; should never fall through loop
 10200                                  leapyear:	
 10201 00000483 C606[F004]1D            		mov	byte [february], 29 ; 08/08/2023			
 10202                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
 10203                                  					; change month table.
 10204                                  yeardone:

 10206 0000048A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10207 0000048C A1[E904]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
 10208                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
 10209 0000048F BE[EF04]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
 10210                                  		;mov	cx, 12
 10211                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10212 00000492 B10C                    		mov	cl, 12
 10213                                  months:					
 10214 00000494 FEC3                    		inc	bl
 10215                                  		; 08/08/2023

 10218                                  					; dh=0

 10228 000004A6 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
 10229 000004A8 8A36[EE04]              		mov	dh, [base_year]

 10232                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month

 10234 000004B5 E81100                  		call	bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
 10235 000004B8 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al

 10244                                  
 10245                                  bintobcd:	; proc near		; real time clock support
 10246                                  
 10247                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
 10248                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
 10249                                  		
 10250 000004C9 D40A                    		aam			; AH = AL/10, AL = AL MOD 10
 10251 000004CB D510                    		aad     10h             ; db 0D5h,10h
 10252                                  					; AL = (AH*10H)+AL, AH = 0
 10253 000004CD C3                      		retn
 10254                                  %endif

 10256                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10257                                  
 10258                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10259                                  
 10260                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10261                                  ; gettime reads date and time
 10262                                  ; and returns the following information:
 10263                                  ;
 10264                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
 10265                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
 10266                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
 10267                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
 10268                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
 10269                                  ;
 10270                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
 10271                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
 10272                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
 10273                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10274                                  
 10275                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
 10276 000004CE E84A00                  		call	GetTickCnt
 10277 000004D1 8B36[E904]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
 10278                                  
 10279                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
 10280                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
 10281                                  ;
 10282                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
 10283                                  ;	       ----------------
 10284                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
 10285                                  ;
 10286                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
 10287                                  ;
 10288                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
 10289                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
 10290                                  ;		1,193,180
 10291                                  ;
 10292                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
 10293                                  ;
 10294                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
 10295                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
 10296                                  ;		59,659
 10297                                  ;
 10298                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
 10299                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
 10300                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
 10301                                  ;
 10302                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
 10303                                  ; multiply by 5
 10304                                  
 10305 000004D5 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 10306 000004D7 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
 10307                                  					; multiply by 5
 10308 000004D9 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 10309 000004DB D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
 10310 000004DD D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 10311 000004DF D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
 10312 000004E1 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
 10313 000004E3 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
 10314 000004E5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
 10315                                  
 10316                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
 10317                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
 10318                                  
 10319 000004E6 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
 10320 000004E9 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
 10321                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
 10322                                  
 10323                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 10324                                  		;mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
 10325 000004EB 93                      		xchg	bx, ax
 10326 000004EC 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
 10327 000004EE F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
 10328                                  
 10329                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
 10330                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
 10331                                  
 10332 000004F0 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
 10333 000004F2 B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		; extract 1/100's
 10334                                  
 10335                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
 10336                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
 10337                                  
 10338 000004F5 F7F1                    		div	cx
 10339 000004F7 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
 10340 000004FA 7203                    		jb	short noadj
 10341 000004FC 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
 10342                                  noadj:					
 10343 000004FF F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
 10344 00000500 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
 10345                                  
 10346                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
 10347                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
 10348                                  
 10349 00000502 D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
 10350 00000504 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
 10351 00000506 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
 10352                                  		;mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
 10353                                  		; 20/12/2023
 10354 00000508 B13C                    		mov	cl, 60
 10355 0000050A F7F1                    		div	cx
 10356 0000050C 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
 10357 0000050E F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
 10358 00000510 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
 10359                                  
 10360                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
 10361                                  
 10362                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10363                                  		;push	ax
 10364                                  		;mov	ax, si		; daycnt
 10365 00000512 96                      		xchg	ax, si
 10366 00000513 AB                      		stosw
 10367                                  		;pop	ax
 10368 00000514 96                      		xchg	ax, si		; al = hours, ah = minutes
 10369 00000515 AB                      		stosw
 10370 00000516 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
 10371 00000518 AB                      		stosw
 10372 00000519 F8                      		clc			; [es:di] = count of days since 1-1-80
 10373                                  					;   [es:di+2] = hours
 10374                                  					;   [es:di+3] = minutes
 10375                                  					;   [es:di+4] = seconds
 10376                                  					;   [es:di+5] = hundredths of seconds
 10377 0000051A C3                      		retn
 10378                                  
 10379                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10380                                  
 10381                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10382                                  
 10383                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10384                                  ;
 10385                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
 10386                                  ;
 10387                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
 10388                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
 10389                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
 10390                                  ;
 10391                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
 10392                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
 10393                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
 10394                                  ;			else
 10395                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
 10396                                  ;		}
 10397                                  ;
 10398                                  ; USES : AX
 10399                                  ;
 10400                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
 10401                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
 10402                                  ;
 10403                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10404                                  
 10405                                  		; 17/10/2022
 10406                                  GetTickCnt:	
 10407 0000051B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 10408 0000051D CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
 10409                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
 10410                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
 10411                                  					; midnight
 10412                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
 10413                                  		; 20/12/2023
 10414 0000051F 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 10415 00000521 3826[EB04]              		cmp	byte [t_switch], ah ; 0
 10416                                  		;cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
 10417 00000525 7505                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
 10418                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
 10419                                  					; and not flag
 10420 00000527 0106[E904]              		add	[daycnt], ax
 10421 0000052B C3                      		retn
 10422                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10423                                  
 10424                                  inc_case:
 10425 0000052C 08C0                    		or	al, al
 10426 0000052E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
 10427 00000530 FF06[E904]              		inc	word [daycnt]
 10428                                  no_rollover:
 10429 00000534 C3                      		retn
 10430

 10459                                  ;	disk interface routines
 10460                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
 10461                                  
 10462                                  ; device attribute bits:
 10463                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
 10464                                  
 10465                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
 10466                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
 10467                                  
 10468                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
 10469                                  
 10470                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
 10471                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
 10472                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
 10473                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
 10474                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
 10475                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
 10476                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
 10477                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
 10478                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
 10479                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
 10480                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
 10481                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
 10482                                  ; we reset the counter.
 10483                                  
 10484                                  accessmax	equ	5
 10485                                  
 10486                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
 10487                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
 10488                                  ;
 10489                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
 10490                                  ;   if it is 0, then
 10491                                  ;	set slow = 15
 10492                                  ;   else
 10493                                  ;	set slow = value
 10494                                  ;   ...
 10495                                  ;*********************************************
 10496                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
 10497                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
 10498                                  ;*	 use slow
 10499                                  ;*   else
 10500                                  ;*	 use fast
 10501                                  ;*********************************************
 10502                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
 10503                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
 10504                                  ;	use slow
 10505                                  ;   else
 10506                                  ;	use fast
 10507                                  ;   ...
 10508                                  ;   restore current head settle value
 10509                                  ;
 10510                                  ;
 10511                                  ;---------------------------------------
 10512                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
 10513                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
 10514                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
 10515                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
 10516                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
 10517                                  
 10518                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
 10519                                  
 10520                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10521                                  
 10522                                  ; BIOSCODE:04A2h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)

 10596                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10597                                  
 10598                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10599                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
 10600                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
 10601                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
 10602                                  ;
 10603                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
 10604                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10605                                  
 10606                                  SetDrive:	
 10607                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
 10608 0000056A C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
 10609                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
 10610 0000056E 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
 10611 00000572 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
 10612 00000574 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
 10613 00000577 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 10614 0000057A 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
 10615 0000057C F9                      		stc
 10616                                  X_SetDrv:				
 10617 0000057D C3                      		retn
 10618                                  
 10619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10620                                  
 10621                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10622                                  
 10623                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
 10624                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
 10625                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
 10626                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
 10627                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
 10628                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
 10629                                  
 10630                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
 10631 0000057E E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
 10632 00000581 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
 10633 00000584 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10634                                  					; fchanged_by_format
 10635 00000589 7415                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
 10636                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10637 0000058B 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
 10638                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FEFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10639                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag
 10640 00000590 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 10641                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
 10642 00000595 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10643                                  					; fnon_removable
 10644 0000059A 740B                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy
 10645                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; Indicate media changed
 10646                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10647 0000059C F7DE                    		neg	si		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:05E0h
 10648 0000059E EB2B                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
 10649                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10650                                  
 10651                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:
 10652                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable			
 10653 000005A0 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10654 000005A5 7524                    		jnz	short Media_Done
 10655                                  wehaveafloppy:				
 10656                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0	; Presume "I don't know"
 10657                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10658 000005A7 4E                      		dec	si ; 0 		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:05EBh
 10659                                  
 10660                                  		; If we have a floppy with changeline support, we ask the ROM
 10661                                  		; to determine if media has changed. We do not perform the
 10662                                  		; 2 second check for these drives.
 10663                                  
 10664 000005A8 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; Do we	have changeline	support?
 10665 000005AD 740A                    		jz	short mChk_NoChangeLine	; Brif not
 10666 000005AF E85512                  		call	mediacheck	;  Call	into removable routine
 10667 000005B2 7236                    		jb	short err_exitj
 10668 000005B4 E8A513                  		call	haschange
 10669 000005B7 7512                    		jnz	short Media_Done
 10670                                  mChk_NoChangeLine:
 10671                                  		; If we come here, we have a floppy with no changeline support
 10672                                  			
 10673 000005B9 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; Presume no change
 10674 000005BC A0[1E01]                		mov	al, [tim_drv]	; Last drive accessed
 10675 000005BF 263A4504                		cmp	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10676                                  					; Is drive of last access the same?
 10677 000005C3 7505                    		jnz	short Media_Unk	; No, then "i don't know"
 10678 000005C5 E82800                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 10679 000005C8 EB01                    		jmp	short Media_Done
 10680                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10681                                  
 10682                                  Media_Unk:				
 10683 000005CA 4E                      		dec	si		; ; Return "I don't know"
 10684                                  
 10685                                  		; SI now contains the correct value for media change.
 10686                                  		; Clean up the left overs
 10687                                  Media_Done:	
 10688                                  		; 19/10/2022			
 10689 000005CB 06                      		push	es
 10690 000005CC C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 10691 000005D0 2689770E                		mov	[es:bx+0Eh], si	; [es:bx+trans]
 10692 000005D4 07                      		pop	es
 10693 000005D5 09F6                    		or	si, si
 10694 000005D7 790F                    		jns	short ret_carry_clear ;	volidok
 10695 000005D9 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 10696 000005DE 7403                    		jz	short mChk1_NoChangeLine ; Brif	no changeline support
 10697 000005E0 E80B13                  		call	media_set_vid
 10698                                  mChk1_NoChangeLine:			
 10699 000005E3 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 10700                                  					; Make sure we ask rom for media check
 10701                                  ret_carry_clear:			
 10702 000005E8 F8                      		clc			; volidok
 10703 000005E9 C3                      		retn
 10704                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10705                                  
 10706                                  err_exitj:				
 10707 000005EA E85E06                  		call	maperror	; guaranteed to	set carry
 10708                                  ret81:					
 10709 000005ED B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; return error status
 10710 000005EF C3                      		retn			; return with carry set
 10711                                  
 10712                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10713                                  
 10714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10715                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
 10716                                  ; drive.
 10717                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
 10718                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
 10719                                  ; returns in si:
 10720                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
 10721                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
 10722                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
 10723                                  ;
 10724                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
 10725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10726                                  
 10727                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10728                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
 10729 000005F0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
 10730 000005F3 E825FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
 10731 000005F6 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10732                                  					; get stored time
 10733 000005FA 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
 10734 000005FC 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10735 00000600 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
 10736                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10737                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0646h
 10738                                  		;mov	al, [accesscount]
 10739 00000602 7515                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
 10740 00000604 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
 10741 00000606 750C                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
 10742                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10743                                  		;inc	al
 10744                                  		;cmp	al, 5
 10745                                  		;;inc	byte [accesscount]
 10746                                  		;;cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
 10747                                  		;			; if count is less than threshold, ok
 10748                                  		;jb	short timecheck_ret
 10749                                  		;;dec	byte [accesscount] ; don't let the count wrap
 10750                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10751                                  		;dec	al
 10752                                  		;jmp	short timecheck_unk ; "i don't know" if media changed
 10753                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10754 00000608 803E[1D01]04            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 4
 10755 0000060D 730A                    		jnb	short timecheck_unk
 10756 0000060F FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
 10757 00000613 C3                      		retn
 10758                                  
 10759                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10760                                  
 10761                                  timepassed:
 10762 00000614 83FA24                  		cmp	dx, 36		; 18*2 ; 18.2 tics per second.
 10763                                  					; min elapsed time? (2 seconds)
 10764 00000617 7601                    		jbe	short timecheck_ret ; yes, presume no change
 10765                                  
 10766                                  		; everything indicates that we do not know what has happened.
 10767                                  timecheck_unk:				
 10768 00000619 4E                      		dec	si		; presume i don't know
 10769                                  timecheck_ret:
 10770                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10771                                  		;mov	[accesscount], al
 10772 0000061A C3                      		retn
 10773                                  
 10774                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10775                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10776                                  Err_Exitj2:
 10777 0000061B EBCD                    		jmp	short err_exitj
 10778                                  
 10779                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10780                                  
 10781                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10782                                  
 10783                                  ; ==========================================================================
 10784                                  ; Build a valid bpb for the disk in the drive.
 10785                                  ; ==========================================================================
 10786                                  
 10787                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10788                                  get_bpb:				; 2C7h:592h = 70h:2B02h
 10789 0000061D 268A25                  		mov	ah, [es:di]	; get fat id byte read by dos
 10790 00000620 E847FF                  		call	SetDrive	; get the correct bds for the drive
 10791 00000623 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10792                                  					; fnon_removable
 10793 00000628 7523                    		jnz	short already_gotbpb ; no need to build	for fixed disks
 10794                                  
 10795                                  		; let's set the default value for volid,vol_serial,
 10796                                  		; filesys_id in bds table
 10797                                  
 10798 0000062A E83700                  		call	clear_ids
 10799                                  		;mov	ds:set_id_flag,	1 ; indicate to	set system id in bds
 10800 0000062D C606[FB04]01            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 1
 10801 00000632 E85B00                  		call	GetBp		; build	a bpb if necessary
 10802 00000635 72B6                    		jb	short ret81
 10803                                  		;cmp	ds:set_id_flag,	2 ; already, volume_label set from boot

 10940                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10941                                  ;	getbp - return bpb from the drive specified by the bds.
 10942                                  ;	    if the return_fake_bpb flag is set, then it does nothing.
 10943                                  ;	    note that we never come here for fixed disks.
 10944                                  ;	    for all other cases,
 10945                                  ;	      - it reads boot sector to pull out the bpb
 10946                                  ;	      - if no valid bpb is found, it then reads the fat sector,
 10947                                  ;		to get the fat id byte to build the bpb from there.
 10948                                  ;
 10949                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds.
 10950                                  ;
 10951                                  ;   outputs:	fills in bpb in current bds if valid bpb or fat id on disk.
 10952                                  ;		carry set, and al=7 if invalid disk.
 10953                                  ;		carry set and error code in al if other error.
 10954                                  ;		if failed to recognize the boot record, then will set the
 10955                                  ;		set_id_flag to 0.
 10956                                  ;		this routine will only work for a floppy diskette.
 10957                                  ;		     for a fixed disk, it will just return.
 10958                                  ;
 10959                                  ;	****** Note: getbp is a clone of getbp which uses the newer
 10960                                  ;	  segment definitions. It should be migrated towards.
 10961                                  ;	   now es:di has the bds, ds: has Bios_Data
 10962                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 11158                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11159                                  
 11160                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11161                                  
 11162                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 11163                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
 11164                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
 11165                                  ;
 11166                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
 11167                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 11168                                  
 11169                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11170                                  
 11171                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 11172                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE:06C3h)
 11173                                  
 11174                                  readbootsec:	
 11175 00000740 B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
 11176 00000742 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
 11177 00000745 E8BF00                  		call	read_sector
 11178 00000748 7243                    		jb	short err_ret
 11179 0000074A 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
 11180                                  
 11181                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
 11182                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
 11183                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
 11184                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
 11185                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
 11186                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
 11187                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
 11188                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
 11189                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
 11190                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
 11191                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
 11192                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
 11193                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
 11194                                  		; informations
 11195                                  
 11196                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
 11197                                  
 11198                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11199                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11200                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
 11201                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
 11202                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
 11203                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
 11204                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
 11205                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 11206                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 11207                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 11208                                  
 11209                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 11210 0000074C A0[4E01]                		mov	al, [disksector]
 11211 0000074F 3C69                    		cmp	al, 69h		; is it a direct jump?
 11212 00000751 740F                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 11213                                  					; don't need to find a nop
 11214 00000753 3CE9                    		cmp	al, 0E9h	; dos 2.0 jump?
 11215 00000755 740B                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 11216                                  					; no need for nop
 11217 00000757 3CEB                    		cmp	al, 0EBh	; how about a short jump?
 11218 00000759 7530                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 11219 0000075B 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 11220 00000760 7529                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 11221                                  
 11222                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11223                                  ;
 11224                                  ;; 10/03/2019
 11225                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
 11226                                  ;;
 11227                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
 11228                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
 11229                                  ;;
 11230                                  ;;check_signature:
 11231                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
 11232                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
 11233                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if singled sided medium.
 11234                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
 11235                                  
 11236                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
 11237                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
 11238                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 11239                                  
 11240                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11241                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:
 11242 00000762 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 11243                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 11244 00000765 50                      		push	ax ; 02/09/2023
 11245 00000766 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 11246 00000768 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 11247 0000076A 58                      		pop	ax ; 02/09/2023
 11248 0000076B 751E                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 11249                                  
 11250                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 11251                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 11252                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 11253                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 11254                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 11255                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 11256                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 11257                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 11258                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 11259                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 11260                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 11261                                  
 11262                                  checksinglesided:
 11263                                  		;mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 11264                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11265                                  		; al = [disksector+15h]
 11266 0000076D 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 11267 0000076F 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 11268 00000771 A801                    		test	al, 1
 11269 00000773 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 11270 00000775 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 11271 0000077B 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 11272 0000077D 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 11273 00000782 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 11274                                  
 11275                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 11276                                  
 11277                                  mustbeearlier:				
 11278 00000784 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 11279                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 11280 00000789 EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
 11281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11282                                  
 11283                                  invalidbootsec:				
 11284 0000078B 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
 11285                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11286                                  movbpb_ret:
 11287                                  gooddsk:				
 11288 0000078C F8                      		clc
 11289                                  err_ret:
 11290 0000078D C3                      		retn
 11291                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11292                                  
 11293                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11294                                  ;err_ret:				
 11295                                  		;retn
 11296                                  
 11297                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11298                                  
 11299                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11300                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11301                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 11302                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 11303                                  ;
 11304                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 11305                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 11306                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 11307                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 11308                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 11309                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 11310                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11311                                  
 11312                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11313                                  
 11314                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11315                                  movbpb:	
 11316 0000078E 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
 11317                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 11318                                  					; sectors per unit
 11319 00000792 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 11320                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 11321                                  					; number of directory entries
 11322 00000796 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 11323                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 11324                                  					; size of drive
 11325 0000079A 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 11326                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 11327                                  					; media	descriptor
 11328 0000079E A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 11329                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 11330                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 11331 000007A1 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 11332                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 11333                                  					; sectors per track
 11334 000007A5 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 11335                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 11336                                  					; number of heads
 11337 000007A9 803E[FB04]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
 11338 000007AE 75DC                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 11339 000007B0 E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
 11340 000007B3 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
 11341 000007B5 C606[FB04]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
 11342                                  movbpb_conv:				
 11343 000007BA 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
 11344 000007BF 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 11345 000007C1 E89211                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.
 11346                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11347                                  		; cf = 0
 11348                                  ;movbpb_ret:				
 11349                                  		;clc
 11350 000007C4 C3                      		retn
 11351                                  
 11352                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11353                                  
 11354                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 11355                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 11356                                  ;by es:di.
 11357                                  
 11358                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 11359                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 11360                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 11361                                  ;      the boot record information.
 11362                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 11363                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 11364                                  
 11365                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11366                                  mov_media_ids:		
 11367 000007C5 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 11368                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 11369                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 11370 000007CA 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
 11371 000007CC 51                      		push	cx
 11372 000007CD 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
 11373                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 11374 000007D1 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 11375 000007D5 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 11376                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 11377 000007D9 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 11378 000007DD 57                      		push	di
 11379 000007DE 56                      		push	si
 11380 000007DF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 11381 000007E2 BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
 11382                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
 11383                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL
 11384 000007E5 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 11385 000007E8 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11386                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 11387                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11388 000007EA B108                    		mov	cl, 8 ; cx = 8
 11389 000007EC BE[8401]                		mov	si, disksector+36h
 11390                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID
 11391 000007EF 83C705                  		add	di, 5		; (BDS.filesys_id-BDS.volid)-size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 11392 000007F2 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11393 000007F4 5E                      		pop	si
 11394 000007F5 5F                      		pop	di
 11395 000007F6 59                      		pop	cx
 11396                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11397                                  		; cf = 0
 11398                                  		;clc		; this clc is not required (16/06/2019 - Erdogan Tan)
 11399                                  				; (20/09/2022)
 11400 000007F7 C3                      		retn
 11401                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11402                                  
 11403                                  mmi_not_ext:				
 11404 000007F8 F9                      		stc
 11405 000007F9 C3                      		retn
 11406                                  
 11407                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11408                                  
 11409                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11410                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 11411                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 11412                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 11413                                  ; output:
 11414                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 11415                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 11416                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 11417                                  
 11418                                  readfat:	
 11419                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 11420                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11421 000007FA 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11422 000007FC B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 11423                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 11424 000007FF E80500                  		call	read_sector
 11425 00000802 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 11426 00000804 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 11427                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 11428 00000806 C3                      		retn
 11429                                  
 11430                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11431                                  
 11432                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11433                                  
 11434                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11435                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 11436                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 11437                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 11438                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 11439                                  ;		dh has head
 11440                                  ;		es:di has bds
 11441                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 11442                                  ;
 11443                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 11444                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 11445                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 11446                                  ;
 11447                                  ;		carry set
 11448                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 11449                                  ;
 11450                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 11451                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11452                                  
 11453                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11454                                  
 11455                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11456                                  read_sector:	
 11457 00000807 55                      		push	bp
 11458 00000808 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 11459 0000080B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11460 0000080F BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 11461                                  rd_ret:					
 11462 00000812 06                      		push	es
 11463 00000813 1E                      		push	ds
 11464 00000814 07                      		pop	es
 11465 00000815 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 11466 00000818 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 11467                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 11468                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 11469                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 11470 0000081A 07                      		pop	es
 11471 0000081B 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 11472                                  rd_rty:					
 11473 0000081D E86304                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 11474 00000820 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 11475 00000822 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11476                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11477                                  					; fnon_removable
 11478 00000827 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 11479 00000829 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11480 0000082E 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 11481 00000830 50                      		push	ax
 11482 00000831 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 11483 00000832 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11484                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11485                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11486                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 11487                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11488 00000836 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 11489 00000838 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 11490                                  		; 
 11491 0000083B 1F                      		pop	ds
 11492 0000083C A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 11493 0000083F 58                      		pop	ax
 11494                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 11495 00000840 06                      		push	es
 11496 00000841 1E                      		push	ds
 11497 00000842 07                      		pop	es
 11498 00000843 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 11499 00000846 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 11500                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 11501                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 11502                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 11503 00000848 07                      		pop	es
 11504 00000849 9C                      		pushf
 11505 0000084A 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11506 0000084F 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 11507 00000851 50                      		push	ax
 11508 00000852 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 11509 00000855 1E                      		push	ds
 11510 00000856 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11511 0000085A 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11512 0000085D 1F                      		pop	ds
 11513 0000085E 58                      		pop	ax
 11514                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 11515 0000085F 9D                      		popf
 11516 00000860 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 11517 00000862 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 11518                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11519                                  
 11520                                  err_rd_ret:				
 11521 00000864 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 11522                                  					; return error
 11523 00000866 F9                      		stc
 11524                                  
 11525                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 11526                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 11527                                  
 11528                                  okret2:					
 11529 00000867 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 11530 0000086B 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 11531 0000086F 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11532                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive
 11533                                  					; preserve flags in case error occurred
 11534 00000873 9C                      		pushf
 11535 00000874 E8EC03                  		call	set_tim
 11536 00000877 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 11537 00000878 5D                      		pop	bp
 11538 00000879 C3                      		retn

 11563 0000089A 26FF4D20                		dec	word [es:di+20h]
 11564                                  exitjx:					
 11565                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11566                                  		; cf = 0
 11567                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11568                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 11569 0000089E C3                      		retn

 11633                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 11634                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines.
 11635                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 11636                                  
 11637                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 11638                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 11639                                  ;
 11640                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 11641                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------

 11760                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11761                                  ;	disk i/o handler

 11763                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 11764                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 11765                                  ;	cx = sector count

 11771                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write

 12089                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:multrk_flag, 80h ; multrk_on
