 12091 00000AAC E82800                  		call	Disk
 12092 00000AAF 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 12093 00000AB1 C3                      		retn
 12094                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12095                                  
 12096                                  block_floppy:
 12097                                  
 12098                                  ; read at most 1 track worth. perform minimization at sector / track
 12099                                  				
 12100 00000AB2 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12101                                  		;inc	cl
 12102                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12103 00000AB6 41                      		inc	cx
 12104 00000AB7 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 12105 00000ABB 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 12106 00000ABD 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 12107 00000ABF 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 12108 00000AC1 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 12109                                  gotmin:
 12110                                  
 12111                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 12112                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 12113                                  
 12114 00000AC3 50                      		push	ax
 12115 00000AC4 51                      		push	cx
 12116 00000AC5 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 12117 00000AC7 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 12118 00000ACA 59                      		pop	cx
 12119 00000ACB 58                      		pop	ax
 12120                                  
 12121                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 12122                                  
 12123 00000ACC 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 12124 00000ACE D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 12125 00000AD0 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 12126 00000AD2 EBC6                    		jmp	short block
 12127                                  dskerr_brdg:
 12128 00000AD4 E9E700                  		jmp	dskerr
 12129                                  
 12130                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12131                                  
 12132                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12133                                  
 12134                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12135                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 12136                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 12137                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 12138                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 12139                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 12140                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 12141                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 12142                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12143                                  
 12144                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12145                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12146                                  Disk:
 12147                                  
 12148                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 12149                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 12150                                  
 12151 00000AD7 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 12152                                  					; set up retry count
 12153                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12154 00000ADA 268A4D23                		mov	cl, [es:di+23h]
 12155 00000ADE 83E101                  		and	cx, 1
 12156                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12157                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 12158 00000AE1 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12159 00000AE3 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 12160 00000AE6 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12161 00000AE8 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 12162                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 12163 00000AEB 892E[2105]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 12164 00000AEF 892E[2305]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 12165 00000AF3 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 12166                                  ;retry:
 12167                                  ; 09/12/2022
 12168                                  _retry:
 12169 00000AF7 50                      		push	ax
 12170 00000AF8 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 12171                                  		
 12172                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12173 00000AFC E30B                    		jcxz	disk_not_mini
 12174                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12175                                  		;jz	short disk_not_mini
 12176                                  		
 12177 00000AFE 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 12178                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 12179 00000B03 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 12180 00000B05 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 12181                                  					; add hidden trks.
 12182                                  disk_not_mini:
 12183 00000B09 D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12184 00000B0B D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12185 00000B0D 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 12186 00000B11 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 12187 00000B13 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 12188 00000B15 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 12189 00000B19 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 12190                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12191 00000B1D 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 12192 00000B22 7411                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 12193                                  
 12194                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 12195                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 12196                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 12197                                  
 12198 00000B24 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12199                                  		;jz	short do_writej
 12200                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12201 00000B29 7460                    		jz	short do_write
 12202 00000B2B 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 12203 00000B2E 7405                    		jz	short do_fast
 12204 00000B30 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 12205                                  		;jz	short do_fast
 12206                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12207 00000B33 7556                    		jnz	short do_write
 12208                                  ;do_writej:
 12209                                  
 12210                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 12211                                  			
 12212                                  		;jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 12213                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12214                                  
 12215                                  do_fast:
 12216 00000B35 E8FB00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 12217                                  testerr:
 12218 00000B38 729A                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 12219                                  
 12220                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 12221                                  
 12222 00000B3A 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 12223 00000B3E 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12224                                  no_set:
 12225                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 12226 00000B42 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 12227 00000B48 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 12228                                  noverify:
 12229 00000B4A 58                      		pop	ax
 12230                                  
 12231                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 12232                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 12233                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 12234                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 12235                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 12236                                  
 12237 00000B4B 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12238                                  					; fnon_removable
 12239 00000B50 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 12240 00000B52 F606[1E05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 12241 00000B57 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 12242                                  its_removable:
 12243 00000B59 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 12244 00000B5C 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 12245 00000B5E 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 12246 00000B62 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 12247 00000B64 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 12248 00000B68 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12249                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 12250 00000B6C 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 12251 00000B6E C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 12252 00000B73 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 12253 00000B77 FEC6                    		inc	dh
 12254 00000B79 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 12255 00000B7D 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 12256 00000B7F 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 12257 00000B81 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 12258                                  noxor:
 12259 00000B85 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 12260                                  disk_ret:
 12261 00000B89 F8                      		clc
 12262 00000B8A C3                      		retn
 12263                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12264                                  
 12265                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12266                                  
 12267                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12268                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 12269                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 12270                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12271                                  
 12272                                  do_write:
 12273 00000B8B 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 12274 00000B8F 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 12275 00000B91 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12276 00000B95 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 12277                                  do_norm:
 12278 00000B97 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 12279 00000B9A EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 12280                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12281                                  
 12282                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12283                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 12284                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12285                                  
 12286                                  doverify:
 12287 00000B9C 58                      		pop	ax
 12288 00000B9D 50                      		push	ax
 12289 00000B9E B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 12290 00000BA0 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 12291 00000BA3 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 12292                                  
 12293                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 12294                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 12295                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 12296                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 12297                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 12298                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 12299                                  
 12300 00000BA5 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 12301 00000BA8 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 12302 00000BAA FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 12303 00000BAE 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 12304 00000BB0 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 12305 00000BB3 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 12306                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12307                                  
 12308                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 12309 00000BB5 E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 12310 00000BB8 FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 12311 00000BBC EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 12312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12313                                  
 12314                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12315                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 12316                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 12317                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12318                                  
 12319                                  dskerr:
 12320 00000BBE 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 12321 00000BC3 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 12322 00000BC5 E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 12323                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 12324 00000BC8 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 12325 00000BCD 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 12326 00000BCF BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 12327 00000BD2 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 12328                                  dochkagain:
 12329 00000BD7 E8A900                  		call	again
 12330                                  dskerr0:
 12331 00000BDA 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 12332 00000BDC 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12333                                  					; fnon_removable
 12334 00000BE1 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 12335 00000BE3 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 12336 00000BE6 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 12337                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 12338 00000BE8 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 12339 00000BEB 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 12340 00000BED C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 12341                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 12342                                  dskerr1:
 12343 00000BF3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 12344                                  		;jmp	retry
 12345                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12346 00000BF4 E900FF                  		jmp	_retry
 12347                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12348                                  
 12349                                  write_fault_err:
 12350 00000BF7 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 12351                                  					; for write fault error.
 12352 00000BFA EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 12353                                  
 12354                                  		; fall into harderr
 12355                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12356                                  
 12357                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 12358                                  
 12359                                  harderr:
 12360 00000BFC E84C00                  		call	maperror
 12361                                  harderr2:
 12362 00000BFF C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12363                                  					; force a media check through rom
 12364 00000C04 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 12365 00000C08 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 12366                                  
 12367                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 12368                                  
 12369                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 12370                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12371 00000C0C E919FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 12372                                  
 12373                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12374                                  
 12375                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 12376                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 12377                                  
 12378                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12379                                  normspeed:
 12380 00000C0F 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 12381 00000C14 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 12382 00000C16 06                      		push	es
 12383 00000C17 50                      		push	ax
 12384 00000C18 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 12385 00000C1B C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 12386 00000C1F 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12387 00000C23 58                      		pop	ax
 12388 00000C24 07                      		pop	es
 12389 00000C25 E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 12390                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12391                                  		;push	es
 12392                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 12393                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12394                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 12395                                  		;pop	es
 12396 00000C28 1E                      		push	ds
 12397 00000C29 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12398 00000C2D C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 12399 00000C31 1F                      		pop	ds
 12400                                  
 12401 00000C32 C3                      		retn
 12402                                  
 12403                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12404                                  
 12405                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 12406                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 12407                                  
 12408                                  fastspeed:
 12409 00000C33 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 12410                                  					; ftoobig
 12411 00000C38 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 12412 00000C3A 06                      		push	es
 12413 00000C3B 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12414 00000C3F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12415 00000C41 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 12416 00000C45 07                      		pop	es
 12417 00000C46 C3                      		retn
 12418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12419                                  
 12420                                  notready:
 12421 00000C47 F9                      		stc
 12422 00000C48 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 12423 00000C4A C3                      		retn
 12424                                  
 12425                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12426                                  
 12427                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 12428                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 12429                                  
 12430                                  maperror:
 12431 00000C4B 51                      		push	cx
 12432 00000C4C 06                      		push	es
 12433 00000C4D 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 12434 00000C4E 07                      		pop	es
 12435 00000C4F 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 12436 00000C51 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 12437                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 12438 00000C54 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 12439                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 12440 00000C57 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 12441 00000C5A F2AE                    		repne scasb
 12442                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12443                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 12444                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12445 00000C5C 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 12446                                  					; get translation
 12447                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 12448                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 12449 00000C5F 07                      		pop	es
 12450 00000C60 59                      		pop	cx
 12451 00000C61 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 12452 00000C62 C3                      		retn
 12453                                  
 12454                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12455                                  
 12456                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 12457                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 12458                                  
 12459                                  set_tim:
 12460 00000C63 50                      		push	ax
 12461 00000C64 E8B4F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 12462                                  
 12463                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 12464                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 12465                                  
 12466 00000C67 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12467 00000C6B 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 12468 00000C6D 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12469                                  		;jz	short done_set
 12470                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12471 00000C71 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 12472                                  setaccess:
 12473 00000C73 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 12474 00000C78 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12475 00000C7C 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12476                                  done_set:
 12477 00000C80 F8                      		clc
 12478                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 12479 00000C81 58                      		pop	ax
 12480 00000C82 C3                      		retn
 12481                                  
 12482                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12483                                  
 12484                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 12485                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 12486                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 12487                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 12488                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 12489                                  
 12490                                  again:	
 12491 00000C83 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 12492 00000C86 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 12493 00000C89 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 12494                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 12495 00000C8B 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 12496 00000C8C C3                      		retn
 12497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12498                                  
 12499                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 12500 00000C8D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12501 00000C8F C3                      		retn

 12513                                  ;
 12514                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 12515                                  ;
 12516                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 12517                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 12518                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 12519                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 12520                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 12521                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 12522                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 12523                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 12524                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12525                                  
 12526                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 12527                                  
 12528                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12529                                  
 12530                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12531 00000C90 00                      		db 0
 12532                                  
 12533                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 12534                                  %if 0
 12535                                  
 12536                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 12537                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters

 12607                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12608                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 12609                                  ;
 12610                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 12611                                  ;
 12612                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 12613                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 12614                                  ;	subfunctions.
 12615                                  ;
 12616                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12617                                  
 12618                                  ; 11/03/2019
 12619                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12620                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 12621 00000CC0 E8A7F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 12622 00000CC3 06                      		push	es
 12623 00000CC4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 12624 00000CC8 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12625                                  					; RAWIO
 12626 00000CCD 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12627 00000CD1 07                      		pop	es
 12628 00000CD2 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 12629                                  
 12630                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12631                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12632                                  
 12633                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12634 00000CD4 BE[910C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 12635                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 12636                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 12637 00000CD7 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 12638 00000CD9 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 12639                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12640 00000CDB BE[A40C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 12641                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 12642                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 12643                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 12644 00000CDE 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 12645 00000CE0 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 12646 00000CE2 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 12647 00000CE5 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 12648 00000CE7 98                      		cbw
 12649 00000CE8 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12650 00000CEA 46                      		inc	si
 12651 00000CEB 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12652 00000CED 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 12653                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 12654 00000CF0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12655                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12656                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12657 00000CF5 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 12658 00000CF7 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 12659                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12660                                  
 12661                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 12662                                  		; as a fall through from above
 12663                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h

 12676                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)

 12903                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12904                                  
 12905                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12906                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12907                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12908                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12909                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12910                                  ;
 12911                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12912                                  ;
 12913                                  ; output:
 12914                                  ;	for status call:
 12915                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12916                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12917                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12918                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12919                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12920                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12921                                  ;
 12922                                  ;	for format track:
 12923                                  ;		carry set if error
 12924                                  ;
 12925                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12926                                  
 12927                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12928                                  
 12929                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12930                                  FormatTrack:
 12931 00000E1A C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12932 00000E1E C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 12933 00000E21 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12934                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 12935 00000E24 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack
 12936 00000E26 1E                      		push	ds

 13079                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been

 13081                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the

 13083                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to

 13194                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13195                                  
 13196                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13197                                  ;
 13198                                  ; TrackIo:
 13199                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 13200                                  ;
 13201                                  ;   input:
 13202                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 13203                                  ;		  3 = write
 13204                                  ;		  4 = verify
 13205                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 13206                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 13207                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 13208                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 13209                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 13210                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 13211                                  ;
 13212                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13213                                  
 13214                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13215                                  		
 13216                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13217                                  TrackIo:	
 13218                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 13219 00000F72 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error

 13221 00000F79 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13222                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 13223 00000F7E 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 13224 00000F80 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o

 13226 00000F82 E8D0FA                  		call	iosetup
 13227 00000F85 59                      		pop	cx
 13228 00000F86 58                      		pop	ax
 13229                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 13230 00000F87 BE[2A05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd

 13232 00000F8C D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1

 13234                                  
 13235                                  		; WE WANT:
 13236                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 13237                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 13238                                  		
 13239 00000F90 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 13240                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13241 00000F93 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8

 13243                                  					; good_tracklayout

 13245

 13247                                  ionextsector:

 13249 00000F9D 52                      		push	dx
 13250 00000F9E 46                      		inc	si

 13252                                  					; the track table
 13253 00000FA0 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table

 13256                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 13257                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 13258                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 13259                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 13260                                  		; 3). Good track layout

 13273 00000FB6 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx

 13275 00000FBB 5A                      		pop	dx

 13327                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13328                                  ;
 13329                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 13330                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 13331                                  ; are permissible.
 13332                                  ;
 13333                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 13334                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index

 13451                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13452                                  
 13453                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13454                                  
 13455                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13456                                  ;
 13457                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13458                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13459                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13460                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13461                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13462                                  ;
 13463                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13464                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13465                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13466                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13467                                  ;
 13468                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13469                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13470                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13471                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13472                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13473                                  ;
 13474                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13475                                  
 13476                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13477                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13478 00001052 51                      		push	cx
 13479 00001053 52                      		push	dx
 13480                                  
 13481                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13482                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13483                                  
 13484 00001054 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13485 00001059 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13486 0000105B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13487 0000105D 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13488 00001062 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13489 00001064 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13490                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13491                                  
 13492                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13493 00001066 06                      		push	es

 13495                                  
 13496                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13497                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors

 13499 0000106A 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 13500

 13503                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table

 13506

 13508                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.

 13514 00001080 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 13515 00001084 49                      		dec	cx

 13518 0000108A D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1

 13520 0000108E 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13521 00001092 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13522 00001096 06                      		push	es
 13523 00001097 1E                      		push	ds
 13524 00001098 56                      		push	si
 13525 00001099 57                      		push	di
 13526 0000109A B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13527 0000109C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13528                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13529 0000109E 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13530 000010A0 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13531 000010A5 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 13532 000010A7 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 13533                                  
 13534                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13535                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13536 000010A8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13537 000010AA 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 13538 000010AC 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13539                                  
 13540 000010AD 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13541                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 13542                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 13543 000010B2 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si

 13613                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13614                                  ;
 13615                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13616                                  ;
 13617                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13618                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13619                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13620                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13621                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 13623                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13635                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.

 13641                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 13651                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13652                                  ;
 13653                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13654                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13655                                  ;
 13656                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13657                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13658                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13659                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13660                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13661                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13662                                  ;
 13663                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13664                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13665                                  ;
 13666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13667                                  
 13668                                  		; 24/12/2023

 13670                                  ToRom:

 13725                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 13727                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13728                                  
 13729                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13730                                  ;
 13731                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13732                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13733                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13734                                  ;
 13735                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13736                                  
 13737                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13738                                  ioctl_getown:
 13739 00001152 E815F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13740 00001155 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13741                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13742 00001159 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13743                                  ownloop:				
 13744 0000115D 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13745 00001161 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13746                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13747 00001163 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13748                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13749                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13750 00001168 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13751                                  getnextBDS:				
 13752 0000116A 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13753 0000116D EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13754                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13755                                  
 13756                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13757                                  ;
 13758                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13759                                  ; in al to al.
 13760                                  ;
 13761                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13762                                  
 13763                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13764                                  ioctl_setown:
 13765 0000116F E8F8F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13766 00001172 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13767                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13768 00001177 E84FF7                  		call	checksingle
 13769                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13770 0000117A FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13771                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13772                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13773                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13774                                  
 13775                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13776                                  ;
 13777                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13778                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13779                                  ;
 13780                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13781

 13791                                  					; Get it 1-based

 13796                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13797                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13798                                  		; cf=0
 13799                                  		;clc

 13809                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.

 13859                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13860                                  ;	get media id
 13861                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13862                                  ;
 13863                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13864                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13865                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13866                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13867                                  ;
 13868                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13869                                  ;
 13870                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13871                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13872                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13873                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13874                                  ;
 13875                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13876                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13877                                  ;
 13878                                  ; LOGIC:
 13879                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13880                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13881                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13882                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13883                                  ;
 13884                                  ; {
 13885                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13886                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13887                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13888                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13889                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13890                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13891                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13892                                  ;		};
 13893                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13894                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13895                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13896                                  ;		};
 13897                                  ;	else
 13898                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13899                                  ;
 13900                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13901                                  
 13902                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13903                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13904                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13905                                  
 13906                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13907                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13908                                  GetMediaId:
 13909 000011BD E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13910 000011C0 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13911 000011C4 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13912 000011C9 E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13913 000011CC 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13914                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13915 000011CE 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13916                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13917                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13918                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13919 000011D3 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13920                                  
 13921                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13922 000011D5 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13923 000011D8 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13924                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13925                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13926 000011DB 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13927 000011DD C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13928 000011E1 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13929                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13930 000011E5 46                      		inc	si
 13931                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13932                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13933 000011E6 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13934                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13935 000011E9 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13936                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13937                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13938 000011EC F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13939                                  	
 13940                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13941                                  		; cf = 0
 13942                                  		;clc
 13943                                  
 13944 000011EE C3                      		retn
 13945                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13946                                  
 13947                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13948                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13949 000011EF F9                      		stc	
 13950                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13951 000011F0 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13952                                  		;stc
 13953                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13954                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13955 000011F2 C3                      		retn
 13956                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13957                                  
 13958                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13959                                  
 13960                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13961                                  ;  set media id
 13962                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13963                                  
 13964                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13965                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13966                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13967                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13968                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13969                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13970                                  ;
 13971                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13972                                  ;
 13973                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13974                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13975                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13976                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13977                                  ;
 13978                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13979                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13980                                  ;
 13981                                  ; logic:
 13982                                  ;
 13983                                  ; {
 13984                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13985                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13986                                  ;	BootIo;
 13987                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13988                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13989                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13990                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13991                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13992                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13993                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13994                                  ;		};
 13995                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13996                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13997                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13998                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13999                                  ;		};
 14000                                  ;	else
 14001                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 14002                                  ;
 14003                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14004                                  
 14005                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14006                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14007                                  SetMediaId:
 14008 000011F3 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 14009 000011F6 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 14010                                  					; Logical drive	number
 14011 000011FA 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 14012 000011FC C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 14013 00001201 52                      		push	dx
 14014 00001202 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14015 00001205 5A                      		pop	dx
 14016 00001206 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 14017                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 14018 00001208 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 14019                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 14020 0000120D 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 14021                                  		
 14022 0000120F 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 14023                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14024                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 14025                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14026 00001214 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 14027                                  
 14028 00001216 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 14029 00001217 57                      		push	di
 14030 00001218 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 14031 00001219 07                      		pop	es
 14032 0000121A BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 14033 0000121D C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 14034 00001221 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14035 00001224 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 14036                                  
 14037                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14038                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14039                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 14040                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 14041                                  		;rep movsb
 14042 00001227 E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 14043                                  
 14044 0000122A 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 14045 0000122B 1F                      		pop	ds
 14046 0000122C 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 14047 0000122D 07                      		pop	es
 14048 0000122E E894F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 14049 00001231 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 14050 00001233 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 14051 00001238 E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 14052 0000123B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 14053                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 14054                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 14055 00001240 C3                      		retn
 14056                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14057                                  
 14058                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14059                                  ;IOCtl_If7:

 14062                                  ;IOCtl_If6:

 14065                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14066                                  
 14067                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14068                                  
 14069                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14070                                  ;	BootIo
 14071                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14072                                  ;
 14073                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 14074                                  ;
 14075                                  ; input :
 14076                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 14077                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 14078                                  ;
 14079                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 14080                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 14081                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 14082                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 14083                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 14084                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 14085                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 14086                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 14087                                  ;
 14088                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 14089                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 14090                                  ;
 14091                                  ; logic:
 14092                                  ;
 14093                                  ; {
 14094                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 14095                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 14096                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 14097                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 14098                                  ; }
 14099                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14100                                  
 14101                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14102                                  BootIo:	
 14103 00001241 06                      		push	es
 14104 00001242 57                      		push	di
 14105 00001243 53                      		push	bx
 14106 00001244 1E                      		push	ds
 14107 00001245 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 14108                                  
 14109                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 14110                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 14111                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14112                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 14113                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 14114                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 14115                                  
 14116 00001246 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 14117 00001249 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 14118 0000124B 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 14119 0000124F B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 14120 00001252 E8FEF6                  		call	diskio
 14121 00001255 5B                      		pop	bx
 14122 00001256 5F                      		pop	di
 14123 00001257 07                      		pop	es
 14124 00001258 C3                      		retn
 14125                                  
 14126                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14127                                  
 14128                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14129                                  
 14130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14131                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 14132                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14133                                  ;
 14134                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 14135                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 14136                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 14137                                  ; history in the flags.
 14138                                  ;
 14139                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 14140                                  ;
 14141                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 14142                                  ;
 14143                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 14144                                  ;
 14145                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 14146                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 14147                                  ;
 14148                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14149                                  
 14150                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 14151 00001259 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14152 0000125D 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 14153 0000125F 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 14154                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14155 00001261 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 14156                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14157                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 14158 00001266 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14159 00001268 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 14160 0000126D 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14161 0000126F E8EA06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 14162 00001272 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 14163                                  
 14164                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 14165                                  
 14166 00001274 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14167 00001276 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14168                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14169                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14170 00001278 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14171 0000127A 53                      		push	bx
 14172 0000127B BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 14173                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 14174                                  					; physical drive
 14175 0000127E E8B406                  		call	set_changed_dl
 14176 00001281 5B                      		pop	bx
 14177                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 14178 00001282 C3                      		retn
 14179

 14184                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14185                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 14186                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14187                                  ;
 14188                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 14189                                  ;
 14190                                  ; INPUT :
 14191                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 14192                                  ;

 14194                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.

 14197                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14198                                  GetAccessFlag:
 14199 00001283 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 14200 00001287 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14201                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 14202                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14203 0000128A 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 14204                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14205 0000128C 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 14206                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14207                                  					; unformatted_media
 14208 00001291 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 14209                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 14210                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14211 00001293 40                      		inc	ax
 14212                                  GafDone:
 14213 00001294 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 14214 00001297 C3                      		retn

 14244                                  					; unformatted_media
