 14251                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14252                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 14253                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14254                                  ;
 14255                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 14256                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 14257                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 14258                                  ;
 14259                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14260                                  
 14261                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14262                                  ioctl_support_query:
 14263 000012B0 06                      		push	es
 14264 000012B1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 14265 000012B5 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 14266                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 14267                                  
 14268                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14269                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 14270                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 14271                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 14272                                  
 14273 000012B9 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 14274                                  					; See if major code is 8
 14275 000012BB 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 14276                                  ioctl_support:
 14277 000012BD 0E                      		push	cs
 14278 000012BE 07                      		pop	es
 14279                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14280                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14281 000012BF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14282                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14283 000012C2 BF[B50C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 14284                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 14285                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 14286 000012C5 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 14287 000012C7 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 14288 000012C9 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 14289 000012CB B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 14290                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14291                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 14292                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 14293                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 14294                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 14295                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14296                                  ioctlsupexit:
 14297 000012CE 07                      		pop	es
 14298                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14299                                  		; cf = 0
 14300                                  		;clc
 14301 000012CF C3                      		retn
 14302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14303                                  nosupport:
 14304 000012D0 07                      		pop	es
 14305 000012D1 E901EE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 14310                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14311                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 14312                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14313                                  ;
 14314                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 14315                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 14316                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 14317                                  ;	    drive)
 14318                                  ;
 14319                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 14320                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 14321                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 14322                                  ;
 14323                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 14324                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 14325                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 14326                                  ;
 14327                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 14328                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 14329                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14330                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14331                                  ;
 14332                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 14333                                  ;
 14334                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 14335                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 14336                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 14337                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 14338                                  ; 
 14339                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14340                                  
 14341                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14342                                  SenseMediaType:				
 14343 000012D4 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 14344 000012D8 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14345                                  		; 10/10/2022
 14346                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 14347 000012DB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14348 000012DD 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 14349                                  		;
 14350 000012DF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14351                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 14352                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14353                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 14354 000012E3 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 14355                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 14356 000012E5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 14357 000012E7 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 14358 000012E9 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 14359                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 14360 000012EB FEC8                    		dec	al
 14361 000012ED 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 14362 000012EF 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14363 000012F1 0404                    		add	al, 4
 14364 000012F3 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 14365 000012F5 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14366 000012F7 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 14367 000012F9 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 14368                                  GotMediaType:				
 14369 000012FB 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 14370                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14371                                  		; cf = 0
 14372                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 14373 000012FE C3                      		retn
 14374                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14375                                  
 14376                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 14377 000012FF 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 14378 00001302 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 14379 00001304 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 14380 00001306 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 14381 00001309 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 14382                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 14383 0000130B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 14384                                  SenseErrExit:				
 14385 0000130D B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 14386 0000130F F9                      		stc
 14387 00001310 C3                      		retn
 14388                                  
 14389                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14390                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14391                                  		;db    0
 14392                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14393                                  
 14394                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14395                                  
 14396                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14397                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 14398                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14399                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14400                                  
 14401                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 14402                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 14403                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 14404                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 14405                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 14406                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 14407                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 14408                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 14409                                  ;
 14410                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 14411                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 14412                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 14413                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 14414                                  ;
 14415                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 14416                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 14417                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 14418                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 14419                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 14420                                  ;
 14421                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 14422                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 14423                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 14424                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 14425                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 14426                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 14427                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 14428                                  
 14429                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 14430                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 14431                                  
 14432                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14433                                  
 14434                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 14435 00001311 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 14436 00001314 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 14437 00001316 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 14438 00001319 7431                    		jz	short mine
 14439                                  
 14440                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 14441                                  
 14442 0000131B 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 14443 0000131E 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 14444 00001320 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 14445 00001323 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 14446 00001325 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 14447                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14448                                  
 14449                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 14450 00001328 CF                      		iret
 14451                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14452

 14458                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]

 14460                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14461                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 14462                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 14463                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 14464                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 14465                                  		
 14466                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14467                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 14468 00001331 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 14469                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 14470 00001335 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 14471                                  
 14472                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 14473                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 14474                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 14475                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 14476

 14480 0000133D A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax

 14482                                  		; 02/09/2023

 14487                                  		; 02/09/2023

 14490                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 14491 0000134A 58                      		pop	ax
 14492                                  i2f_iret:

 14571                                  
 14572                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 14573                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 14574                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 14575                                  
 14576                                  win386call:				
 14577 0000138C 1E                      		push	ds
 14578 0000138D 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 14579                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14580                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 14581 00001392 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 14582                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 14583 00001394 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 14584 00001396 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 14585                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 14586 00001398 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 14587                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14588 0000139A F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 14589                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 14590 0000139D 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 14591                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present

 14619                                  handle_multmult:

 14623 000013C4 E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 14624                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14625                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 14626                                  		;dec	bx
 14627 000013C7 BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 14628 000013CA 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 14629 000013CC 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 14630 000013CE F7D3                    		not	bx
 14631 000013D0 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 14632 000013D2 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 14633 000013D4 43                      		inc	bx
 14634                                  try_1:

 14640                                  
 14641                                  try_2:
 14642 000013D7 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 14643 000013D9 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
