 15737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15738                                  
 15739                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15740                                  
 15741                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15742                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15743                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15744                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15745                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15746                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15747                                  
 15748                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15749 000017C2 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15750 000017C4 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15750 000017CD 736B6574746520666F-
 15750 000017D6 7220647269766520   
 15751                                  
 15752                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15753 000017DE 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15753 000017E7 65737320616E79206B-
 15753 000017F0 6579207768656E2072-
 15753 000017F9 656164790D0A       
 15754 000017FF 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15755                                  
 15756                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15757                                  
 15758                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15759                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15760                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15761                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15762                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15763                                  
 15764                                  chkopcnt:		
 15765 00001801 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15766 00001806 C3                      		retn
 15767                                  
 15768                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15769                                  
 15770                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15771                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15772                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15773                                  ;
 15774                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15775                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15776                                  
 15777                                  mediacheck:	
 15778 00001807 E8BFF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15779 0000180A 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15780 0000180C E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15781 0000180F 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15782 00001811 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15783 00001814 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15784 00001816 50                      		push	ax
 15785 00001817 52                      		push	dx
 15786 00001818 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15787                                  					; set logical drive number
 15788 0000181C B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15789 0000181E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15790                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15791                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15792 00001820 5A                      		pop	dx
 15793 00001821 58                      		pop	ax
 15794 00001822 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15795 00001824 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15796                                  
 15797                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15798                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15799                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15800                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15801                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15802                                  ; status.
 15803                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15804 00001827 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15805 0000182B 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15806                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15807                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15808                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15809                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15810 0000182F 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15811                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15812                                  
 15813                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15814                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15815                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15816                                  
 15817 00001831 50                      		push	ax
 15818 00001832 51                      		push	cx
 15819 00001833 52                      		push	dx
 15820 00001834 E8B9ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15821 00001837 5A                      		pop	dx
 15822 00001838 59                      		pop	cx
 15823 00001839 58                      		pop	ax
 15824 0000183A 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15825 0000183C 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15826                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15827 0000183E 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15828                                  mediaret:				
 15829 00001840 C3                      		retn
 15830                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15831                                  
 15832                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15833                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15834                                  ; or write.
 15835                                  
 15836                                  mediadovolid:				
 15837 00001841 E84CEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15838 00001844 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15839 00001846 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15840 00001849 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15841 0000184B E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15842                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15843                                  
 15844                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15845                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15846                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15847                                  ; dos.
 15848                                  ;
 15849                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15850                                  
 15851                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15852                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15853                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15854                                  
 15855                                  checklatchio:	
 15856                                  
 15857                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15858                                  			
 15859 0000184E E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15860 00001851 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15861                                  
 15862                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15863                                  
 15864 00001853 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15865 00001856 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15866                                  
 15867                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15868                                  ; expensive verification.
 15869                                  
 15870 00001858 E835EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15871 0000185B 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15872 0000185D E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15873 00001860 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15874 00001862 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15875 00001864 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15876 00001866 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15877                                  checklatchret:				
 15878 00001869 E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15879                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15880 0000186C F9                      		stc
 15881 0000186D 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15882                                  checkret:				
 15883 0000186E C3                      		retn
 15884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15885                                  
 15886                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15887                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15888                                  ;
 15889                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15890                                  
 15891                                  checkfatvid:				
 15892 0000186F E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15893 00001872 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15894 00001874 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15895                                  
 15896                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15897                                  
 15898                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15899                                  
 15900                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15901                                  
 15902                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15903                                  ;
 15904                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15905                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15906                                  ;
 15907                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15908                                  ;
 15909                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15910                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15911                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15912                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15913                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15914                                  ;
 15915                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15916                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15917                                  ; routine.)
 15918                                  ;
 15919                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15920                                  
 15921                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15922                                  check_vid:
 15923                                  
 15924                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15925                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15926                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15927                                  
 15928 00001876 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15929                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15930                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15931 0000187B 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15932 0000187D E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15933 00001880 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15934 00001882 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15935 00001884 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15936                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15937 00001889 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15938                                  					; if not fat system
 15939 0000188B E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15940 0000188E 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15941 00001890 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15942 00001893 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15943                                  					; definitely changed
 15944 00001896 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15945                                  
 15946 00001898 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15947                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15948 00001899 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15949                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15950                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15951                                  		;clc
 15952                                  checkfatret:				
 15953 0000189C C3                      		retn
 15954                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15955                                  
 15956                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15957                                  changed_drv:
 15958 0000189D F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15959 0000189E C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15960                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15961 000018A3 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15962                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15963                                  
 15964                                  ; extended id check
 15965                                  
 15966                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15967                                  
 15968                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15969                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15970                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15971                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15972                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15973                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15974                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15975                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15976                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15977                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15978                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15979                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15980                                  ;
 15981                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15982                                  
 15983                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15984                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15985 000018A4 50                      		push	ax
 15986                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15987                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15988 000018A5 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15989                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15990 000018A8 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15991 000018AA 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15992 000018AE 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15993 000018B0 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15994 000018B3 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15995 000018B7 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15996                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15997                                  					; don't know
 15998 000018B9 58                      		pop	ax
 15999 000018BA EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 16000                                  					; reset the flag
 16001                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16002                                  
 16003                                  ext_changed:
 16004 000018BC 58                      		pop	ax
 16005                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16006 000018BD 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 16007                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 16008                                  					; disk changed!
 16009                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16010                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 16011                                  		;clc
 16012 000018BE EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 16013                                  
 16014                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16015                                  
 16016                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 16017                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 16018                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 16019                                  ;
 16020                                  ; es:di -> bds
 16021                                  
 16022                                  checkio:				
 16023 000018C0 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 16024 000018C3 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 16025 000018C5 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 16026 000018C8 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 16027 000018CA E8C3ED                  		call	GetBp
 16028 000018CD 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 16029 000018CF E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 16030 000018D2 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 16031 000018D4 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 16032 000018D6 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 16033 000018D8 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 16034 000018D9 C3                      		retn
 16035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16036                                  
 16037                                  checkioerr:				
 16038 000018DA E80700                  		call	returnvid
 16039                                  
 16040                                  checkioret:				
 16041 000018DD F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 16042 000018DE E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 16043                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16044                                  
 16045                                  no_error_map:				
 16046 000018E1 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 16047                                  
 16048                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16049                                  
 16050                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 16051                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 16052                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 16053                                  
 16054                                  returnvid:		
 16055 000018E4 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 16056                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 16057 000018E7 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 16058 000018EA B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 16059 000018EC F9                      		stc
 16060 000018ED C3                      		retn
 16061                                  
 16062                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16063                                  
 16064                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 16065                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 16066                                  ;
 16067                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 16068                                  ; **trashes si**
 16069                                  
 16070                                  media_set_vid:				
 16071 000018EE BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 16072                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 16073                                  
 16074                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 16075                                  
 16076                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16077                                  
 16078                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 16079                                  
 16080                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16081                                  vid_into_packet:
 16082 000018F1 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 16083 000018F2 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 16084 000018F6 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16085 000018F9 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 16086 000018FB 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16087 000018FE 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 16088 00001901 1F                      		pop	ds
 16089                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 16090 00001902 C3                      		retn
 16091                                  
 16092                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16093                                  
 16094                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16095                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 16096                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 16097                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 16098                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 16099                                  ;
 16100                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 16101                                  ;		ah has media byte
 16102                                  ;
 16103                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 16104                                  ;		    no registers modified
 16105                                  ;		carry set
 16106                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 16107                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 16108                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 16109                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 16110                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 16111                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 16112                                  ;
 16113                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16114                                  
 16115                                  hidensity:
 16116                                  
 16117                                  ; check for correct drive
 16118                                  		
 16119                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16120 00001903 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16121                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 16122                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 16123 00001908 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 16124                                  
 16125                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 16126                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 16127                                  
 16128 0000190A 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 16129 0000190F 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 16130                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 16131                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 16132 00001911 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 16133 00001914 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 16134                                  
 16135                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 16136                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 16137                                  
 16138                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16139 00001916 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16140 0000191A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 16141                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16142                                  					; ffOther
 16143 0000191C 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 16144 0000191E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 16145                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16146                                  					; ff288
 16147 00001920 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 16148 00001922 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 16149 00001924 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 16150                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 16151                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 16152 00001927 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 16153                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 16154                                  					; 2 sides
 16155                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16156 0000192A 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 16157 0000192B BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 16158                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 16159                                  					; & head max
 16160                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16161 0000192E E9C8ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 16162                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16163                                  
 16164                                  Is720K:
 16165                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16166 00001931 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 16167                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16168 00001932 E991ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 16169                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16170                                  
 16171                                  		; 18/12/2022
 16172                                  ;dofloppy:
 16173                                  		;retn
 16174                                  
 16175                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16176                                  
 16177                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16178                                  
 16179                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16180                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 16181                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 16182                                  ;
 16183                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 16184                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 16185                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16186                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 16187                                  ;
 16188                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 16189                                  ;
 16190                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 16191                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16192                                  
 16193                                  set_changed_dl:	
 16194 00001935 06                      		push	es
 16195 00001936 57                      		push	di
 16196                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 16197                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16198 00001937 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 16199                                  
 16200                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 16201                                  
 16202                                  scan_bds:				
 16203 0000193B 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16204 0000193F 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 16205                                  
 16206                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 16207                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 16208                                  
 16209 00001941 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16210                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 16211                                  get_next_bds:				
 16212 00001945 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 16213                                  					; go to	next bds
 16214 00001948 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 16215 0000194B 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 16216 0000194D 5F                      		pop	di
 16217 0000194E 07                      		pop	es
 16218 0000194F C3                      		retn
 16219                                  
 16220                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16221                                  
 16222                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16223                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 16224                                  ;
 16225                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 16226                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 16227                                  ;		zero reset - change
 16228                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16229                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16230                                  
 16231                                  checkromchange:	
 16232                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 16233                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16234 00001950 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 16235                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16236                                  					; fchanged
 16237 00001955 C3                      		retn
 16238                                  
 16239                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16240                                  
 16241                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16242                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 16243                                  ;
 16244                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16245                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16246                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16247                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16248                                  
 16249                                  resetchanged:	
 16250                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 16251                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16252 00001956 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 16253                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16254                                  					; ~fchanged
 16255 0000195B C3                      		retn
 16256                                  
 16257                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16258                                  
 16259                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16260                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 16261                                  ;
 16262                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16263                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 16264                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 16265                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16266                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16267                                  
 16268                                  haschange:
 16269                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 16270                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16271 0000195C 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16272                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16273                                  					; fchangeline
 16274 00001961 C3                      		retn
 16275                                  
 16276                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16277                                  
 16278                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16279                                  
 16280                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16281                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 16282                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16283                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 16284                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 16285                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16286                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16287                                  
 16288                                  ; set_volume_id
 16289                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 16290                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 16291                                  ;
 16292                                  ;   on entry:
 16293                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 16294                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 16295                                  ;
 16296                                  ;   on exit:
 16297                                  ;	carry clear:
 16298                                  ;	   successful call
 16299                                  ;	carry set
 16300                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 16301                                  
 16302                                  set_volume_id:				
 16303 00001962 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 16304 00001963 50                      		push	ax
 16305 00001964 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 16306 00001967 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 16307 00001969 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 16308 0000196C 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 16309 0000196E E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 16310 00001971 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 16311                                  setvret:				
 16312                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16313                                  		; cf = 0
 16314                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 16315 00001974 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 16316 00001975 5A                      		pop	dx
 16317 00001976 C3                      		retn
 16318                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16319                                  
 16320                                  seterr:					
 16321 00001977 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 16322 00001978 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 16323 00001979 C3                      		retn
 16324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16325 0000197A 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 16326                                  
 16327                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16328                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 16329                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16330                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 16331                                  
 16332                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16333                                  
 16334                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16335                                  
 16336                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16337                                  ;
 16338                                  ;   on entry:
 16339                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 16340                                  ;
 16341                                  ;   on exit:
 16342                                  ;	carry clear
 16343                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 16344                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 16345                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 16346                                  ;
 16347                                  ;	carry set:
 16348                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 16349                                  
 16350                                  read_volume_id:
 16351 0000197C 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 16352 0000197D 51                      		push	cx
 16353 0000197E 53                      		push	bx
 16354 0000197F 50                      		push	ax
 16355 00001980 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 16356 00001981 57                      		push	di
 16357 00001982 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 16358 00001983 07                      		pop	es
 16359 00001984 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16360 00001987 BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16361                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 16362 0000198A B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 16363 0000198D F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16364 0000198F 5F                      		pop	di
 16365 00001990 07                      		pop	es
 16366 00001991 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 16367                                  					; # of fats
 16368 00001995 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 16369                                  					; sectors / fat
 16370 00001999 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 16371 0000199B 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 16372                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 16373                                  					;
 16374                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 16375                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16376 0000199F 2EA3[7A19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 16377                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 16378                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 16379 000019A3 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 16380                                  					; # root dir entries
 16381 000019A7 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 16382 000019A9 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 16383                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16384                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 16385 000019AB 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16386                                  next_sec:
 16387 000019AC 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 16388 000019AD 2EA1[7A19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16389                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 16390                                  					; get sector #
 16391 000019B1 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16392                                  					; sectors / track
 16393 000019B5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16394 000019B7 F7F1                    		div	cx
 16395                                  
 16396                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 16397                                  
 16398 000019B9 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 16399                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 16400 000019BA 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 16401 000019BC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16402 000019BE 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 16403                                  					; # heads on this disc
 16404 000019C2 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 16405 000019C4 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 16406 000019C6 E83EEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 16407                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 16408 000019C9 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 16409 000019CB B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 16410 000019CE B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 16411                                  fvid_loop:
 16412                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16413 000019D0 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 16414                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 16415 000019D2 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 16416 000019D4 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 16417 000019D7 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 16418 000019D9 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 16419 000019DC 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 16420                                  ent_loop:
 16421 000019DE 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 16422 000019E1 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 16423 000019E3 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 16424 000019E4 2EFF06[7A19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16425                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 16426                                  					; next sector
 16427 000019E9 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 16428                                  notfound:
 16429                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16430                                  		;xor	si, si
 16431 000019EB EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16433                                  
 16434                                  found_vid:
 16435                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16436                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 16437 000019ED 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16438 000019EE 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 16439 000019F0 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 16440 000019F1 57                      		push	di
 16441 000019F2 1E                      		push	ds
 16442 000019F3 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 16443 000019F4 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16444 000019F7 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 16445                                  					; length of string minus nul
 16446 000019FA F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 16447                                  		;xor	al, al
 16448                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16449 000019FC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16450 000019FD AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16451                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16452                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16453                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16454 000019FE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16455 000019FF 07                      		pop	es
 16456                                  fvid_ret:
 16457                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16458 00001A00 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16459                                  				
 16460 00001A02 58                      		pop	ax
 16461                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16462                                  		; cf = 0
 16463                                  		;clc
 16464                                  rvidret:
 16465 00001A03 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16466 00001A04 59                      		pop	cx
 16467 00001A05 5A                      		pop	dx
 16468 00001A06 C3                      		retn
 16469                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16470                                  
 16471                                  no_vid:
 16472 00001A07 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16473                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16474                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16475 00001A08 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16477                                  
 16478                                  readviderr:
 16479 00001A0A 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16480 00001A0B 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16481 00001A0C EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16482                                  
 16483                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16484                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16485                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16486                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16487 00001A0E BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16488                                  		;
 16489                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16490                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16491                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16492                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16493 00001A11 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16494 00001A14 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16495                                  		;
 16496 00001A17 FC                      		cld
 16497 00001A18 C3                      		retn
 16498                                  
 16499                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16500                                  
 16501                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16502                                  ;
 16503                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16504                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16505                                  
 16506                                  transfer_volume_id:
 16507 00001A19 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16508                                  		;push	si
 16509 00001A1A 51                      		push	cx
 16510                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16511 00001A1B 56                      		push	si
 16512                                  
 16513                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16514                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16515                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16516                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16517                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16518                                  		;cld
 16519                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16520 00001A1C E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16521                                  
 16522 00001A1F F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16523                                  		
 16524                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16525 00001A21 5E                      		pop	si
 16526                                  chk_volid_ok:
 16527 00001A22 59                      		pop	cx
 16528                                  		;pop	si
 16529 00001A23 5F                      		pop	di
 16530 00001A24 C3                      		retn
 16531                                  
 16532                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16533                                  
 16534                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16535                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16536                                  ;
 16537                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16538                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16539                                  
 16540                                  check_volume_id:
 16541 00001A25 57                      		push	di
 16542 00001A26 51                      		push	cx
 16543                                  		
 16544                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16545                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16546                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16547                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16548                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16549                                  		;cld
 16550                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16551 00001A27 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16552                                  
 16553 00001A2A F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16554                                  		
 16555                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16556                                  		;pop	cx
 16557                                  		;pop	di
 16558                                  		;retn
 16559 00001A2C EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 16560                                  
 16561                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16562                                  
 16563                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16564                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16565                                  ;
 16566                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16567                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16568                                  ;
 16569                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16570                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16571                                  ;
 16572                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16573                                  
 16574                                  fat_check:
 16575 00001A2E 50                      		push	ax
 16576 00001A2F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16577 00001A31 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16578 00001A34 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16579                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16580 00001A38 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16581 00001A3A 4E                      		dec	si
 16582                                  okret1:
 16583 00001A3B 58                      		pop	ax
 16584 00001A3C C3                      		retn
 16585

 16604

 16616                                  ; 13/12/2022
 16617                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 16618                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 16619                                  
 16620                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 16621                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 16622                                  
 16623                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------

 16641                                  
 16642                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16643                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 16644                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16645                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 30/12/2022))
 16646                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16647                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 16648                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16649                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 16650                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16651                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit6.s -l sysinit6.lst -o SYSINIT6.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 16652                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16653                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 16654                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16655                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 16656                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 16657                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16658                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 16659                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 16660                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16661                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 16662                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 16663                                  
 16664                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 
 16665                                  ; Retro DOS v4.0 - 2019
 16666                                  ; SYSINIT (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) draft: 'sysinit3.s' (01/07/2019)
 16667                                   
 16668                                  ; 21/10/2022
 16669                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16670                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 16671                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 16672                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 16673                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16674                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 16675                                  
 16676                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16677                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 16678                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16679                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 16680                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 16681                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 16682                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 16683                                  ;
 16684                                  ;
 16685                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 16686                                  ;
 16687                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 16688                                  ;
 16689                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 16690                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16691                                  ;
 16692                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 16693                                  ;
 16694                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 16695                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16696                                  ;
 16697                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 16698                                  ;
 16699                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 16700                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 16701                                  ;value.
 16702                                  ;
 16703                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 16704                                  ;
 16705                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 16706                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 16707                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 16708                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 16709                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 16710                                  ;
 16711                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 16712                                  ;
 16713                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 16714                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 16715                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 16716                                  ;
 16717                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 16718                                  ;
 16719                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 16720                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16721                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 16722                                  ;
 16723                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 16724                                  ;
 16725                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 16726                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16727                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 16728                                  ;
 16729                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 16730                                  ;
 16731                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 16732                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 16733                                  ;
 16734                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 16735                                  ;
 16736                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 16737                                  ;
 16738                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 16739                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 16740                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 16741                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 16742                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 16743                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 16744                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 16745                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 16746                                  ;memory.
 16747                                  ;NOTES:
 16748                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 16749                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 16750                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 16751                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 16752                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 16753                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 16754                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 16755                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 16756                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 16757                                  
 16758                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16759                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 16760                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16761                                  
 16762                                  ;include version.inc
 16763                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16764                                  
 16765                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 16766                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 16767                                  
 16768                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 16769                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 16770                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 16771                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 16772                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 16773                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 16774                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 16775                                  
 16776                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 16777                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16778                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 16779                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 16780                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 16781                                  
 16782                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 16783                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16784                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 16785                                  ;MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 16786                                  
 16787                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21)
 16788                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	6
 16789                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	22
 16790                                  
 16791                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 16792                                  
 16793                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 16794                                  				; currently 0.
 16795                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 16796                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 16797                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 16798                                  
 16799                                  ;      if1
 16800                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 16801                                  ;      endif
 16802                                  
 16803                                         ;******************************
 16804                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 16805                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 16806                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 16807                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 16808                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 16809                                         ;******************************

 16814                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 16815                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 16816                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 16817                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 16818                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 16819                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 16820                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 16821                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 16822                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 16823

 16828 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 16829 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point

 16837 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 16838 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 16839 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 16840 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 16841                                  .size:
 16842                                  endstruc
 16843                                  
 16844                                  ;Status word masks
 16845                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 16846                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 16847                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 16848                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 16849                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 16850                                  
 16851                                  ;Function codes
 16852                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 16853                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 16854                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 16855                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 16856                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 16857                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 16858                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 16859                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 16860                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 16861                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 16862                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 16863                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 16864                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 16865                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 16866                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 16867                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 16868                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify
 16869                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 16870                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush
 16871                                  DEVWRIOCTL EQU  12              ;IOCTL write
