 32102                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32103                                  ;*** toDigit - converts a character-digit to its binary counterpart
 32104                                  ;            -- verifies that CL contains a valid character-digit; if so, it
 32105                                  ; changes CL to its counterpart binary digit ((CL-'0') or (CL-'A'+10)).
 32106                                  ; A-F are considered valid iff gnradix is 16.
 32107                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32108                                  ; ENTRY:    CL contains a digit ('0' to '9' or, if gnradix==16, 'A' to 'F')
 32109                                  ; EXIT:     CL contains digit in binary (0 to 9 or, if gnradix==16, 0 to 15)
 32110                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set indicates invalid digit; carry clear indicates good digit
 32111                                  ; USES:     CL, Flags
 32112                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32113                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 32114                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 32115                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 32116                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32117                                  
 32118                                  gnradix:
 32119 00002B69 0000                    	dw	0		; Must be a word--16x16 multiplication
 32120                                  
 32121                                  toDigit:
 32122 00002B6B 2E833E[692B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 32123 00002B71 751C                    	jne	short td20	; Don't check hex digits if radix isn't 16
 32124                                  
 32125                                  toDigit_hex:
 32126 00002B73 80F961                  	cmp	cl,'a'	; 61h
 32127 00002B76 7209                    	jb	short td10
 32128 00002B78 80F966                  	cmp	cl,'f'	; 66h
 32129 00002B7B 7720                    	ja	short tdE	; Nothing valid above 'z' at all...
 32130 00002B7D 80E957                  	sub	cl,'a'-10 ; 57h	; Make 'a'==10 and return.
 32131                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 32132 00002B80 C3                      	retn
 32133                                  td10:	
 32134 00002B81 80F941                  	cmp	cl,'A'  ; 41h
 32135 00002B84 7209                    	jb	short td20	; Below 'A'?  Not a letter...
 32136 00002B86 80F946                  	cmp	cl,'F'	; 46h
 32137 00002B89 7712                    	ja	short tdE	; Above 'F'?  Not a digit.
 32138 00002B8B 80E937                  	sub	cl,'A'-10 ; 37h	; Make 'A'==10 and return.
 32139                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 32140 00002B8E C3                      	retn
 32141                                  toDigit_dec:
 32142                                  td20:	
 32143 00002B8F 80F930                  	cmp	cl,'0'		; If less than zero,
 32144                                  	;jb	short tdE	; Done.
 32145 00002B92 720A                    	jb	short tdEr ; 08/04/2019
 32146 00002B94 80F939                  	cmp	cl,'9'		; Or, if greater than nine,
 32147 00002B97 7704                    	ja	short tdE	; Done.
 32148 00002B99 80E930                  	sub	cl,'0'	; 30h	; Okay--make '0'==0 and return.
 32149                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 32150 00002B9C C3                      	retn
 32151                                  tdE:	
 32152 00002B9D F9                      	stc
 32153                                  tdEr:		; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 32154 00002B9E C3                      	retn
 32155                                  
 32156                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32157                                  ;*** GetXNum - reads a 32-bit ASCII number at ES:SI and returns it in DX:AX
 32158                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32159                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:SI points to an ascii string to scan
 32160                                  ; EXIT:     ES:SI moved to first invalid digit, DX:AX contains value read
 32161                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if # is too big, or has no digits (EOL possibly)
 32162                                  ; USES:     ES:SI, DX, AX, Flags, gnradix
 32163                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32164                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 32165                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 32166                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 32167                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32168                                  
 32169                                  ; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32170                                  
 32171                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32172                                  ; (SYSINIT:3109h)
 32173                                  
 32174                                  GetXNum:
 32175                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, ds>
 32176                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32177                                  	;push	bx
 32178 00002B9F 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32179                                  	;push	ds
 32180                                  
 32181 00002BA0 FC                      	cld
 32182 00002BA1 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32183 00002BA3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32184 00002BA5 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32185 00002BA7 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			; Start with 0 (makes sense)
 32186                                  
 32187 00002BA9 2EC706[692B]0A00        	mov	word [cs:gnradix],10	; And default to a radix of 10 (dec)
 32188                                  
 32189 00002BB0 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]		; Now AX=0, BX=0, CH=0/CL=char, DX=0
 32190                                  	;call	toDigit
 32191 00002BB3 E8D9FF                  	call	toDigit_dec
 32192                                  	;jc	short gxnE		; If it's not a digit, leave now.
 32193                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32194 00002BB6 7233                    	jc	short gxnX
 32195                                  
 32196 00002BB8 08C9                    	or	cl,cl
 32197 00002BBA 7517                    	jnz	short gxn20		; Doesn't have '0x'
 32198 00002BBC 268A4C01                	mov	cl,[es:si+1]
 32199 00002BC0 80F978                  	cmp	cl,'x'			; Either 'x'...
 32200 00002BC3 7405                    	je	short gxn10
 32201 00002BC5 80F958                  	cmp	cl,'X'			; ...or 'X' means it's hexadecimal
 32202 00002BC8 7509                    	jne	short gxn20
 32203                                  
 32204                                  gxn10:	
 32205 00002BCA 2EC706[692B]1000        	mov	word [cs:gnradix], 16
 32206 00002BD1 46                      	inc	si			; Since we read "0x", march over it.
 32207 00002BD2 46                      	inc	si
 32208                                  
 32209                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 32210                                  ; GXN20--ES:SI = a digit in a number; if not, we're done
 32211                                  ;        DX:AX = current total
 32212                                  ;        BX    = 0
 32213                                  ;        CH    = 0
 32214                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 32215                                  
 32216                                  gxn20:	
 32217 00002BD3 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 32218 00002BD6 46                      	inc	si
 32219                                  
 32220 00002BD7 E891FF                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 32221 00002BDA 720D                    	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 32222                                  
 32223 00002BDC E80E00                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 32224 00002BDF 720A                    	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 32225                                  
 32226 00002BE1 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 32227 00002BE3 11DA                    	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 iff last add wrapped
 32228                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 32229                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 32230 00002BE5 73EC                    	jnc	short gxn20
 32231                                  gxnE:	
 32232                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 32233 00002BE7 EB02                    	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 32234                                  gxnQ:	
 32235 00002BE9 4E                      	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 32236 00002BEA F8                      	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 32237                                  gxnX:	
 32238                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32239                                  	;pop	ds
 32240 00002BEB 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32241                                  	;pop	bx
 32242 00002BEC C3                      	retn

 32244                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32245                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 32246                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32247                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 32248                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 32249                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 32250                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 32251                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32252                                  
 32253                                  mul32:
 32254 00002BED 50                      	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 32255 00002BEE 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 32256 00002BF0 2EF726[692B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 32257 00002BF5 7211                    	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 32258                                  
 32259 00002BF7 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 32260 00002BF9 58                      	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 32261                                  
 32262 00002BFA 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 32263 00002BFC 2EF726[692B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry,  AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 32264 00002C01 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 32265 00002C03 01DA                    	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 32266 00002C05 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 32267 00002C07 C3                      	retn
 32268                                  m32E:	
 32269 00002C08 58                      	pop	ax
 32270 00002C09 C3                      	retn

 32272                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32273                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 32274                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32275                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 32276                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 32277                                  ; ERROR:   None

 32291 00002C10 B10C                    	mov	cl,12

 32298                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32299                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 32300                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32301                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 32302                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 32303                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 32304                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 32305                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32306                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 32307                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 32308                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 32309                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 32310                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32312                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 32384                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32385                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 32386                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32387                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 32388                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 32389                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 32390                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 32391                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32392                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 32393                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 32394                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 32395                                  ;      ...
 32396                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 32397                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32398                                  
 32399                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32400                                  AddrToUmb:
 32401                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32402                                  	;push	cx
 32403                                  	;push	dx
 32404 00002C35 06                      	push	es
 32405                                  
 32406 00002C36 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 32407                                  
 32408 00002C38 E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 32409 00002C3B 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 32410                                  
 32411                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32412                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 32413 00002C3D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 32414                                  
 32415                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32416                                  atu10:
 32417 00002C3F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 32418                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 32419                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 32420                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 32421                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 32422                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 32423                                  
 32424                                  ;atu10:	
 32425                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 32426 00002C41 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 32427 00002C43 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 32428                                  
 32429 00002C45 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 32430 00002C48 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 32431                                  
 32432 00002C4A 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 32433                                  atu20:	
 32434                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32435                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32436                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32437                                  	; ax = es
 32438                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 32439 00002C4B 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32440 00002C50 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32441 00002C56 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32442                                  
 32443                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 32444                                  
 32445                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 32446                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 32447                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32448 00002C58 40                      	inc	ax
 32449                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32450                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32451 00002C59 EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 32452                                  
 32453                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32454                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 32455                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 32456                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32457                                  
 32458                                  atu30:	
 32459                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32460                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 32461                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 32462                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 32463 00002C5B 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 32464 00002C5D 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 32465                                  atuE:	
 32466 00002C5F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 32467 00002C61 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 32468                                  atuX:	
 32469 00002C62 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 32470                                  	
 32471 00002C64 07                      	pop	es	
 32472                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32473                                  	;pop	dx
 32474                                  	;pop	cx
 32475 00002C65 C3                      	retn
 32476                                  
 32477                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32478                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 32479                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 32480                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 32481                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 32482                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32483                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 32484                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 32485                                  ; ERROR:  None
 32486                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX

 32491 00002C66 2E833E[692B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16

 32499 00002C72 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 32500 00002C74 48                      	dec	ax
 32501                                  cu10:	
 32502 00002C75 C3                      	retn

 32537                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 32538                                  ; ERROR:  None

 32540                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32541                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 32542                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 32543                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)

 32562                                  	retn

 32565                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 32566                                  
 32567                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32568                                  	retn
 32569                                  
 32570                                  	;mov	al,1
 32571                                  	;clc
 32572                                  ;llX:
 32573                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 32574                                  	;retn
 32575                                  
 32576                                  %endif

 33039                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33040                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 33041                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 33042                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33043                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33044                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 33045                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 33046                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 33047                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33048                                  
 33049                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33050                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 33051                                  findUMB:
 33052                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33053                                  	;push	ax
 33054                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33055 00002D3E 51                      	push	cx ; *
 33056                                  	;push	dx
 33057                                  
 33058 00002D3F 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 33059                                  
 33060 00002D41 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 33061                                  
 33062 00002D43 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 33063                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33064                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 33065 00002D46 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 33066                                  
 33067                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33068                                  fu10:
 33069 00002D48 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 33070                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33071                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 33072                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 33073                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 33074                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33075                                  
 33076                                  ;fu10:	
 33077 00002D4A 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 33078 00002D4C 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 33079                                  
 33080 00002D4E E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 33081 00002D51 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 33082                                  
 33083 00002D53 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 33084                                  fu20:	
 33085                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33086                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33087                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33088 00002D54 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 33089 00002D5A 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 33090                                  
 33091                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 33092                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33093                                  	; ax = es
 33094                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 33095                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 33096 00002D5C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33097 00002D61 40                      	inc	ax
 33098                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33099                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 33100 00002D62 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 33101                                  fuE:	
 33102 00002D64 F9                      	stc
 33103                                  fuX:
 33104                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33105                                  	;pop	dx
 33106                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33107 00002D65 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 33108                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 33109 00002D66 C3                      	retn
 33110                                  
 33111                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33112                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 33113                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33114                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33115                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 33116                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 33117                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 33118                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33119                                  
 33120                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 33121                                  BigFree:
 33122                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33123                                  	;push	bx
 33124 00002D67 51                      	push	cx
 33125                                  
 33126 00002D68 E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 33127 00002D6B 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 33128                                  
 33129 00002D6D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 33130 00002D6F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 33131                                  
 33132                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33133                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 33134                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 33135                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 33136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33137                                  
 33138                                  bf10:	
 33139 00002D71 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 33140 00002D74 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 33141                                  
 33142                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 33143 00002D76 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 33144 00002D7C 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 33145                                  
 33146 00002D7E 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33147                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 33148 00002D82 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 33149                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 33150                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33151 00002D84 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 33152                                  
 33153 00002D86 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 33154                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 33155 00002D88 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 33156                                  
 33157                                  bf20:	
 33158                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33159                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 33160                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33161                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 33162 00002D8A 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33163 00002D90 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 33164                                  
 33165                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 33166 00002D92 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 33167                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 33168 00002D94 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33169 00002D99 40                      	inc     ax
 33170 00002D9A 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 33171                                  
 33172 00002D9C EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 33173                                  
 33174 00002D9E 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 33175 00002DA0 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 33176 00002DA2 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33177 00002DA4 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 33178                                  bfE:	
 33179 00002DA6 F9                      	stc
 33180                                  bfX:
 33181 00002DA7 59                      	pop	cx
 33182                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33183                                  	;pop	bx
 33184 00002DA8 C3                      	retn
 33185                                  
 33186                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33187                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 33188                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33189                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33190                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 33191                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33192                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33193                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33194

 33197                                  isSpecified:

 33199                                  	;push	ax
 33200                                  
 33201 00002DA9 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 33202 00002DAB 88C3                    	mov	bl,al

 33205                                  	;

 33210                                  	;pop	ds
 33211                                  	
 33212                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 33213                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33214                                  	; ds = cs
 33215 00002DAD 8A87[161F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 33216

 33224                                  
 33225                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33226                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 33227                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33228                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 33229                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 33230                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 33231                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33232                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33233                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 33234                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 33235                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 33236                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 33237                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 33238                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33239                                  
 33240                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 33241                                  
 33242                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33243                                  
 33244                                  shrinkMCB:
 33245                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 33246                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33247                                  	;push	bx
 33248 00002DB4 51                      	push	cx
 33249 00002DB5 06                      	push	es
 33250                                  
 33251 00002DB6 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 33252                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33253                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 33254                                  
 33255 00002DB8 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33256                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33257 00002DBD 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 33258                                  
 33259 00002DBF 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 33260                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 33261                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 33262                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 33263                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33264                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 33265                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33266 00002DC2 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 33267 00002DC4 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 33268                                  
 33269 00002DC6 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33270                                  	
 33271                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33272                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33273 00002DCB 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33274                                  
 33275 00002DCD 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 33276 00002DD2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 33277                                  
 33278 00002DD8 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 33279 00002DDA 40                      	inc	ax
 33280 00002DDB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 33281                                  
 33282 00002DDD 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 33283 00002DDF 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 33284                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33285                                  	; ax > 0
 33286 00002DE1 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 33287                                  
 33288                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33289 00002DE2 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 33290                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 33291 00002DE7 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 33292                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 33293                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 33294                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 33295                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 33296                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 33297                                  
 33298                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33299 00002DEB E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 33300                                  
 33301                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33302                                  	; cf=0
 33303                                  	;clc
 33304                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33305                                  	;jmp	short smX
 33306                                  smE:	
 33307                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33308                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 33309                                  	;stc
 33310                                  smX:	
 33311                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 33312 00002DEE 07                      	pop	es
 33313 00002DEF 59                      	pop	cx
 33314                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33315                                  	;pop	bx
 33316 00002DF0 C3                      	retn

 33318                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33319                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 33320                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33321                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 33322                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 33323                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33324                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 33325                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33326                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 33327                                  ;
 33328                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 33329                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 33330                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 33331                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 33332                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 33333                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 33334                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 33335                                  ;       Endif
 33336                                  ;    Endif
 33337                                  ; Endif
 33338                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 33339                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 33340                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 33341                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 33342                                  ;    ENDIF
 33343                                  ; ENDIF
 33344                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33345                                  
 33346                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33347                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 33348                                  _hideUMB_:
 33349                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33350                                  	; ds = cs
 33351                                  
 33352                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33353                                  	;push	bx
 33354                                  	;push	dx
 33355 00002DF1 06                      	push	es
 33356                                  
 33357 00002DF2 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33358 00002DF4 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 33359 00002DF7 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 33360                                  
 33361 00002DF9 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 33362 00002DFB E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 33363 00002DFE 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 33364                                  
 33365 00002E00 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 33366 00002E01 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 33367 00002E03 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 33368 00002E06 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 33369                                  
 33370 00002E07 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 33371 00002E09 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 33372                                  
 33373 00002E0B 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 33374 00002E0D 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 33375                                  
 33376 00002E0F 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 33377 00002E11 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 33378 00002E14 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 33379                                  hu_10:	
 33380                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 33381                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 33382                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33383                                  ;isTiny:
 33384                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 33385                                  	;or	al,al
 33386 00002E16 800E[121F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 33387 00002E1B 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 33388                                  
 33389 00002E1D E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 33390 00002E20 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 33391                                  
 33392 00002E22 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 33393 00002E24 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 33394                                  
 33395 00002E26 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 33396 00002E28 E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 33397 00002E2B 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 33398                                  
 33399 00002E2D 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33400                                  hu_30:	
 33401 00002E2F 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33402                                  
 33403 00002E31 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 33404                                  
 33405 00002E34 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 33406 00002E36 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 33407                                  
 33408 00002E38 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 33409 00002E3A E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 33410                                  hu_X:	
 33411 00002E3D 07                      	pop	es
 33412                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33413                                  	;pop	dx
 33414                                  	;pop	bx
 33415 00002E3E C3                      	retn
 33416                                  
 33417                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33418                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 33419                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33420                                  ; Entry:  None
 33421                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 33422                                  ; Error:  None
 33423                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 33424                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33425                                  
 33426                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33427                                  UnFreeze:

 33431

 33433 00002E43 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 33434                                  
 33435                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33436                                  uf10:
 33437 00002E45 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 33438

 33641                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34024                                  ;
 34025                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 34026                                  ;
 34027                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 34028                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 34029                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 34030                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 34031                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 34032                                  ;
 34033                                  ;	Output : none
 34034                                  ;
 34035                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 34036                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 34037                                  ;
 34038                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34039                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 34040                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 34041                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 34042                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 34043                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34044                                  
 34045                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34046                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34047                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 34048                                  InitDevLoad:
 34049                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34050                                  	;push	es ; *
 34051                                  
 34052                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34053                                  	; ds = cs
 34054 00002FD0 803E[671F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34055                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 34056                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 34057 00002FD5 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 34058                                  
 34059                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34060                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34061                                  ; %if 0
 34062                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34063 00002FD7 803E[571F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34064                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34065 00002FDC 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 34066                                  
 34067                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 34068                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 34069                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 34070                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 34071                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 34072                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 34073                                  
 34074 00002FDE E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 34075                                  
 34076 00002FE1 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 34077 00002FE4 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 34078 00002FE7 E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 34079 00002FEA 9C                      	pushf
 34080 00002FEB E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 34081 00002FEE 9D                      	popf
 34082                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 34083                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 34084                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34085 00002FEF EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 34086                                  
 34087                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 34088                                  
 34089                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34090                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 34091                                  InitForConv:
 34092                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34093                                  	; ds = cs
 34094 00002FF1 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 34095                                  					;  current UMB ?
 34096 00002FF4 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 34097 00002FF6 E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 34098 00002FF9 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 34099                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 34100 00002FFC 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 34101                                  					;  in low memory
 34102                                  InitForHi:
 34103                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34104                                  	; ds = cs
 34105                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 34106                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 34107                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 34108 00002FFE A1[5D1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 34109 00003001 8B16[591F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34110 00003005 0316[5B1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 34111 00003009 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 34112                                  
 34113                                  InitForLo:
 34114                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34115                                  	; ds = cs
 34116                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 34117 0000300B C606[671F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34118                                  initforlo_x:
 34119                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34120                                  	; ds = cs
 34121                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 34122                                  					;  we are loading low
 34123                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 34124                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 34125 00003010 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 34126 00003013 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 34127                                  idl1:
 34128 00003017 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 34129                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34130                                  	; ds = cs
 34131                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 34132                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 34133                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 34134                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 34135 0000301A A3[4B1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 34136 0000301D 8916[4D1F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 34137 00003021 C706[4F1F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 34138 00003027 A3[511F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 34139                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34140                                  	;pop	es ; *
 34141 0000302A C3                      	retn
 34142                                  
 34143                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34144                                  ;
 34145                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 34146                                  ;
 34147                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 34148                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 34149                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 34150                                  ;		   current UMB
 34151                                  ;
 34152                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34153                                  
 34154                                  SpaceInUMB:
 34155                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34156                                  	; ds = cs
 34157                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 34158                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 34159                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 34160 0000302B A1[5B1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 34161 0000302E 0306[591F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 34162 00003032 2B06[5D1F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 34163                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34164                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 34165                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 34166                                  	;stc
 34167                                  	;retn
 34168                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34169 00003036 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 34170 00003039 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 34171                                  spcinumb1:
 34172 0000303B 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 34173                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34174                                  	; ds = cs
 34175 0000303C 3B06[491F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 34176                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 34177                                  spcinumb2:
 34178 00003040 C3                      	retn
 34179                                  
 34180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34181                                  ;
 34182                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 34183                                  ;
 34184                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 34185                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 34186                                  ;
 34187                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34188                                  
 34189                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34190                                  ;
 34191                                  ;PrepareMark:
 34192                                  ;	push	ds
 34193                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 34194                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 34195                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 34196                                  ;	pop	ds
 34197                                  ;
 34198                                  ;	inc	ax
 34199                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 34200                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 34201                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 34202                                  ;	retn
 34203                                  
 34204                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34205                                  ;
 34206                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 34207                                  ;
 34208                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 34209                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 34210                                  ;		 the device.
 34211                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 34212                                  ;
 34213                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 34214                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 34215                                  ;	UMB.
 34216                                  ;
 34217                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 34218                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 34219                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 34220                                  ;
 34221                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34222                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34223                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 34224                                  
 34225                                  GetUMBForDev:
 34226                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34227                                  	; ds = cs
 34228 00003041 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 34229 00003044 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 34230 00003047 CD21                    	int	21h
 34231                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 34232                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 34233                                  
 34234 00003049 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 34235                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 34236                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34237 0000304B 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 34238                                  
 34239 0000304D 4B                      	dec	bx
 34240                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34241                                  	; ds = cs

 34243                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 34244 00003052 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 34245                                  
 34246 00003054 43                      	inc	bx
 34247                                  
 34248 00003055 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 34249 00003058 CD21                    	int	21h
 34250 0000305A 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 34251                                  
 34252                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34253                                  	;dec	ax
 34254                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 34255                                  	;
 34256                                  PrepareMark:
 34257 0000305C 1E                      	push	ds
 34258 0000305D 48                      	dec	ax
 34259 0000305E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34260 00003060 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 34261 00003066 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 34262 0000306C 40                      	inc	ax
 34263 0000306D 1F                      	pop	ds
 34264                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34265                                  	; ds = cs
 34266                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 34267                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax

 34274                                  	; 11/12/2022

 34276                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 34277 00003078 C3                      	retn
 34278                                  
 34279                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34280                                  %if 1
 34281                                  gufd_err:
 34282 00003079 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 34283                                  gufd_error:

 34285 0000307D F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 34286 0000307E EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 34287                                  %endif

 34290                                  %if 0

 34292                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0

 34306                                  ;
 34307                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 34308                                  ;
 34309                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 34310                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 34311                                  ;
 34312                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 34313                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 34314                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 34315                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 34316                                  ;
 34317                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 34318                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 34319                                  ;
 34320                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34321                                  
 34322                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34323                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)

 34328                                  	;push	di

 34331 00003083 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 34333 0000308B 40                      	inc	ax
 34334 0000308C 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax

 34337                                  
 34338 00003090 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 34339

 34342                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 34343 00003091 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]

 34345 00003095 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 34346 00003097 FC                      	cld
 34347                                  dsm_again:

 34349 00003099 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 34350 0000309B 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 34351 0000309D 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 34352 0000309F EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 34353                                  isit_slash:

 34355 000030A3 7504                    	jne	short isit_null

 34357 000030A7 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 34358                                  isit_null:

 34360 000030AB 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 34361 000030AD 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 34362                                  
 34363 000030AF BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 34364 000030B2 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 34365                                  dsm_next_char:

 34373                                  blankout:

 34377                                  dsm_exit:

 34379 000030C8 5E                      	pop	si
 34380 000030C9 1F                      	pop	ds
 34381                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34382                                  	;pop	di
 34383 000030CA 07                      	pop	es
 34384 000030CB C3                      	retn

 34701                                  ;	Parses the command line for SIZE= command
 34702                                  ;

 34714

 34716                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3871h) - Retro DOS v4.2 -
 34717                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3D6Eh)  - Retro DOS v5.0 -

 34724

 34838                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34839                                  ;
 34840                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34841                                  ;
 34842                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34843                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34844                                  ;
 34845                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 34846                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34847                                  ;
 34848                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34849                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34850                                  ;
 34851                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34852                                  
 34853                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34854                                  
 34855                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34856                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34857                                  
 34858                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34859                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34860                                  GetHexNum:
 34861 00003204 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34862 00003206 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34863                                  ghn_next:
 34864 00003208 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34865 0000320B 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34866 0000320E 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34867 00003210 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34868 00003213 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34869 00003215 50                      	push	ax
 34870 00003216 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34871 00003218 E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34872 0000321B 58                      	pop	ax
 34873                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34874 0000321C B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34875 0000321F 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34876 00003221 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34877                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34878                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34879 00003224 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34880                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34881                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34882                                  ghn_shift1:
 34883 00003226 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34884 00003228 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34885 0000322A E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34886 0000322C 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34887 0000322E 46                      	inc	si
 34888 0000322F EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34889                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34890 00003231 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34891 00003234 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34892 00003237 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34893 0000323B 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34894                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34895                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34896                                  ghn_shift2:
 34897 0000323D F8                      	clc
 34898 0000323E D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34899 00003240 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34900 00003242 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34901 00003244 F8                      	clc
 34902 00003245 C3                      	retn
 34903                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34904                                  ghn_err:
 34905                                  gnib_err:
 34906 00003246 F9                      	stc
 34907                                  ghn_ret:
 34908                                  gnib_ret:
 34909 00003247 C3                      	retn

 34911                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34912                                  ;
 34913                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34914                                  ;
 34915                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34916                                  ;
 34917                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34918                                  ;
 34919                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34920                                  ;
 34921                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34922                                  
 34923                                  GetNibble:
 34924 00003248 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34925                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34926                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34927 0000324B 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34928 0000324D 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34929 00003250 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34930 00003252 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34931 00003255 C3                      	retn
 34932                                  is_it_hex:
 34933 00003256 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 34934                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34935                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34936 00003259 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34937 0000325B 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34938 0000325E 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34939 00003260 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34940 00003263 C3                      	retn
 34941                                  
 34942                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34943                                  ;gnib_err:
 34944                                  ;	stc
 34945                                  ;gnib_ret:
 34946                                  ;	retn

 34953                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 34954                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
