 34961                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34962                                  ;
 34963                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34964                                  ;
 34965                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34966                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34967                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34968                                  ;			; DS = data
 34969                                  ;
 34970                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34971                                  ;
 34972                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34973                                  ;
 34974                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34975                                  
 34976                                  umb_insert:
 34977 00003264 1E                      	push	ds
 34978                                  
 34979                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34980                                  	; ds = cs
 34981                                  
 34982                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34983 00003265 8E1E[761F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34984                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34985 00003269 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34986 0000326D 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34987 0000326F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34988                                  ui_next:
 34989 00003271 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34990                                  					;    new block
 34991 00003273 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34992                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34993                                  					;    last
 34994 00003275 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34995 0000327B 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34996                                  					; N: get next block
 34997 0000327D 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34998                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34999 0000327F E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35000 00003282 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 35001                                  
 35002                                  ui_insert:
 35003 00003284 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 35004 00003286 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 35005                                  
 35006 00003287 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 35007 00003289 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 35008                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 35009 0000328B C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35010                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 35011 00003290 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35012                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 35013 00003296 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 35014                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 35015 0000329A C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35016                                  
 35017                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35018                                  
 35019 000032A0 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35020 000032A2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35021 000032A8 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 35022                                  					; mark as free
 35023 000032AF 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 35024                                  					; start & end of new block
 35025 000032B2 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 35026                                  
 35027                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 35028                                  	
 35029 000032B7 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 35030 000032B9 43                      	inc	bx
 35031 000032BA 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 35032 000032BC 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 35033                                  
 35034                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 35035                                  					; this block
 35036 000032BD 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 35037                                  	
 35038 000032BF 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35039 000032C5 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35040 000032CC 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35041 000032D0 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35042                                  
 35043 000032D7 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 35044                                  
 35045                                  ui_append:
 35046                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 35047 000032D9 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 35048 000032DE 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 35049                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 35050                                  					; block for the next arena.
 35051                                  	; 13/05/2019
 35052 000032E4 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35053                                  
 35054 000032EA 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 35055 000032EC 40                      	inc	ax
 35056 000032ED 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 35057                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 35058 000032EF F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35059                                  
 35060 000032F1 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 35061                                  
 35062 000032F3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35063 000032F9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35064 00003300 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35065 00003304 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 35066                                  
 35067                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35068 0000330B 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35069 0000330D 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 35070 00003313 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 35071                                  					; mark as free
 35072 0000331A 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35073 0000331B 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35074                                  ui_done:
 35075                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 35076 00003320 1F                      	pop	ds
 35077                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 35078                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35079                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 35080 00003321 C3                      	retn

 35095                                  au_next:
 35096 00003327 E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 35097 0000332A 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 35098 0000332C E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 35099 0000332F EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 35100                                  au_coalesce:
 35101                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35102                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 35103                                  ;au_exit:
 35104                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 35105                                  ;	; ds = cs
 35106                                  ;	retn
 35107                                  
 35108                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35109                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 35110                                  
 35111                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35112                                  
 35113                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35114                                  
 35115                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35116                                  ;
 35117                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 35118                                  ;
 35119                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 35120                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 35121                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 35122                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 35123                                  ;
 35124                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 35125                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 35126                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 35127                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 35128                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 35129                                  ;
 35130                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35131                                  
 35132                                  umb_coalesce:
 35133                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35134                                  	; ds = cs
 35135 00003331 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 35136                                  
 35137 00003332 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 35138                                  
 35139                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35140                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35141 00003334 8E06[761F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35142 00003338 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 35143                                  uc_nextfree:
 35144 0000333D 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35145 0000333F 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35146                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 35147 00003341 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 35148 00003346 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 35149                                  					; N: get next arena
 35150 00003348 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35151 0000334B 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35152 0000334D EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 35153                                  uc_again:
 35154 0000334F E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35155 00003352 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35156                                  uc_check:
 35157 00003354 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 35158 00003359 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 35159                                  					; Y: coalesce
 35160 0000335B 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 35161 00003360 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 35162                                  	;add	[3],cx
 35163 00003361 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 35164 00003365 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 35165 00003368 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 35166 0000336A EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 35167                                  
 35168                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35169                                  ;uc_done:
 35170                                  	;retn

 35190 0000337C CD2F                    	int	2Fh

 35208                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 35209                                  ia_1:

 35219                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35220                                  ;
 35221                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 35222                                  ;
 35223                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 35224                                  ;
 35225                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 35226                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 35227                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 35228                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 35229                                  ;				NC
 35230                                  ;			  else 
 35231                                  ;				CY
 35232                                  ;
 35233                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 35234                                  ;
 35235                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35236                                  
 35237                                  umb_allocate:
 35238                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35239                                  	; ds = cs
 35240 0000339A 50                      	push	ax
 35241 0000339B B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 35242 0000339D BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 35243                                  					;   possible
 35244                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35245 000033A0 FF1E[5F1F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 35246                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 35247                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 35248                                  					; the largest UMB
 35249 000033A4 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 35250 000033A6 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 35251                                  	
 35252 000033A8 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 35253                                  
 35254                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35255 000033AA FF1E[5F1F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 35256                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 35257                                  
 35258 000033AE 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 35259                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 35260                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35261 000033B1 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 35262                                  ua_err:
 35263 000033B3 F9                      	stc	
 35264                                  
 35265                                  	;clc
 35266                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35267                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35268                                  	; cf=0
 35269                                  	;clc 
 35270                                  ua_done:
 35271 000033B4 58                      	pop	ax
 35272 000033B5 C3                      	retn
 35273                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35274                                  ;ua_err:
 35275                                  	;stc
 35276                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 35278                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35279                                  ;
 35280                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 35281                                  ;
 35282                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 35283                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 35284                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 35285                                  ;
 35286                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35287                                  
 35288                                  	; 01/11/2022
 35289                                  get_next:
 35290 000033B6 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35291 000033BB 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 35292                                  _get_next_:

 35294 000033BF 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 35295 000033C3 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 35296 000033C4 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35297                                  	;clc
 35298                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35299                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35300                                  	; cf=0
 35301                                  	;clc
 35302 000033C6 C3                      	retn
 35303                                  gn_err:
 35304 000033C7 F9                      	stc
 35305                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 35306                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 35307 000033C8 C3                      	retn

 35310                                  ;
 35311                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 35312                                  ;
 35313                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35314

 35316                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 35317                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 35318                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35319                                  	; ds = cs
 35320 000033C9 E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 35321 000033CC 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 35322                                  
 35323                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 35324                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 35325                                  
 35326                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35327                                  	; ds = cs
 35328                                  
 35329 000033CE CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 35330 000033D0 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 35331 000033D2 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 35332                                  
 35333 000033D4 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 35334 000033D6 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 35335                                  
 35336 000033D8 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35337                                  
 35338                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 35339                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35340 000033DA 49                      	dec	cx
 35341 000033DB 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 35342                                  	
 35343 000033DD 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35344 000033E3 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35345                                  					
 35346 000033EA 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35347 000033EE 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35348                                  
 35349                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 35350                                  
 35351 000033F5 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 35352 000033F7 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35353 000033FD 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 35354                                  					; mark as free 
 35355 00003404 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35356 00003405 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35357                                  
 35358                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35359                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35360 0000340A 8E06[761F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 35361                                  	; 18/09/2023
 35362 0000340E 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 35363                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 35364                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 35365                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 35366                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 35367                                  
 35368                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 35369                                  
 35370                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 35371                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 35372                                  	; 18/09/2023

 35374 00003418 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 35375                                  ;scan_next
 35376                                  ; 09/12/2022
 35377                                  scannext:
 35378 0000341A 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 35379 0000341E 740C                    	je	short got_last
 35380

 35383 00003427 40                      	inc	ax
 35384 00003428 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35385                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 35386                                  	; 09/12/2022
 35387 0000342A EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 35388                                  got_last:
 35389                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 35390                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35391 0000342C 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 35392                                  
 35393 00003431 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35394                                  	;clc
 35395                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35396                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35397                                  	; cf=0
 35398                                  	;clc
 35399 00003437 C3                      	retn
 35400                                  
 35401                                  ; 11/12/2022
 35402                                  ;;lfu_err:
 35403                                  ;	;stc
 35404                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35405                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 35406                                  ;	; cf=1
 35407                                  ;	;stc
 35408                                  ;	retn

 35411                                  ;
 35412                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 35413                                  ;
 35414                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 35415                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 35416                                  ;
 35417                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35418                                  
 35419                                  ShrinkUMB:
 35420                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35421                                  	; ds = cs
 35422 00003438 833E[591F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 35423                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 35424 0000343D 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 35425 0000343F 06                      	push	es
 35426                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35427                                  	;push	bx
 35428                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35429                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 35430                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35431                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35432 00003440 8B1E[5D1F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 35433 00003444 2B1E[591F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 35434 00003448 8E06[591F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 35435                                  	
 35436 0000344C B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 35437 0000344F CD21                    	int	21h
 35438                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 35439                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 35440                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 35441 00003451 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35442 00003453 48                      	dec	ax
 35443 00003454 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35444 00003456 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 35445                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35446                                  	;pop	bx
 35447 0000345D 07                      	pop	es
 35448                                  su_exit:
 35449 0000345E C3                      	retn

 35458                                  
 35459                                  UnlinkUMB:
 35460                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35461                                  	; ds = cs
 35462 0000345F 1E                      	push	ds
 35463 00003460 06                      	push	es
 35464                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35465 00003461 803E[751F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 35466                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 35467 00003466 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 35468                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35469 00003468 8E06[761F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35470                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 35471 0000346C 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 35472 00003471 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 35473                                  ulu_next:
 35474 00003476 E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 35475 00003479 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 35476 0000347B 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 35477 0000347D 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 35478 0000347F 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35479 00003481 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 35480                                  ulu_found:
 35481                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 35482 00003483 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35483                                  ulu_x:
 35484 00003488 07                      	pop	es
 35485 00003489 1F                      	pop	ds
 35486 0000348A C3                      	retn

 35488                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35489                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 35490                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35491                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35492                                  
 35493                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35494                                  ;
 35495                                  ; Summary:
 35496                                  ;
 35497                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 35498                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 35499                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 35500                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 35501                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 35502                                  ;
 35503                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 35504                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 35505                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 35506                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 35507                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 35508                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 35509                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 35510                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 35511                                  ;
 35512                                  ; Example:
 35513                                  ;
 35514                                  ;   [menu]
 35515                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 35516                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 35517                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 35518                                  ;
 35519                                  ;   [network]
 35520                                  ;   include misc
 35521                                  ;   device=foo
 35522                                  ;
 35523                                  ;   [misc]
 35524                                  ;   device=bar
 35525                                  ;   include alternate
 35526                                  ;
 35527                                  ;   [alternate]
 35528                                  ;   device=tar
 35529                                  ;
 35530                                  ;
 35531                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 35532                                  ;
 35533                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 35534                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 35535                                  ;
 35536                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 35537                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 35538                                  ;   following order:
 35539                                  ;
 35540                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 35541                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 35542                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 35543                                  ;
 35544                                  
 35545                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 35546                                  
 35547                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 35548                                  
 35549                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 35550                                  
 35551                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 35552                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 35553                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 35554                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 35555                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 35556                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 35557                                  
 35558                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35559                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35560                                  
 35561                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 35562                                  
 35563                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35564                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 35565                                  
 35566 0000348B 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 35567

 35592                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 35593 0000349A BA[1F48]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters

 35602 000034A3 CD21                    	int	21h
 35603

 35605 000034A5 8A26[4849]              	mov	ah,[switches]
 35606                                  	;mov	al,[deviceparameters+20]
 35607 000034A9 A0[3348]                	mov	al,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35608 000034AC 8A0E[4749]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 35609                                  ;
 35610                                  ;; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35611                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 35612                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 35613                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 35614                                  ;	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 35615                                  ;	;mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 35616                                  ;
 35617                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35618                                  ;	;;test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35619                                  ;	;test	byte [cs:switches],flagec35
 35620                                  ;	;jz	short not_ec35
 35621                                  ;
 35622                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35623                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35624                                  ;	;;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35625                                  ;	; 12/12/2022

 35627                                  ;	;jz	short eot_ok

 35649 000034BE 0826[2005]              	or	[ec35_flag],ah

 35654                                  not_ec35:

 35702                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35703                                  ;
 35704                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35705                                  ;
 35706                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35707                                  ;
 35708                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35709                                  
 35710                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35711                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35712                                  
 35713                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35714                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35715                                  parseline:
 35716                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35717                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35718                                  
 35719                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35720                                  
 35721                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35722                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35723                                  
 35724                                  nextswtch:
 35725                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35726                                  	je	short done_line
 35727                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35728                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35729                                  
 35730                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35731                                  
 35732                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35733                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35734                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35735                                  	je	short getparm
 35736                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35737                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35738                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35739                                  swterr:
 35740                                  	retn
 35741                                  
 35742                                  getparm:
 35743                                  	call	check_switch
 35744                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35745                                  	jc	short swterr
 35746                                  getnext:
 35747                                  	call	getchr
 35748                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35749                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch

 35752                                  ;swterr:
 35753                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35754

 35781                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35782                                  	retn

 35785                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35786                                  	jmp	short done_line

 35791                                  ;
 35792                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35793                                  ;
 35794                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35795                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35796                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35797                                  ; error.
 35798                                  ;
 35799                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35800                                  
 35801                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35802                                  
 35803                                  err_swtch:
 35804 000034ED 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35805                                  err_check:
 35806 000034EF F9                      	stc
 35807                                  err_chk:
 35808                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35809 000034F0 C3                      	retn
 35810                                  
 35811                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)

 35818 000034F8 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'

 35874                                  ; further on (hopefully).

 35890                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35891                                  ;
 35892                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35893                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35894                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35895                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35896                                  ;
 35897                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 35917                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35918 0000354E 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35919                                  
 35920                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35921

 35923 00003550 A2[2048]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35924                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35925                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35926                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35927                                  	; cf=0
 35928 00003553 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35929                                  try_t:

 35931 00003556 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35932                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35942                                  	; cf=0

 35948 00003564 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 35949 00003566 A3[4549]                	mov	[slim],ax
 35950                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35951                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35952                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35953                                  	; cf=0
 35954 00003569 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35955                                  
 35956                                  ; must be for number of heads
 35957

 35963                                  	; 12/12/2022

 36067                                  ;
 36068                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 36069                                  ;
 36070                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 36071                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 36072                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 36073                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 36074                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 36075                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 36076                                  ;
 36077                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 36078                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 36079                                  ;
 36080                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 36081                                  ;
 36082                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36083                                  
 36084                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36085                                  
 36086                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36087                                  
 36088                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36089                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 36090                                  
 36091                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36092                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 36093                                  
 36094                                  setdeviceparameters:
 36095                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36096                                  	; ds = cs
 36097                                  
 36098 000035B0 06                      	push	es
 36099                                  
 36100 000035B1 0E                      	push	cs
 36101 000035B2 07                      	pop	es
 36102                                  
 36103 000035B3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 36104 000035B5 8A1E[2048]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 36105 000035B9 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 36106 000035BC 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 36107                                  
 36108 000035BE C706[2348]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 36109                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 36110                                  got_80:
 36111 000035C4 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 36112 000035C6 8BB7[C849]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 36113                                  
 36114                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 36115                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36116 000035CA BF[2648]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 36117 000035CD B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 36118                                  	; 09/09/2023
 36119                                  	;mov	cx,59 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM A_BPB.size
 36120 000035D0 FC                      	cld
 36121                                  	;repe	movsb
 36122                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36123 000035D1 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 36124                                  
 36125 000035D3 07                      	pop	es
 36126                                  
 36127                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36128 000035D4 F606[4849]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 36129                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 36130 000035D9 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 36131                                  
 36132 000035DB A1[4549]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 36133                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 36134 000035DE A3[3348]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 36135                                  
 36136                                  see_heads:
 36137                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36138 000035E1 F606[4849]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 36139                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 36140 000035E6 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 36141

 36143                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 36144 000035EB A3[3548]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 36145                                  
 36146                                  heads_not_altered:
 36147                                  
 36148                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 36149                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 36150                                  
 36151                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 36152                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36153                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 36154                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36155 000035EE B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 36156 000035F1 A2[2848]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 36157                                  
 36158 000035F4 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 36159                                  
 36160                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 36161                                  
 36162                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 36163                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36164 000035F6 8A3E[3048]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 36165                                  	
 36166                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36167                                  	; ax = 2
 36168 000035FA 3906[3548]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 36169                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 36170 000035FE 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 36171                                  
 36172 00003600 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 36173                                  
 36174                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 36175                                  
 36176 00003602 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 36177                                  
 36178                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 36179                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 36180                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 36181                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 36182                                  
 36183                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 36184                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 36185                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 36186                                  
 36187 00003604 833E[3348]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 36188 00003609 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 36189 0000360B 833E[2348]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 36190 00003610 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 36191                                  
 36192                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 36193                                  
 36194 00003612 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 36195                                  
 36196                                  ;	check for 320K
 36197                                  
 36198                                  not_144m:
 36199 00003614 833E[2348]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 36200 00003619 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 36201 0000361B 833E[3348]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 36202 00003620 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 36203                                  
 36204 00003622 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 36205 00003624 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 36206                                  
 36207                                  only_one_head:
 36208                                  
 36209                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 36210                                  
 36211 00003626 803E[2048]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 36212 0000362B 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 36213                                  
 36214                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 36215                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 36216                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 36217                                  
 36218 0000362D B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 36219 0000362F 833E[3348]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 36220                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36221 00003634 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 36222                                  
 36223 00003636 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 36224                                  
 36225                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 36226                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 36227                                  
 36228                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 36229                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36230                                  	; ax = 2
 36231 00003638 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 36232 00003639 A2[2848]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 36233                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1

 36695 000037F4 803E[5403]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 36696                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 36697 000037F9 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 36698 000037FB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 36699 000037FD 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf

 36701 00003801 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N:

 36703 00003808 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 36704 00003809 FE06[8B34]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 36705                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been

 36708                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 36709

 36715                                  	; 03/01/2023

 36799                                  ;
 36800                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36801                                  ;
 36802                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36803                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36804                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36805                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36806                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36807                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36808                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36809                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36810                                  ;
 36811                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36812                                  
 36813                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36814                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 36815                                  
 36816                                  skip_comment:
 36817 00003858 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 36818                                  
 36819                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36820                                  	; ds = cs	
 36821                                  
 36822 0000385A 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 36823                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 36824 0000385F 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 36825                                  
 36826 00003861 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 36827                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 36828 00003866 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 36829                                  
 36830 00003868 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36831                                  	
 36832 0000386B 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 36833                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 36834 0000386F 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 36835                                  
 36836 00003871 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 36837                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 36838 00003876 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36839                                  
 36840 00003878 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36841                                  	
 36842 0000387C 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36843                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36844 00003880 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36845                                  skip_cmmt:
 36846 00003882 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36847 00003884 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36848 00003887 46                      	inc	si
 36849 00003888 49                      	dec	cx
 36850 00003889 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36851 0000388B 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36852                                  no_commt:
 36853 0000388D C3                      	retn
