 37960                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37961                                  ;
 37962                                  ;   HISTORY
 37963                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37964                                  ;
 37965                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37966                                  
 37967                                  find_block:
 37968 00003DAC E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37969 00003DAF 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37970 00003DB1 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37971 00003DB3 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37972 00003DB5 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37973 00003DB7 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37974 00003DB9 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37975 00003DBB 2E800E[A514]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37976 00003DC1 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37977                                  check_line:
 37978 00003DC3 2E800E[A514]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37979 00003DC9 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37980 00003DCC 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37981                                  next_line:
 37982 00003DCE E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37983 00003DD1 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37984                                  ;find_exit:
 37985                                  ;	retn
 37986                                  
 37987                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37988                                  ;
 37989                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37990                                  ;
 37991                                  ;   INPUT
 37992                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37993                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37994                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37995                                  ;
 37996                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37997                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37998                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37999                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38000                                  ;
 38001                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38002                                  ;       AX
 38003                                  ;
 38004                                  ;   NOTES
 38005                                  ;       None
 38006                                  ;
 38007                                  ;   HISTORY
 38008                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38009                                  ;
 38010                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38011                                  
 38012                                  comp_names:
 38013 00003DD3 57                              push    di              ;
 38014                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 38015 00003DD4 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 38016 00003DD7 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 38017 00003DD9 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 38018 00003DDC 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 38019 00003DDE 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 38020 00003DE0 47                              inc     di              ;
 38021 00003DE1 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 38022                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 38023 00003DE4 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 38024 00003DE6 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 38025 00003DE8 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 38026                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 38027 00003DE9 5F                              pop     di              ;
 38028 00003DEA C3                              retn			;
 38029                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 38030 00003DEB 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 38031 00003DED E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 38032 00003DF0 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 38033 00003DF2 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 38034                                  
 38035                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38036                                  
 38037                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38038                                  comp_names_x:
 38039                                  	;
 38040                                  comp_names_safe:
 38041 00003DF4 50                              push    ax
 38042 00003DF5 51                              push    cx
 38043 00003DF6 56                              push	si
 38044 00003DF7 1E                              push    ds
 38045 00003DF8 0E                              push    cs
 38046 00003DF9 1F                              pop     ds
 38047 00003DFA E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 38048 00003DFD 1F                              pop     ds
 38049 00003DFE 5E                      	pop	si
 38050 00003DFF 59                              pop     cx
 38051 00003E00 58                              pop     ax
 38052 00003E01 C3                              retn
 38053                                  
 38054                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38055                                  ;
 38056                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 38057                                  ;
 38058                                  ;   INPUT
 38059                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 38060                                  ;
 38061                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38062                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 38063                                  ;
 38064                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38065                                  ;       None
 38066                                  ;
 38067                                  ;   NOTES
 38068                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 38069                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 38070                                  ;
 38071                                  ;   HISTORY
 38072                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38073                                  ;
 38074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38075                                  
 38076                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38077                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 38078                                  
 38079                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 38080 00003E02 50                              push    ax              ;
 38081 00003E03 53                              push    bx              ;
 38082 00003E04 51                              push    cx              ;
 38083 00003E05 52                              push    dx              ;
 38084 00003E06 56                              push    si              ;
 38085 00003E07 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38086 00003E09 8A3E[E746]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 38087 00003E0D CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 38088 00003E0F 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38089 00003E10 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38090 00003E12 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 38091 00003E14 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 38092 00003E17 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 38093 00003E19 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 38094 00003E1B 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38095 00003E1D 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 38096 00003E1F 8A26[E646]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 38097 00003E23 3A1E[F046]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 38098 00003E27 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38099 00003E29 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 38100 00003E2C 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 38101 00003E2E B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 38102 00003E30 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 38103 00003E32 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 38104 00003E34 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38105 00003E36 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 38106                                  print_other:                    ;
 38107 00003E39 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 38108 00003E3B 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 38109 00003E3D 8BBF[1447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 38110 00003E41 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 38111 00003E43 8A3E[E746]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 38112 00003E47 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 38113 00003E49 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 38114 00003E4C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38115 00003E4E FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38116 00003E50 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38117 00003E52 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38118                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 38119 00003E54 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 38120 00003E57 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 38121 00003E59 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38122 00003E5B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38123 00003E5D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38124                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 38125 00003E5F B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 38126 00003E62 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 38127 00003E64 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38128 00003E66 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38129 00003E68 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38130 00003E6A 06                              push    es              ;
 38131                                  print_loop:                     ;
 38132 00003E6B 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 38133 00003E6E 47                              inc     di              ;
 38134 00003E6F 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 38135 00003E71 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 38136 00003E73 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 38137                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 38138 00003E75 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 38139 00003E77 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 38140 00003E79 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 38141 00003E7B 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 38142 00003E7D B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 38143 00003E7F CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38144 00003E81 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38145 00003E83 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 38146 00003E86 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 38147 00003E88 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38148 00003E8A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38149 00003E8C EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 38150                                  print_done:                     ;
 38151 00003E8E 07                              pop     es              ;
 38152 00003E8F 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38153 00003E90 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38154 00003E92 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 38155 00003E94 5E                              pop     si              ;
 38156 00003E95 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38157 00003E96 59                              pop     cx              ;
 38158 00003E97 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38159 00003E98 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38160 00003E99 C3                              retn			;
 38161                                  
 38162                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38163                                  ;
 38164                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 38165                                  ;
 38166                                  ;   INPUT
 38167                                  ;       None
 38168                                  ;
 38169                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38170                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 38171                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 38172                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 38173                                  ;
 38174                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38175                                  ;       None
 38176                                  ;
 38177                                  ;   NOTES
 38178                                  ;       None
 38179                                  ;
 38180                                  ;   HISTORY
 38181                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38182                                  ;
 38183                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38184                                  
 38185                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 38186 00003E9A 8A1E[F046]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 38187 00003E9E 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38188 00003EA0 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 38189 00003EA3 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 38190 00003EA6 803E[F446]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 38191 00003EAB 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 38192 00003EAD B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 38193 00003EAF CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38194 00003EB1 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 38195                                  check_time:
 38196 00003EB3 A0[F446]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 38197 00003EB6 2A06[F546]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 38198 00003EBA 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 38199 00003EBC 800E[EF46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 38200 00003EC1 C606[F546]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 38201 00003EC6 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 38202                                  show_time:
 38203 00003EC9 53                              push    bx              ;
 38204 00003ECA 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 38205 00003ECC 8A3E[E746]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 38206 00003ED0 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38207 00003ED2 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38208 00003ED4 52                              push    dx              ;
 38209 00003ED5 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 38210 00003ED8 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38211 00003EDA CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38212 00003EDC BA[AC4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 38213 00003EDF E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 38214 00003EE2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 38215 00003EE4 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 38216 00003EE5 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 38217 00003EE7 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 38218 00003EE9 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 38219 00003EEB 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38220 00003EED B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38221 00003EEF CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 38222 00003EF1 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 38223 00003EF3 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38224 00003EF5 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38225 00003EF7 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 38226 00003EF9 5A                              pop     dx
 38227 00003EFA B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 38228 00003EFC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38229 00003EFE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38230                                  input_key:
 38231 00003EFF B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 38232 00003F01 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 38233 00003F03 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38234 00003F05 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 38235 00003F07 803E[F446]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 38236 00003F0C 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 38237 00003F0E B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 38238 00003F10 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 38239 00003F12 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 38240 00003F14 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 38241 00003F16 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 38242 00003F18 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 38243 00003F1A B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 38244                                  got_time:
 38245 00003F1C 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 38246 00003F1E 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 38247 00003F20 0036[F546]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 38248 00003F24 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 38249                                  got_key:
 38250 00003F26 50                              push    ax              ;
 38251 00003F27 B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 38252 00003F2A 8706[F446]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 38253 00003F2E 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 38254 00003F30 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 38255 00003F32 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 38256 00003F33 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38257 00003F36 8B1E[E646]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38258 00003F3A B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 38259 00003F3D CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 38260 00003F3F 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 38261                                  
 38262                                  timeout_disabled:
 38263 00003F40 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38264 00003F41 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 38265 00003F43 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 38266 00003F45 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 38267 00003F47 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 38268                                  
 38269 00003F49 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 38270 00003F4B 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 38271 00003F4D 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 38272 00003F50 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 38273 00003F52 FE0E[F046]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38274 00003F56 E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38275 00003F59 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 38276 00003F5B EB12                            jmp     short print1
 38277                                  not_up:
 38278 00003F5D 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 38279 00003F5F 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 38280 00003F61 3A1E[F146]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 38281 00003F65 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 38282 00003F67 FE06[F046]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38283 00003F6B E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38284 00003F6E 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 38285                                  print1: 
 38286 00003F6F 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 38287                                  print2: 
 38288 00003F71 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 38289 00003F74 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 38290                                  to_input_key:
 38291 00003F77 EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 38292                                  not_down:
 38293 00003F79 F606[EB46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38294 00003F7E 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 38295 00003F80 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 38296 00003F82 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 38297 00003F84 8036[EF46]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 38298 00003F89 E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 38299 00003F8C E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 38300                                  not_f8:
 38301 00003F8F 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 38302 00003F91 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 38303                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38304                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 38305                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 38306 00003F93 800E[EF46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 38307 00003F98 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 38308 00003F9B B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 38309 00003F9D EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 38310                                  
 38311                                  normal_key:
 38312 00003F9F 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 38313 00003FA1 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 38314 00003FA3 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 38315 00003FA5 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 38316 00003FA7 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 38317 00003FAA C3                              retn			;
 38318                                  not_backspace:
 38319 00003FAB 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 38320 00003FAD 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 38321 00003FAF 3A06[F146]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 38322 00003FB3 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 38323 00003FB5 A2[F046]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 38324 00003FB8 E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 38325 00003FBB 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 38326 00003FBD EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 38327                                  
 38328                                  select_done:
 38329 00003FBF B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 38330 00003FC1 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38331 00003FC3 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 38332                                  
 38333                                  	; fall into disp_input
 38334                                  
 38335                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38336                                  
 38337                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38338                                  ;
 38339                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 38340                                  ;
 38341                                  ;   INPUT
 38342                                  ;       AL == character to display
 38343                                  ;
 38344                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38345                                  ;       None
 38346                                  ;
 38347                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38348                                  ;       None
 38349                                  ;
 38350                                  ;   NOTES
 38351                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 38352                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 38353                                  ;
 38354                                  ;   HISTORY
 38355                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38356                                  ;
 38357                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38358                                  
 38359                                  
 38360                                  disp_input:
 38361 00003FC5 50                      	push	ax
 38362                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 38363                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 38364                                  	;mov	al,' '
 38365                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 38366 00003FC6 B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 38367 00003FC8 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 38368 00003FCA 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 38369                                  disp_ok:
 38370 00003FCC 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 38371                                  disp_input_ok:
 38372 00003FCE B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38373 00003FD0 CD21                    	int	21h
 38374 00003FD2 BA[0A4A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 38375 00003FD5 E8E504                  	call	print
 38376 00003FD8 58                      	pop	ax
 38377 00003FD9 C3                      	retn
 38378                                  
 38379                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38380                                  
 38381                                  disp_num:
 38382 00003FDA 53                              push    bx
 38383 00003FDB 0430                            add     al,'0'
 38384 00003FDD B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 38385 00003FDF 8B1E[E646]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38386 00003FE3 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 38387 00003FE6 CD10                            int     10h
 38388 00003FE8 5B                              pop     bx
 38389 00003FE9 C3                              retn
 38390                                  
 38391                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38392                                  ;
 38393                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 38394                                  ;
 38395                                  ;   INPUT
 38396                                  ;       None
 38397                                  ;
 38398                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38399                                  ;       None
 38400                                  ;
 38401                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38402                                  ;       None
 38403                                  ;
 38404                                  ;   NOTES
 38405                                  ;       None
 38406                                  ;
 38407                                  ;   HISTORY
 38408                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38409                                  ;
 38410                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38411                                  
 38412                                  show_status:
 38413 00003FEA 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 38414 00003FEB 8B1E[E646]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38415 00003FEF B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38416 00003FF1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38417 00003FF3 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38418 00003FF4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38419 00003FF6 8B16[E946]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 38420 00003FFA F606[EB46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38421 00003FFF 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 38422 00004001 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 38423 00004003 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38424 00004005 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38425 00004008 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 38426                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38427                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 38428 0000400B EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 38429                                  show_onoff: 
 38430 0000400D CD10                            int     10h
 38431                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 38432                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 38433                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 38434                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 38435                                  
 38436 0000400F A0[A84C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 38437 00004012 803E[EF46]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 38438 00004017 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 38439 00004019 A0[A44C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 38440                                  show_noton:                     ;
 38441 0000401C B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 38442                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
 38443 0000401E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38444                                  ;show_done:                     ;
 38445 00004020 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38446 00004021 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38447 00004023 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 38448 00004025 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38449 00004026 C3                              retn			;
 38450                                  
 38451                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38452                                  
 38453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38454                                  ;
 38455                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 38456                                  ;
 38457                                  ;   INPUT
 38458                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38459                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38460                                  ;
 38461                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38462                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 38463                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 38464                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 38465                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38466                                  ;
 38467                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38468                                  ;       AX
 38469                                  ;
 38470                                  ;   NOTES
 38471                                  ;       None
 38472                                  ;
 38473                                  ;   HISTORY
 38474                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38475                                  ;
 38476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38477                                  
 38478                                  skip_token:
 38479 00004027 E84D00                          call    get_char
 38480 0000402A 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 38481 0000402C E8B401                          call    any_delim
 38482 0000402F 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 38483                                  skip_check_eol:
 38484 00004031 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 38485 00004033 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38486 00004035 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38487 00004037 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38488 00004039 F8                              clc
 38489                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 38490 0000403A C3                      	retn
 38491                                  skip_token_eol:
 38492 0000403B F9                              stc
 38493                                  skip_token_done:
 38494 0000403C C3                              retn
 38495                                  
 38496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38497                                  ;
 38498                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 38499                                  ;
 38500                                  ;   INPUT
 38501                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38502                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38503                                  ;
 38504                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38505                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38506                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 38507                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 38508                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38509                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 38510                                  ;
 38511                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38512                                  ;       AX
 38513                                  ;
 38514                                  ;   NOTES
 38515                                  ;       None
 38516                                  ;
 38517                                  ;   HISTORY
 38518                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38519                                  ;
 38520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38521                                  
 38522                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 38523 0000403D E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 38524 00004040 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 38525 00004043 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 38526 00004045 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 38527 00004048 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 38528 0000404A EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 38529                                  
 38530                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38531                                  ;
 38532                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 38533                                  ;
 38534                                  ;   INPUT
 38535                                  ;       AL == last character read
 38536                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38537                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38538                                  ;
 38539                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38540                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38541                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 38542                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38543                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38544                                  ;
 38545                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38546                                  ;       AX
 38547                                  ;
 38548                                  ;   NOTES
 38549                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 38550                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 38551                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 38552                                  ;
 38553                                  ;   HISTORY
 38554                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38555                                  ;
 38556                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38557                                  
 38558                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38559                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 38560                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38561                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 38562                                       
 38563                                  	; fall into skip_line
 38564                                  
 38565                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38566                                  ;
 38567                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 38568                                  ;
 38569                                  ;   INPUT
 38570                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38571                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38572                                  ;
 38573                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38574                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38575                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38576                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38577                                  ;
 38578                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38579                                  ;       AX
 38580                                  ;
 38581                                  ;   NOTES
 38582                                  ;       None
 38583                                  ;
 38584                                  ;   HISTORY
 38585                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38586                                  ;
 38587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38588                                  
 38589                                  skip_line:
 38590 0000404C E82800                          call    get_char
 38591 0000404F 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 38592                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38593 00004051 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38594 00004053 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 38595                                  skip_line_done:
 38596                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 38597 00004055 C3                              retn

 38599                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38600                                  ;
 38601                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 38602                                  ;
 38603                                  ;   INPUT
 38604                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38605                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38606                                  ;
 38607                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38608                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 38609                                  ;       BX == binary #
 38610                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 38611                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38612                                  ;
 38613                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38614                                  ;       AX
 38615                                  ;
 38616                                  ;   NOTES
 38617                                  ;       None
 38618                                  ;
 38619                                  ;   HISTORY
 38620                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38621                                  ;
 38622                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38623                                  
 38624                                  ; 13/05/2019
 38625                                  
 38626                                  get_number:
 38627 00004056 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 38628                                  num_loop:
 38629 00004058 E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 38630 0000405B 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 38631 0000405D 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 38632 0000405F 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 38633 00004061 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 38634 00004063 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 38635 00004065 50                              push    ax              ;
 38636 00004066 B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 38637 00004069 52                              push    dx              ;
 38638 0000406A F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 38639 0000406C 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38640 0000406D 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 38641 0000406F 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38642 00004070 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 38643 00004072 98                              cbw                     ;
 38644 00004073 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 38645 00004075 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 38646                                  
 38647                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38648                                  ;num_done:
 38649                                          ;retn

 38651                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38652                                  ;
 38653                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 38654                                  ;
 38655                                  ;   INPUT
 38656                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38657                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38658                                  ;
 38659                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38660                                  ;       AL == next character
 38661                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 38662                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38663                                  ;
 38664                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38665                                  ;       AX
 38666                                  ;
 38667                                  ;   NOTES
 38668                                  ;       None
 38669                                  ;
 38670                                  ;   HISTORY
 38671                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38672                                  ;
 38673                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38674                                  
 38675                                  get_char:
 38676 00004077 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 38677 0000407A 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 38678                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 38679 0000407C 26                      	es	
 38680 0000407D AC                      	lodsb
 38681 0000407E 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38682 00004080 C3                              retn			;
 38683                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38684 00004081 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38685                                  nearby_ret:
 38686 00004084 C3                              retn

 38688                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38689                                  ;
 38690                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38691                                  ;
 38692                                  ;   INPUT
 38693                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38694                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38695                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38696                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38697                                  ;
 38698                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38699                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38700                                  ;
 38701                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38702                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38703                                  ;
 38704                                  ;   NOTES
 38705                                  ;       None
 38706                                  ;
 38707                                  ;   HISTORY
 38708                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38709                                  ;
 38710                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38711                                  
 38712                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38713                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38714                                  
 38715                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38716                                  query_user:
 38717 00004085 F606[EF46]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38718                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38719 0000408A 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38720 0000408C E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38721                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38722                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38723                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38724                                  qu_1:
 38725 0000408F F606[EF46]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38726 00004094 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38727 00004096 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38728 00004097 A0[A414]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38729 0000409A F606[EF46]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38730 0000409F 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38731 000040A1 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38732                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38733 000040A3 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38734                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38735                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38736                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38737

 38739 000040A5 58                      	pop	ax
 38740 000040A6 C3                      	retn

 38742                                  query_all:
 38743                                  
 38744                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38745                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38746                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38747                                  
 38748 000040A7 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38749 000040A8 BA[FE4C]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38750 000040AB 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38751 000040AD 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38752                                  
 38753 000040AF 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38754 000040B1 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38755 000040B3 BF[3C47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38756                                  find_match:                             ;
 38757 000040B6 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38758 000040B8 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38759 000040BA 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38760 000040BC 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38761 000040BD 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38762 000040BF 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38763 000040C1 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38764                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38765 000040C4 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38766                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38767 000040C6 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38768 000040C9 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38769 000040CB B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38770                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38771 000040CD 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38772 000040CF 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38773 000040D0 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38774 000040D2 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38775 000040D4 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38776 000040D6 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38777 000040D8 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38778 000040DB 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38779 000040DD B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38780                                  cmd_notset:
 38781 000040DF CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38782                                  line_print:                             ;
 38783                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38784 000040E1 26                              es
 38785 000040E2 AC                      	lodsb
 38786 000040E3 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38787 000040E5 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38788 000040E7 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38789                                  non_null:                               ;
 38790 000040E9 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38791 000040EB 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38792 000040ED 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38793                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38794 000040EF 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38795                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38796 000040F2 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38797                                  non_space:                              ;
 38798 000040F4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38799 000040F6 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38800 000040F8 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38801 000040FA EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38802                                  
 38803                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38804 000040FC BA[9C4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38805                                  
 38806                                  generic_prompt:
 38807 000040FF E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38808                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38809 00004102 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38810 00004104 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38811 00004106 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38812 00004108 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38813 0000410A 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38814 0000410D 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38815 0000410F A0[A84C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 38816 00004112 800E[EF46]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38817 00004117 EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38818                                  not_func:
 38819 00004119 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38820 0000411B 3A06[A84C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38821 0000411F 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38822 00004121 3A06[A44C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38823 00004125 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38824 00004127 803E[A414]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38825 0000412C 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38826 0000412E 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38827 00004130 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38828 00004132 800E[EF46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38829 00004137 A0[A44C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38830                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38831 0000413A E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38832 0000413D 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38833                                  
 38834 0000413E 3A06[A84C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38835 00004142 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38836                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38837 00004144 F8                      	clc
 38838                                  do_cmd:
 38839 00004145 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38840                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38841                                  	; cf=0
 38842                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38843 00004146 C3                      	retn
 38844                                  
 38845                                  skip_cmd:

 38847                                  skip_all:
 38848 00004148 B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 38849 0000414A F9                      	stc
 38850 0000414B C3                      	retn

 38907                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38908                                  
 38909                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38910                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38911                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38912                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38913                                  
 38914                                  disable_autoexec:
 38915                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38916                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38917                                  
 38918 00004180 F606[EF46]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38919 00004185 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38920 00004187 F606[E546]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38921 0000418C 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38922 0000418E 800E[E546]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38923                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38924 00004193 810E[EF46]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38925 00004199 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38926                                  dae_1:
 38927                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38928 0000419C A0[2446]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38929                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38930 0000419F 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38931 000041A1 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38932 000041A3 8A1E[2546]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38933 000041A7 B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38934 000041A9 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38935 000041AB 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38936 000041AE 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38937 000041B1 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38938 000041B3 881E[2546]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38939 000041B7 81C3[2646]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38940 000041BB 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38941                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38942 000041BC 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38943 000041BF 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38944 000041C1 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38945 000041C2 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38946 000041C4 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38947                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38948 000041C7 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38949                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38950                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38951 000041CA C3                              retn

 38998                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 38999                                  delim:
 39000 000041F3 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 39001 000041F5 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 39002

 39004 000041F9 7413                    	je	short delim_ret

 39006                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 39007 000041FB 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 39008 000041FD 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 39009 000041FF 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 39010 00004201 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 39011 00004203 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 39012 00004205 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 39013 00004207 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 39014 00004209 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 39015 0000420B 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 39016                                  
 39017                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39018                                  
 39019                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 39020                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39021                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 39022 0000420D F8                      	clc
 39023                                  ;endif
 39024                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39025                                  delim_ret:
 39026                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39027                                  	; cf = 0
 39028                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 39029 0000420E C3                      	retn

 39033                                  ; procedure : newline
 39034                                  ;
 39035                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 39036                                  ;
 39037                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39038                                  
 39039                                  newline:

 39091                                  ; 
 39092                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 39093                                  ;
 39094                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39095                                  
 39096                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39097                                  
 39098                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39099                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 39100                                  mapcase:
 39101 0000422F 51                      	push	cx
 39102 00004230 56                      	push	si
 39103 00004231 1E                      	push	ds
 39104                                  
 39105 00004232 06                      	push	es
 39106 00004233 1F                      	pop	ds
 39107                                  
 39108                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39109                                  
 39110                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39111                                  
 39112                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39113 00004234 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 39114                                  ;else
 39115                                  ;	xor	si,si
 39116                                  ;endif
 39117                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39118                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39119                                  	;xor	si, si
 39120                                  
 39121                                  convloop:
 39122 00004236 AC                      	lodsb
 39123 00004237 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 39124 00004239 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 39125 0000423B 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 39126 0000423D 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 39127 0000423F 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 39128 00004241 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 39129                                  noconv:
 39130                                  
 39131                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39132                                  
 39133                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39134                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39135                                  
 39136                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 39137                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 39138                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 39139                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 39140                                  ;
 39141 00004244 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 39142 00004247 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 39143 00004249 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 39144 0000424B 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 39145                                  check_eol:
 39146 0000424D 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 39147 0000424F 7406                    	je	short convdone
 39148 00004251 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 39149 00004253 7402                    	je	short convdone
 39150                                  ;endif
 39151                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39152 00004255 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 39153                                  convdone:
 39154 00004257 1F                      	pop	ds
 39155 00004258 5E                      	pop	si
 39156 00004259 59                      	pop	cx
 39157 0000425A C3                      	retn

 39275                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39276                                  ;
 39277                                  ; procedure : getnum
 39278                                  ;
 39279                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 39280                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 39281                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 39282                                  ;
 39283                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39284                                  
 39285                                  getnum:
 39286 000042CE 53                      	push	bx
 39287 000042CF 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 39288                                  b2:
 39289 000042D1 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 39290 000042D4 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 39291                                  
 39292 000042D6 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 39293 000042D7 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 39294                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 39295                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39296 000042D8 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 39297 000042DA F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 39298 000042DC 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 39299 000042DD 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 39300 000042DF 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 39301 000042E2 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 39302                                  
 39303 000042E4 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 39304                                  
 39305 000042E5 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 39306 000042E8 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 39307 000042EA 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 39308 000042EC 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 39309 000042EE 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 39310 000042F0 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 39311 000042F2 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 39312 000042F4 7417                    	je	short b15
 39313 000042F6 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 39314 000042FB 7410                    	je	short b15
 39315 000042FD 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 39316                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39317                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39318                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 39319                                  	;nop
 39320 000042FF 740C                    	je	short b15
 39321 00004301 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 39322 00004303 7408                    	je	short b15
 39323 00004305 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 39324 00004307 7404                    	je	short b15
 39325 00004309 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 39326 0000430B 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 39327                                  b15:
 39328 0000430D 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 39329 00004312 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 39330                                  b1:
 39331 00004317 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 39332 00004319 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 39333 0000431B 5B                      	pop	bx
 39334 0000431C C3                      	retn
 39335                                  badnum:
 39336                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39337                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 39338 0000431D 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 39339                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 39340 0000431F 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 39341 00004323 5B                      	pop	bx
 39342 00004324 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 39343 00004325 C3                      	retn
