 39347                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 39348                                  
 39349                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39350                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 39351                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 39352                                  ;	si = 0
 39353                                  ;	ax = country id
 39354                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 39355                                  ;	bx = file handle
 39356                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 39357                                  ;
 39358                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 39359                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 39360                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 39361                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 39362                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39363                                  
 39364                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39365                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 39366                                  
 39367                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39368                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)

 39397

 39399 0000434E 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.

 39401 00004353 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.

 39413 00004367 5F                      	pop	di
 39414                                  
 39415                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 39416 00004368 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 39417 0000436B 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 39418

 39610                                  getcountrydestination:
 39611                                  
 39612                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39613                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 39614                                  ;
 39615                                  ;input: al - data id
 39616                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39617                                  ;on return:
 39618                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 39619                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 39620                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39621                                  
 39622                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39623                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 39624                                  
 39625                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39626                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 39627                                  
 39628 0000444B 51                      	push	cx
 39629                                  	;add	di,74
 39630 0000444C 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 39631                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 39632 0000444F 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 39633 00004452 47                      	inc	di
 39634 00004453 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 39635                                  
 39636                                  getcntrydest:
 39637 00004454 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 39638 00004457 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 39639                                  
 39640 00004459 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 39641 0000445D 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 39642                                  
 39643 0000445F 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 39644 00004462 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 39645                                  
 39646                                  getcntrydest_1:
 39647                                  	;add	di,41
 39648 00004464 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 39649                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 39650 00004467 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 39651 00004469 F9                      	stc
 39652                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 39653                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 39654                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39655 0000446A 59                      	pop	cx
 39656 0000446B C3                      	retn
 39657                                  
 39658                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 39659                                  	; 10/09/2023

 39680                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39681                                  
 39682                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39683                                  
 39684                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39685                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39686                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39687                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39688                                  ;
 39689                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39690                                  ;	 be moved.
 39691                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39692                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39693                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39694                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39695                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39696                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39697                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39698                                  
 39699 00004476 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39700 00004477 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39701 0000447A F9                      	stc
 39702 0000447B CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39703 0000447D 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39704 0000447E 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39705                                  
 39706 00004480 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39707 00004482 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39708 00004484 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39709 00004486 F9                      	stc
 39710 00004487 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39711                                  ricb_exit:
 39712 00004489 C3                      	retn
 39713

 39716                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39717                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39718                                  %if 0
 39719                                  
 39720                                  set_country_path:
 39721                                  
 39722                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39723                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39724                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39725                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39726                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39727                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39728                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39729                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39730                                  
 39731                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39732                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39733                                  
 39734                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39735                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39736                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39737                                  
 39738                                  	push	si
 39739                                  
 39740                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39741                                  	push	es
 39742                                  	pop	ds
 39743                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39744                                  
 39745                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39746                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39747                                  
 39748                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39749                                  	inc	si
 39750                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39751                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39752                                  
 39753                                  scp_default_drv:
 39754                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39755                                  	int	21h
 39756                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39757                                  
 39758                                  scp_setdrv:
 39759                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39760                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39761                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39762                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39763                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39764                                  
 39765                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39766                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39767                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39768                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39769                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39770                                  
 39771                                  scp_root_dir:
 39772                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39773                                  scp_path:
 39774                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39775                                  
 39776                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39777                                  scpath_exit:
 39778                                  
 39779                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39780                                  	push	es
 39781                                  	pop	ds
 39782                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39783                                  
 39784                                  	pop	si
 39785                                  	retn
 39786                                  
 39787                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39788                                  
 39789                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39790                                  
 39791                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39792                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39793                                  ;carry set if not.
 39794                                  
 39795                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39796                                  
 39797                                  	push	ax
 39798                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39799                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39800                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39801                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39802                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39803                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39804                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39805                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39806                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39807                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39808                                  
 39809                                  cdletter_no:
 39810                                  	stc
 39811                                  cdletter_exit:
 39812                                  	pop	ax
 39813                                  	retn
 39814                                  
 39815                                  %endif
